original: gal te dngos su sgrub par @14b byed pa ma yin yang de dran pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te dngos su sgrub par @14b byed pa ma yin yang de dran pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa nyid yin na /
translated: If it is the proof because it is the cause of the memory of the probandum, even though it is not the direct proof,

original: phyogs kyi tshig de las gtan tshigs kyi tshig 'jug pa'i phyir de yang nus pa dran pa'i rgyu nyid kyis nus pa'i sgrub par byed pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: phyogs kyi tshig de las gtan tshigs kyi tshig 'jug pa'i phyir de yang nus pa dran pa'i rgyu nyid kyis nus pa'i sgrub par byed pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: then the reason is also the proof of the probandum by the cause of the memory of the power, because the word of the subject is engaged in the reason.

original: re zhig sngar gyi rtogs pa po ci sgra brtag pa yin nam 'on te ma yin zhes the tshom za'o //
analyzed: re zhig sngar gyi rtogs pa po ci sgra brtag pa yin nam 'on te ma yin zhes the tshom za'o //
translated: First, the one who understands has doubt, thinking, ‚ÄúIs the word an investigation or not?‚Äù

original: the tshom las ni shes par 'dod par 'gyur la /
analyzed: the tshom las ni shes par 'dod par 'gyur la /
translated: From doubt, there is the desire to know.

original: shes par 'dod pa de las ni gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba'i skabs mngon par 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can 'jug cing /
analyzed: shes par 'dod pa de las ni gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba'i skabs mngon par 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can 'jug cing /
translated: The desire to know is the basis for the application of the reason, which is the means of engaging in the desired goal.

original: de las ni gtan tshigs kyi tshig yin te /
analyzed: de las ni gtan tshigs kyi tshig yin te /
translated: The desire to know is the basis for the application of the reason, and the application of the reason is the statement of the reason.

original: de'i phyir the tshom dang shes par 'dod pa dang / skabs de dag kyang rjes su dpag par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir the tshom dang shes par 'dod pa dang / skabs de dag kyang rjes su dpag par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the desire to know, the doubt, and the occasion would also be the inference.

original: de dag las kyang gtan tshigs kyi tshig 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag las kyang gtan tshigs kyi tshig 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And the statement of the reason would also be applied to them.

original: ci ste gcig gis rab tu sbyar ba'i tshig nyid gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste gcig gis rab tu sbyar ba'i tshig nyid gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the statement applied by one person is the inference for the sake of another,

original: de lta na yang gang gi tshe rgol ba de nyid sgra rtag pa'o zhes tshig 'ga' zhig smras pa na /
analyzed: de lta na yang gang gi tshe rgol ba de nyid sgra rtag pa'o zhes tshig 'ga' zhig smras pa na /
translated: then when the proponent says something like, ‚ÄúSound is permanent,‚Äù

original: rgol bas rab tu sbyar ba de las zur na 'dug ba 'ga' zhig the tshom du gyur pa na /
analyzed: rgol bas rab tu sbyar ba de las zur na 'dug ba 'ga' zhig the tshom du gyur pa na /
translated: then someone else sitting nearby, who is a disputant, would have an inference for the sake of another.

original: rgol ba de nyid phan par 'dod pas de bzlog pa'i phyir gnyen por mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyi tshig 'god par srid pa yin te /
analyzed: rgol ba de nyid phan par 'dod pas de bzlog pa'i phyir gnyen por mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyi tshig 'god par srid pa yin te /
translated: The opponent, who desires to benefit himself, may set forth the statement of the reason ‚Äúimpermanence‚Äù as an antidote in order to refute that.

original: de'i phyir mi mthun pa'i tshig de yang gtan tshigs kyi tshig de dang lhan cig skyes bu gcig la brten pa sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir mi mthun pa'i tshig de yang gtan tshigs kyi tshig de dang lhan cig skyes bu gcig la brten pa sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, that statement of the reason and that statement of the opponent‚Äôs words are established as being based on the same person.

original: gang gi phyir ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the absurdity of that,

original: nang gi yan lag ni bar ma chod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nang gi yan lag ni bar ma chod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the internal factor is not interrupted.

original: tshul gsum pa'i rtags de la dran pa 'jog par byed pa nyid ni nang gi yan lag gi gtan tshigs nyid kyi tshig la gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: tshul gsum pa'i rtags de la dran pa 'jog par byed pa nyid ni nang gi yan lag gi gtan tshigs nyid kyi tshig la gnas pa yin no //
translated: The mere placement of memory in the reason that has the three modes is the statement of the internal factor of the reason.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this.

original: don ni shes pas go bar byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: don ni shes pas go bar byed pa yin gyi /
translated: The meaning is understood by the cognition,

original: sgron ma bzhin du rung ba tsam gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgron ma bzhin du rung ba tsam gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: but not by mere suitability, like a lamp.

original: des na tshig gang gis de sems la 'jug par byed pa de nyid sgrub par byed pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na tshig gang gis de sems la 'jug par byed pa de nyid sgrub par byed pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the statement that establishes the reason is the one that causes the mind to engage the object, not any other.

original: gtan tshigs kyi byed pa'i yul ma bstan na gtan tshigs kyi byed pa mi srid pas phyogs kyi tshig ni de ston pa nyid kyis nus pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi byed pa'i yul ma bstan na gtan tshigs kyi byed pa mi srid pas phyogs kyi tshig ni de ston pa nyid kyis nus pa yin gyi /
translated: If the domain of the function of the reason is not stated, the function of the reason is not possible. Therefore, the statement of the position is capable of showing that,

original: nus pa dran par byed pas ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: nus pa dran par byed pas ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: but it is not capable of reminding one of that.

original: 'di la zhes smos te /üîΩ'di ltar go bar bya ba med na gtan @15a * //
analyzed: 'di la zhes smos te / 'di ltar go bar bya ba med na gtan @15a * //
translated: In response to this, the treatise states:üîΩIn the same way that a reason does not cause understanding if there is nothing to be understood,

original: tshigs go bar byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du rtogs par bya ba the tshom mi za ba na yang ma yin te /
analyzed: tshigs go bar byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du rtogs par bya ba the tshom mi za ba na yang ma yin te /
translated: in the same way, it does not cause understanding if there is no doubt about what is to be understood.

original: de'i phyir the tshom la sogs pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes gang brjod pa de ni 'di la yang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir the tshom la sogs pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes gang brjod pa de ni 'di la yang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the consequence that doubt and so on would also be reasons applies equally to your position.

original: ci ste gcig gis rab tu sbyar ba'i gtan tshigs nyid rjes su dpag pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste gcig gis rab tu sbyar ba'i gtan tshigs nyid rjes su dpag pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the reason itself is the inference because it is applied by one,

original: de lta yin na yang yul ston par byed pa med kyang don gyi yul go bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na yang yul ston par byed pa med kyang don gyi yul go bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though the object is not taught, the object of the meaning is understood.

original: gang cung zad ces bya ba la sogs pa khyab pa'i tshig gis byas pa mi rtag pa la nges par bstan nas sgra yang byas pa yin no zhes phyogs kyi chos brjod pas sgra la bstan pa'i phyir 'di nyid der nus pa yin no //
analyzed: gang cung zad ces bya ba la sogs pa khyab pa'i tshig gis byas pa mi rtag pa la nges par bstan nas sgra yang byas pa yin no zhes phyogs kyi chos brjod pas sgra la bstan pa'i phyir 'di nyid der nus pa yin no //
translated: Having ascertained the pervasion by the pervasion statement ‚ÄúWhatever is produced is impermanent,‚Äù by saying ‚ÄúSound is produced,‚Äù which is the property of the subject, he teaches sound to be impermanent. This alone is the power of the statement.

original: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar bstan bar bya ba ma yin no //üîΩphyogs med kyang go bar byed pa na go bar byed pa nyid yin pa des na phyogs ni ma brjod kyang 'grub pa la gegs med pa'i phyir tshul gsum po 'di dag nyid ma brjod na grub pa la gegs su 'gyur bas de dag nyid las gang yang
analyzed: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar bstan bar bya ba ma yin no // phyogs med kyang go bar byed pa na go bar byed pa nyid yin pa des na phyogs ni ma brjod kyang 'grub pa la gegs med pa'i phyir tshul gsum po 'di dag nyid ma brjod na grub pa la gegs su 'gyur bas de dag nyid las gang yang
translated: Therefore it is not necessarily the case that it is not taught.

original: rung ba zhig ma brjod na sgrub pa ma tshang ba'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rung ba zhig ma brjod na sgrub pa ma tshang ba'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though the subject is not stated, when it is understood, it is understood. Therefore, even though the subject is not stated, there is no impediment to establishing the thesis. Since the three modes are established by the statement, if any one of them is not stated, there is the fault of an incomplete proof.

original: de bstan ba med na med pa ni mi 'khrul ba nyid de /
analyzed: de bstan ba med na med pa ni mi 'khrul ba nyid de /
translated: If it is not taught, it is not established. Nonerroneous means

original: de ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not that.

original: de med kyang sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir brjod par mi bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: de med kyang sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir brjod par mi bya'o zhe na /
translated: But even if it does not exist, it is a proof, so it should not be mentioned.

original: brjod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba yin te /
translated: It should be mentioned,

original: sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: but not because it is a part of the proof.

original: 'on kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin la phyi na ci log tu bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin nam mkha'i yon tan la sogs pa la phyin ci log tu bsgrub par bya ba nyid du ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin la phyi na ci log tu bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin nam mkha'i yon tan la sogs pa la phyin ci log tu bsgrub par bya ba nyid du ste /
translated: Rather, it is because the proof is not established in the nature of the probandum, and the probandum is not established in the nature of the property of space, etc.

original: phyin ci log de dang ldan pa'i log par rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir de bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log de dang ldan pa'i log par rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir de bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that error is seen to be associated with wrong understanding, it is to be refuted.

original: ngo bo zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag par bya ba'i ste /
analyzed: ngo bo zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag par bya ba'i ste /
translated: The nature is that of the inferable.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: It is the nature of the probandum itself.

original: de na bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de na bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: There, it is what is asserted to be the probandum.

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa yin yang gang gi tshe sgrub par byed pa nyid du brjod pa de'i tshe yang phyogs ma yin po nyid do zhes bya ba ni kho na'i sgra las so //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa yin yang gang gi tshe sgrub par byed pa nyid du brjod pa de'i tshe yang phyogs ma yin po nyid do zhes bya ba ni kho na'i sgra las so //
translated: Even though it is asserted to be the probandum, when it is stated to be the proof, then it is the counter-position, as indicated by the word ‚Äúonly.‚Äù

original: rang nyid ces bya ba ni bdag nyid 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: rang nyid ces bya ba ni bdag nyid 'dod pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Itself‚Äù means ‚Äúby itself.‚Äù

original: ma bsal ba nyid mngon sum la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma bsal ba nyid mngon sum la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Not excluded‚Äù means ‚Äúnot excluded by perception and so on.‚Äù

original: phyogs kyi mtshan nyid 'dir ngo bo @15b dang tshig phrad dang 'dod pa dang rang nyid de /
analyzed: phyogs kyi mtshan nyid 'dir ngo bo @15b dang tshig phrad dang 'dod pa dang rang nyid de /
translated: The definition of a position is: essence, verbal expression, assertion, and itself.

original: rang nyid ngo bo'i tshig gi don rnams nye bar bzung ba na /
analyzed: rang nyid ngo bo'i tshig gi don rnams nye bar bzung ba na /
translated: When the meanings of the words ‚Äúessence,‚Äù ‚Äúverbal expression,‚Äù ‚Äúassertion,‚Äù and ‚Äúitself‚Äù are taken up,

original: ngo bo dang tshig phrad dang 'dod pa dang rang nyid ces bya ba'i ngag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ngo bo dang tshig phrad dang 'dod pa dang rang nyid ces bya ba'i ngag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: the statement ‚Äúessence, verbal expression, assertion, and itself‚Äù is made.

original: 'di dag nyid tshig yin te /
analyzed: 'di dag nyid tshig yin te /
translated: These are the words.

original: ngo bo dang tshig phrad dang 'dod pa dang rang nyid kyi tshig 'di bzhis ma grub pa dang / sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa dang don gyis brjod pa dang rgol ba'i 'dod pa gzung bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ngo bo dang tshig phrad dang 'dod pa dang rang nyid kyi tshig 'di bzhis ma grub pa dang / sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa dang don gyis brjod pa dang rgol ba'i 'dod pa gzung bar rig par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the four terms nature, phrase, desire, and one's own words are respectively the non-establishment, the non-establishment as proof, the expression by implication, and the acceptance of the opponent's desire.

original: gzung ba des na'o //
analyzed: gzung ba des na'o //
translated: By that acceptance, .

original: mnyan par bya ba zhes bya ba ni mnyan par rung ba nyid mngon sum gyis grub pa bsal ba yin no zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba zhes bya ba ni mnyan par rung ba nyid mngon sum gyis grub pa bsal ba yin no zhes 'brel to //
translated: The phrase to be listened to is connected with the exclusion of the establishment by perception of the mere suitability to be listened to.

original: rang gi ngo bo smos pas ni ma grub pa gzung ba yin pa'i phyir grub pa bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo smos pas ni ma grub pa gzung ba yin pa'i phyir grub pa bsal ba yin no //
translated: By mentioning its own nature, the exclusion of establishment is because of the acceptance of the non-establishment.

original: kho na'i sgras ma grub kyang sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa gang yin pa de bsal ba /
analyzed: kho na'i sgras ma grub kyang sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa gang yin pa de bsal ba /
translated: The word only excludes that which, although non-established, is desired to be the proof.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe dag go //
analyzed: ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe dag go //
translated: The non-established reason and example.

original: dper na / sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dper na / sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: For example, Sound is impermanent because of being produced, like a pot.

original: mngon bar gsal bar smra ba la gtan tshigs ma grub pa dang / grangs can ba la dpe yang ma grub pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mngon bar gsal bar smra ba la gtan tshigs ma grub pa dang / grangs can ba la dpe yang ma grub pa bzhin no //
translated: The reason is not established for the Proponents of Manifestation, and the example is not established for the SƒÅ·πÉkhyas.

original: 'dod pa smos pas ni mi 'dod pa bsal te /üîΩbsgrub pa nyid du 'dod pa'i skabs kyi rten ma yin pa bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa smos pas ni mi 'dod pa bsal te / bsgrub pa nyid du 'dod pa'i skabs kyi rten ma yin pa bsal ba yin no //
translated: By mentioning ‚Äúdesired,‚Äù the undesired is excluded.

original: bstan bcos la brten nas ni rtsod par bya ba ma yin mod kyi /
analyzed: bstan bcos la brten nas ni rtsod par bya ba ma yin mod kyi /
translated: The context is excluded, which is not the basis of the desire to prove.

original: bstan bcos khas blangs kyang nam mkha'i yon tan la sogs pa med na mi 'byung ba ma yin pa bsgrub bar bya ba dang ma 'brel pa bstan bcos las mthong ba ni rgol ba'i khas blangs pa yin pa bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos khas blangs kyang nam mkha'i yon tan la sogs pa med na mi 'byung ba ma yin pa bsgrub bar bya ba dang ma 'brel pa bstan bcos las mthong ba ni rgol ba'i khas blangs pa yin pa bsal ba yin no //
translated: Although the treatise is accepted, the opponent‚Äôs assertion is excluded, which is the treatise‚Äôs view of what is not related to the probandum, such as the qualities of space, which are not necessary conditions.üîΩEven if the probandum is expressed by the meaning, how is it not heard if it is not grasped by the word? The opponent‚Äôs desire to prove is excluded.

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba don gyis brjod pa yin yang sgras ma zin pa'i phyir ji ltar ma thos na rgol bas bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba don gyis brjod pa yin yang sgras ma zin pa'i phyir ji ltar ma thos na rgol bas bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa yin zhe na /
translated: If the probandum is expressed by the meaning, but because it is not grasped by the word, how is it not heard? The opponent‚Äôs desire to prove is excluded.

original: skabs kyis te /
analyzed: skabs kyis te /
translated: By the context.

original: sgrub par byed pa 'god pa'i rten nyid kyi skabs su bab pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa 'god pa'i rten nyid kyi skabs su bab pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The time has come to set forth the proof.

original: de ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: de ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: mig la sogs pa 'dus pa rnams spyir gzhan gyi don yin par grub pa na /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa 'dus pa rnams spyir gzhan gyi don yin par grub pa na /
translated: When the collection of eyes, etc. is generally established as being for the sake of another,

original: bdag nyid gzhan yin pa'i phyir gzhan gyi don ni bdag gi don nyid do //üîΩbdag gi don de ni ma smras su zin kyang de'i don ni sgrub par byed pa bkod pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pas khyab pa'i skabs su bab pa'i bsgrub @16a * //
analyzed: bdag nyid gzhan yin pa'i phyir gzhan gyi don ni bdag gi don nyid do // bdag gi don de ni ma smras su zin kyang de'i don ni sgrub par byed pa bkod pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pas khyab pa'i skabs su bab pa'i bsgrub @16a * //
translated: the sake of another is the very sake of the self, because the self is another.

original: par bya ba ni de yin no zhes rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa smos so //
analyzed: par bya ba ni de yin no zhes rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa smos so //
translated: Even though that sake of the self is not stated, since it is accepted as the probandum because the proof is set forth for the sake of that, the probandum is that, in order to make it understood that the time has come to accept the pervasion.

original: skabs kyi rten du gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos 'di nyid ni ltos pa las chos dang chos can gyi khyad par yin no //
analyzed: skabs kyi rten du gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos 'di nyid ni ltos pa las chos dang chos can gyi khyad par yin no //
translated: This very probandum that is the basis of the time is the distinction of the predicate and the subject due to dependence.

original: dngos po las ni khyad par dang khyad par can gyi 'brel pa yod pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dngos po las ni khyad par dang khyad par can gyi 'brel pa yod pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: The relation of the qualifier and the qualified does not exist due to the thing.

original: 'on kyang sgra'i yul nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang sgra'i yul nyid do //
translated: But it is the object of the word.

original: des na ma zin pa'i don nyid ni 'gal ba yang khyad par ma yin no //
analyzed: des na ma zin pa'i don nyid ni 'gal ba yang khyad par ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the fact that it is not grasped is not a distinguishing feature of the contradiction.

original: gang gi tshe sgras chos kyi yul du nye bar 'god pa de'i tshe ni chos kyi khyad par yin la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sgras chos kyi yul du nye bar 'god pa de'i tshe ni chos kyi khyad par yin la /
translated: When the word is posited as the object of the property, then it is a distinguishing feature of the property.

original: gang gi tshe chos can gyi yul du 'god pa de'i tshe ni chos can gyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir sgras nye bar bkod pa la ltos te gnyi ga'i khyad par du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe chos can gyi yul du 'god pa de'i tshe ni chos can gyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir sgras nye bar bkod pa la ltos te gnyi ga'i khyad par du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: When it is posited as the object of the subject, then it is a distinguishing feature of the subject. Therefore, depending on what is posited by the word, it can be a distinguishing feature of both.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i chos can dag go //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i chos can dag go //
translated: This refers to the subjects such as the eye, etc.

original: gzhan gyi don yin no zhes bya ba ni chos so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don yin no zhes bya ba ni chos so //
translated: For the sake of another is the property.

original: 'dus pa ma yin pa'i yul can zhes bya ni chos kyi khyad par te /
analyzed: 'dus pa ma yin pa'i yul can zhes bya ni chos kyi khyad par te /
translated: The phrase having a non-composite object is a distinguishing feature of the property.

original: chos dang gzhi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos dang gzhi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is a common locus for the property and the subject.

original: 'di la mig la sogs pa rgyun brgyud mar 'byung ba de dag ni gzhan gyi don yin no //
analyzed: 'di la mig la sogs pa rgyun brgyud mar 'byung ba de dag ni gzhan gyi don yin no //
translated: In this case, the eye, etc., which occur in a continuous series, are for the sake of another.

original: 'dus pa nyid kyang dus kyi khyad par la mi ltos pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dus pa nyid kyang dus kyi khyad par la mi ltos pa yin te /
translated: And the collection itself does not depend on a particular time.

original: des na rim gyis sam cig car gyis 'dus pa gang yin pa de ni 'dir 'dus pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: des na rim gyis sam cig car gyis 'dus pa gang yin pa de ni 'dir 'dus pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: Therefore, whether the collection is gradual or instantaneous, that is the nature of the collection here.

original: rnam par shes pa yang rim gyis du ma'i rang bzhin yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yang rim gyis du ma'i rang bzhin yin te /
translated: Consciousness also has the nature of being gradual and manifold.

original: des na 'dus pa ma yin pa'i yul can gzhan gyi don ni bdag gi yul can kho na yin no //
analyzed: des na 'dus pa ma yin pa'i yul can gzhan gyi don ni bdag gi yul can kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore, the object of the non-collected consciousness is only the object of the self-consciousness.

original: 'di dag ni 'dus pa ma yin pa'i don 'dus pa ma yin pa'i ched do //
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'dus pa ma yin pa'i don 'dus pa ma yin pa'i ched do //
translated: These are for the sake of the non-collected object that is not collected.

original: ngag 'di la ni 'dus pa ma yin pa nyid chos can mig la sogs pa'i khyad par du nye bar bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: ngag 'di la ni 'dus pa ma yin pa nyid chos can mig la sogs pa'i khyad par du nye bar bzung ba yin no //
translated: In this statement, the non-collectedness is taken as a specific property of the subject, such as the eye, etc.

original: de ltar sgras nye bar gzhag pa las chos dang chos can gyi khyad par rnam par gzhag pa tsam zhig tha dad par zad kyi don ni gcig kho na'o //
analyzed: de ltar sgras nye bar gzhag pa las chos dang chos can gyi khyad par rnam par gzhag pa tsam zhig tha dad par zad kyi don ni gcig kho na'o //
translated: Thus, from the statement, only the mere distinction of the property and the subject is established, but the meaning is only one.

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod bas khyab par chos dang chos can gyi khyad bar du slob dpon bzhed pa yin no zhes bya ba ga las she na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod bas khyab par chos dang chos can gyi khyad bar du slob dpon bzhed pa yin no zhes bya ba ga las she na /
translated: The master [DignƒÅga] asserts that the distinction between the predicate and the subject is pervasion, because it is asserted to be the predicate.

original: skabs su bab pa'i bsgrub bya 'di las don gzhan yin na 'brel ba gang gis ma smras pa'i khyad par smras pa'i bsgrub bya'i chos kyis 'phen par 'gyur ba'i ste /
analyzed: skabs su bab pa'i bsgrub bya 'di las don gzhan yin na 'brel ba gang gis ma smras pa'i khyad par smras pa'i bsgrub bya'i chos kyis 'phen par 'gyur ba'i ste /
translated: If the predicate were something other than the object, then by what relation would the predicate be projected by the stated distinction, which is not stated to be the relation?

original: bsgrub @16b bya nyid du byed par 'gyur ba de dag la 'brel pa ci zhig yod pa de dag med do //
analyzed: bsgrub @16b bya nyid du byed par 'gyur ba de dag la 'brel pa ci zhig yod pa de dag med do //
translated: What relation could there be between those [two] that are not made to be the predicate?

original: chos can gyis de 'phen pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: chos can gyis de 'phen pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the subject projects it,

original: de la rab tu ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la rab tu ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not well established in that [role].

original: sgrub par byed pas kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pas kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it by the proof,

original: de'i don du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i don du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not for that purpose.

original: lhag mar gyur pas smras pa'i bsgrub bya'i chos kyi skabs su bab pa ma yin pa'i chos bsgrub byar byed grang na /
analyzed: lhag mar gyur pas smras pa'i bsgrub bya'i chos kyi skabs su bab pa ma yin pa'i chos bsgrub byar byed grang na /
translated: If the predicate that is stated by the remainder were made into the predicate, it would not be the predicate that is at issue.

original: de yang 'brel ba med pa'i phyir 'phen par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang 'brel ba med pa'i phyir 'phen par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is not a projectory, because it is not related to the object to be established.üîΩFor, it would follow, absurdly, that anything could project anything.üîΩIt follows, absurdly, that all the qualifications that are not relevant to the present context are the object to be established,

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are not different from the object to be established.

original: skabs su bab pa ma yin pa'i khyad par thams cad bsgrub bya nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: skabs su bab pa ma yin pa'i khyad par thams cad bsgrub bya nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If you accept that, then it follows, absurdly, that all phenomena that are not relevant to the present context are the object to be established,

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'gyur mod ce na de ltar yin dang ste /
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro // 'gyur mod ce na de ltar yin dang ste /
translated: because they are not different from the object to be established.

original: skabs su gtogs ba ma yin pa'i chos thams cad bsgrub bya nyid yin dang // gdon mi za bar chos 'ga' zhig bzlog pas khyab pa'i phyir gtan tshigs thams cad 'gal bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: skabs su gtogs ba ma yin pa'i chos thams cad bsgrub bya nyid yin dang // gdon mi za bar chos 'ga' zhig bzlog pas khyab pa'i phyir gtan tshigs thams cad 'gal bar 'gyur la /
translated: It follows that all reasons are contradictory, because it is certain that the refutation of some entails the affirmation of others.

original: dpe thams cad kyang bsgrub par bya bas stong par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dpe thams cad kyang bsgrub par bya bas stong par 'gyur ro //
translated: And it follows that all examples are devoid of the object to be established.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: mthar mthong ba med pa de snyed ni chos can 'gar yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthar mthong ba med pa de snyed ni chos can 'gar yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because, in the end, there is no seeing of anything that is not related to the subject.

original: 'ga' zhig bzlog pas khyab pa dang / 'ga' zhig tu yang bsgrub bya rjes su 'gro ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig bzlog pas khyab pa dang / 'ga' zhig tu yang bsgrub bya rjes su 'gro ba med pa yin no //
translated: It is certain that the refutation of some entails the affirmation of others, and it is certain that there is no relation between the object to be established and some other thing.

original: 'dir ni bsgrub byas stong pas gtan tshigs rjes su 'gro ba the tshom za ba'i phyir ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni bsgrub byas stong pas gtan tshigs rjes su 'gro ba the tshom za ba'i phyir ma nges pa yin no //
translated: Here, the reason is uncertain because there is doubt about the pervasion by the probandum.

original: gtan tshigs dang dpe'i skyon yod pa yin pa de'i phyir gang las kyang bsgrub bya gang yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang dpe'i skyon yod pa yin pa de'i phyir gang las kyang bsgrub bya gang yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And because there is a fault in the reason and example, nothing is understood from anything.

original: smras pa'i chos nyid rjes su 'gro ba med pa yin na skyon 'dir 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: smras pa'i chos nyid rjes su 'gro ba med pa yin na skyon 'dir 'gyur gyi /
translated: If the property of the thesis does not pervade, this fault would occur.

original: chos gzhan rjes su 'gro ba med pa la ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: chos gzhan rjes su 'gro ba med pa la ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But it does not occur if another property does not pervade.

original: de ltar ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: bsgrub bar bya ba nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub bar bya ba nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference in being the probandum.

original: bsgrub bar bya ba'i don 'ga' zhig po gang yin pa de ma tshang bas dpe bsgrub par bya bas stong pa dang / de las bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin na /
analyzed: bsgrub bar bya ba'i don 'ga' zhig po gang yin pa de ma tshang bas dpe bsgrub par bya bas stong pa dang / de las bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin na /
translated: If the meaning of the probandum is incomplete, the example is empty of the probandum, and the reason is contradictory because it proves the opposite.

original: smras pa dang ma smras pa yang bsgrub bya nyid du mtshungs pas na skyon du 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: smras pa dang ma smras pa yang bsgrub bya nyid du mtshungs pas na skyon du 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: Since the stated and unstated are the same in being the probandum, the fault would occur.

original: gzhan yang gal te smras pa nyid la brten nas 'gal bar 'gyur ba yin na /üîΩ'dod pa la gnod par byed pa yang 'gal ba nyid @17a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te smras pa nyid la brten nas 'gal bar 'gyur ba yin na / 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa yang 'gal ba nyid @17a * //
translated: Moreover, if contradiction were to occur in dependence on the statement,

original: du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: du mi 'gyur te /
translated: then the refutation of what is desired would not be contradictory.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir 'gal ba nyid de ni bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa nyid la 'jug pas na gtan tshigs kyis bsgrub par bya ba de las bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'gal ba nyid de ni bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa nyid la 'jug pas na gtan tshigs kyis bsgrub par bya ba de las bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: Because contradiction is the engagement of the opposite of the probandum, and the reason is the characteristic of the proof of the opposite of that probandum.

original: rang bzhin yin pa de'i phyir 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa 'gal ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin yin pa de'i phyir 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa 'gal ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Since that is its nature, therefore the refutation of what is desired would not be contradictory.

original: 'dod pa yang yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pa yang yin te /
translated: And it is desired.

original: de'i phyir ma brjod pa rjes su 'gro ba med pa la yang 'gal ba nyid la sogs pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma brjod pa rjes su 'gro ba med pa la yang 'gal ba nyid la sogs pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, even in the absence of concomitance, the fault of contradiction and so on would occur.

original: skyon gnyis po de'i phyir na /
analyzed: skyon gnyis po de'i phyir na /
translated: Because of those two faults,

original: skabs kyi rten du gyur pa 'dod pa'i chos ni chos dang / chos can gyi khyad par yin no //
analyzed: skabs kyi rten du gyur pa 'dod pa'i chos ni chos dang / chos can gyi khyad par yin no //
translated: the desired phenomenon, which is the basis of the context, is the distinction of the subject and predicate.

original: des ni de la ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: des ni de la ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon 'dod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the fault of non-pervasion is admitted.

original: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis ji skad du gzhan gyi don zhes bya ba 'dir gal te pha rol po bdag gzhan gyi sgras brjod par 'dod na bdag de ni ma grub pa'o zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis ji skad du gzhan gyi don zhes bya ba 'dir gal te pha rol po bdag gzhan gyi sgras brjod par 'dod na bdag de ni ma grub pa'o zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: As Master Vasubandhu said, ‚ÄúHere, if the other is asserted to be expressed by the terms ‚Äòself‚Äô and ‚Äòother,‚Äô it has been explained that that self is not established.

original: ma grub pa yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir de ltar dpe'i chos can la rjes su 'gro ba med par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: ma grub pa yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir de ltar dpe'i chos can la rjes su 'gro ba med par brjod pa yin no //
translated: Because it is asserted that even what is not established is to be established, thus it is said that there is no pervasion in the example subject.

original: des na thams cad bsgrub byas stong pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na thams cad bsgrub byas stong pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, not everything is empty of the probandum.

original: 'gal ba'i chos kyang skabs su bab pa'i 'dod pa de nyid la gnod pa byas pa yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs thams cad 'gal bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i chos kyang skabs su bab pa'i 'dod pa de nyid la gnod pa byas pa yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs thams cad 'gal bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Also, contradictory properties are not all contradictory reasons, because in the present context, the asserted property is harmed.

original: skabs su bab pa ma yin pa'i khyad par bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: skabs su bab pa ma yin pa'i khyad par bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only is the particular not established in the present context,üîΩbut also:

original: ma brjod pa'i phyir gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa la skabs su bab pa yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no zhe na ;
analyzed: ma brjod pa'i phyir gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa la skabs su bab pa yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no zhe na ;
translated: And since it is not stated, it is not to be established in the context of inference for the sake of others.

original: gang la bdag med pa smra ba dang 'gal ba bdag yod par smra ba rgyu mtshan du byas nas yod par dam bcas pa grub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang la bdag med pa smra ba dang 'gal ba bdag yod par smra ba rgyu mtshan du byas nas yod par dam bcas pa grub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the reason is stated in order to establish the thesis of existence, which is contrary to the statement of selflessness.

original: sgrub par byed pa bkod pa sgrub par byed pa bkod pa'i rten du 'gyur ba de gal te bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa bkod pa sgrub par byed pa bkod pa'i rten du 'gyur ba de gal te bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If the statement of the proof is not to be established, then it would not be the basis of the statement of the proof.

original: 'ga' yang bsgrub par bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'ga' yang bsgrub par bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Then nothing would be established.

original: de lta yin na zhes smras pa tsam zhig bsgrub bya yin na phyin ci log tu grub pa'am /
analyzed: de lta yin na zhes smras pa tsam zhig bsgrub bya yin na phyin ci log tu grub pa'am /
translated: If that were so, then if the mere statement ‚ÄúIt is thus‚Äù were what is to be established, it would be established in a wrong way,

original: sgrub par byed pa don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: or the proof would be pointless.

original: phyin ci log tu grub pa bshad pa /
analyzed: phyin ci log tu grub pa bshad pa /
translated: The establishment in a wrong way is explained:

original: ming gi sgra ni ming can dang 'brel ba'i sngon rol nas don dang ldan pa nyid ni bsgrub par @17b bya ba'o //
analyzed: ming gi sgra ni ming can dang 'brel ba'i sngon rol nas don dang ldan pa nyid ni bsgrub par @17b bya ba'o //
translated: The mere sound of the name, prior to the connection with the one who has the name, is what is to be established as having the meaning.

original: rnam par dbye ba dang ldan par mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes pa ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba dang ldan par mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes pa ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: The reason is because it is seen to be associated with a distinction.

original: dpe ni phyi rol gyi don rnams dbye ba'i mtha' can gyi sgra yin no //
analyzed: dpe ni phyi rol gyi don rnams dbye ba'i mtha' can gyi sgra yin no //
translated: The example is the word that has a distinction in external objects.

original: 'di la bye brag tu bshad par smra ba dag ni dper na 'gro ba'i phyir ba lang zhes rigs kyi sgra bya ba'i rgyu mtshan yin pa de bzhin du ming gi sgra yang lha rnams kyis byin pas lhas byin no zhes 'chad do //
analyzed: 'di la bye brag tu bshad par smra ba dag ni dper na 'gro ba'i phyir ba lang zhes rigs kyi sgra bya ba'i rgyu mtshan yin pa de bzhin du ming gi sgra yang lha rnams kyis byin pas lhas byin no zhes 'chad do //
translated: Here, the VaibhƒÅ·π£ikas say that just as the word ‚Äúcow‚Äù is the reason for the action of going, in the same way, the word ‚Äúname‚Äù is Devadatta because it is given by the gods.

original: bye brag tu bshad ba ma yin par smra ba dag ni ming gis sgra ming can dang 'brel ba'i sngon rol du rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis mthar thug par 'dod do //
analyzed: bye brag tu bshad ba ma yin par smra ba dag ni ming gis sgra ming can dang 'brel ba'i sngon rol du rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis mthar thug par 'dod do //
translated: Those who do not speak of the Abhidharma say that the word ‚Äúname‚Äù is related to the word ‚Äúname-bearer‚Äù and is accepted to end with its own nature alone.

original: de la pha rol ni phyi rol gyi don grub kyi rang gi ngo bo tsam ni ma yin no//
analyzed: de la pha rol ni phyi rol gyi don grub kyi rang gi ngo bo tsam ni ma yin no//
translated: In that case, the external object is established, but not its own nature alone.

original: don tsam zhig smras kyi bye brag ni ma smras te /
analyzed: don tsam zhig smras kyi bye brag ni ma smras te /
translated: Only the object is stated, but not the distinction.

original: des ni sgra'i ngo bo rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis don dang ldan par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: des ni sgra'i ngo bo rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis don dang ldan par mi 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, the nature of sound does not have meaning by its own nature alone.

original: rnam par dbye ba mthong bas don dang ldan pa yang yin pa de'i phyir na phyi rol gyi don nyid kyis don dang ldan par bye brag tu bshad pa yin par smra ba mi 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba mthong bas don dang ldan pa yang yin pa de'i phyir na phyi rol gyi don nyid kyis don dang ldan par bye brag tu bshad pa yin par smra ba mi 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: But since one sees a division, it does have meaning. Therefore, it is established that the opponent does not accept that the meaningfulness of words is due to external objects.üîΩIf the mere statement were to be established, it would be pointless.

original: smras pa tsam bsgrub par bya ba yin na 'bras bu med par 'gyur bas bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /üîΩ'dus pa nyid kyi phyir gzhan gyi don grub kyang bdag gis don mi rtogs so //
analyzed: smras pa tsam bsgrub par bya ba yin na 'bras bu med par 'gyur bas bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa / 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir gzhan gyi don grub kyang bdag gis don mi rtogs so //
translated: To show this, the treatise states:üîΩEven when one accomplishes the purpose of others, one does not realize one‚Äôs own purpose, because of the very fact of their being a collection.

original: gzhan gyi don tsam khyad par med pa khyad par dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyi don nye bar bzung ba na bdag gi don gyis rtogs pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don tsam khyad par med pa khyad par dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyi don nye bar bzung ba na bdag gi don gyis rtogs pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: When one takes up the meaning that is the nature free from distinctions, the mere purpose of others, one does not realize one‚Äôs own purpose.

original: gal te bdag gi don ma yin na ji ltar gzhan gyi don du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te bdag gi don ma yin na ji ltar gzhan gyi don du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is not one‚Äôs own purpose, how can it be the purpose of others?

original: de dag 'dus pa gzhan rnam par shes pa'i don byed par ni khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag 'dus pa gzhan rnam par shes pa'i don byed par ni khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is accepted that the other collections of consciousness perform the function of self.

original: bdag gi don gyi mtshan nyid kyis gzhan gyi don las tha dad par 'gyur ba'i gzhan gyi don ni 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bdag gi don gyi mtshan nyid kyis gzhan gyi don las tha dad par 'gyur ba'i gzhan gyi don ni 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The other, the object of the other, is accepted as different from the object of self, by the characteristic of the object of self.

original: rgol ba la phyin ci log tu grub pa ni med kyi /
analyzed: rgol ba la phyin ci log tu grub pa ni med kyi /
translated: There is no establishment of the opponent as mistaken,

original: 'on kyang sgrub par byed pa 'bras bu med pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang sgrub par byed pa 'bras bu med pa yin no //
translated: but rather the proof is fruitless.

original: mi 'dod pa dang sgrub par byed pa 'bras bu med pa'i phyir na skabs su bab pa yin bsam smras kyang 'dod pas khyab ba'i chos ni bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: mi 'dod pa dang sgrub par byed pa 'bras bu med pa'i phyir na skabs su bab pa yin bsam smras kyang 'dod pas khyab ba'i chos ni bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
translated: Because of the non-acceptance and the fruitless proof, the case is appropriate, although it is said to be pervaded by acceptance. The probandum is the property to be established.

original: de ma tshang ba la sogs pa gang dag yin pa dang / de phyin ci log tu grub pa la sogs pa yang dpe la sogs pa'i nyes pa yin na //
analyzed: de ma tshang ba la sogs pa gang dag yin pa dang / de phyin ci log tu grub pa la sogs pa yang dpe la sogs pa'i nyes pa yin na //
translated: And those which are incomplete, etc., and those which are established as mistaken, etc., are the faults of the example, etc.

original: de ma tshang ba ni dpe'i skyon yin la /
analyzed: de ma tshang ba ni dpe'i skyon yin la /
translated: The incompleteness is a fault of the example.

original: @18a * // de phyin ci log tu sgrub pa ni 'gal ba ste /
analyzed: @18a * // de phyin ci log tu sgrub pa ni 'gal ba ste /
translated: The establishment of the opposite is contradictory.

original: gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin no //
translated: It is a fault of the reason.

original: 'dod pa bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes par 'gyur ba bstan pa 'dis ni gnyis pa dang bcas pa sgrub pa la tshu rol mdzes pa bas gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba byas pa gang yin pa de rnams la
analyzed: 'dod pa bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes par 'gyur ba bstan pa 'dis ni gnyis pa dang bcas pa sgrub pa la tshu rol mdzes pa bas gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba byas pa gang yin pa de rnams la
translated: This explanation of the error of non-pervasion due to the reason that the desired object is to be established shows that

original: yang rjes su 'gro ba med par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: yang rjes su 'gro ba med par bshad pa yin no //
translated: the syllogisms employed by the Lokayatikas in their proof of the existence of the second fact are also explained to be non-pervasive.

original: de rnams la sbyor ba gcig bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de rnams la sbyor ba gcig bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to demonstrate one of those syllogisms, the treatise states the following:

original: mngon par gsal ba ste gsal ba'i rang bzhin du rnam par gnas pa'i sems can gyi lus gang yin pa de'i mtshan nyid de rang bzhin gang la yod pa'i skyes bu'o //üîΩde dang bum pa de dag las gang yang rung bas gnyis pa dang bcas pa ste zla bo dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par gsal ba ste gsal ba'i rang bzhin du rnam par gnas pa'i sems can gyi lus gang yin pa de'i mtshan nyid de rang bzhin gang la yod pa'i skyes bu'o // de dang bum pa de dag las gang yang rung bas gnyis pa dang bcas pa ste zla bo dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The body of a sentient being that exists as the nature of manifestation, that is, as the nature of clarity, is the subject.üîΩEither that or a pot is the second fact, that is, the counterpart.

original: bum pa ni gang yang rung bas gnyis pa dang bcas par bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bum pa ni gang yang rung bas gnyis pa dang bcas par bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: Either that or a pot is to be established as the second fact, that is, as having a counterpart.

original: autpala ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: autpala ma yin pa ste /
translated: The subject is not a lotus.

original: autpala las gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi don to //
analyzed: autpala las gzhan yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi don to //
translated: The meaning of the reason is ‚Äúbecause it is other than a lotus.‚Äù

original: dngos po med pa nam mkha' la sogs pa gang las bum pa dang skyes bu gang yang rung ba'i gnyis pa dang bcas pa ldog pa de nyid las dngos po'i rang bzhin autpala ma yin pa nyid kyang log pa yin la /
analyzed: dngos po med pa nam mkha' la sogs pa gang las bum pa dang skyes bu gang yang rung ba'i gnyis pa dang bcas pa ldog pa de nyid las dngos po'i rang bzhin autpala ma yin pa nyid kyang log pa yin la /
translated: In the case of non-entities such as space, etc., the exclusion of a pot or any other thing is the same as the exclusion of the nature of an entity, i.e., non-lotusness.

original: rtsig pa la ni gnyi ga yang yod pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang grub pa yin la /
analyzed: rtsig pa la ni gnyi ga yang yod pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang grub pa yin la /
translated: In the case of a wall, both are present, and so the pervasion and exclusion are established.

original: autpala ma yin pa nyid phyogs kyi chos yin no //
analyzed: autpala ma yin pa nyid phyogs kyi chos yin no //
translated: Non-lotusness is the property of the subject.

original: spyir gnyis pa dang bcas pas ni khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: spyir gnyis pa dang bcas pas ni khyab pa yin te /
translated: In general, the pervasion is by the presence of a second.

original: des na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa med cing bum ba nyid ni bum pa nyid pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir shugs kyis de lta bur gyur pa'i skyes bur 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba de la /
analyzed: des na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa med cing bum ba nyid ni bum pa nyid pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir shugs kyis de lta bur gyur pa'i skyes bur 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba de la /
translated: Therefore, there is no fault of non-pervasion. Since a pot is present with a pot, by implication, a person of that sort is present.

original: 'dir rtsig pa ni gang gi phyir de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba 'dod pa mngon par bsal ba'i sems pa can gyis gnyis pa dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir rtsig pa ni gang gi phyir de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba 'dod pa mngon par bsal ba'i sems pa can gyis gnyis pa dang bcas pa ste /
translated: Here, ‚Äúwall‚Äù is a second term that is asserted by one who has a mind that is intent on revealing his desire.

original: don gzhan dang ldan par ma grub pa de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba bzhin no //
analyzed: don gzhan dang ldan par ma grub pa de'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba bzhin no //
translated: Since it is not established as having a different meaning, the error of non-pervasion would ensue.

original: 'on te spyir spyi dang ldan pa'i gnyis pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on te spyir spyi dang ldan pa'i gnyis pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: But if the second term is established as generally possessing a universal,

original: skyes bur grub pa'i gnyis pa dang bcas pa zhes khyad par 'phen pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: skyes bur grub pa'i gnyis pa dang bcas pa zhes khyad par 'phen pa yin no zhe na /
translated: then the qualifier ‚Äúestablished as a person‚Äù is superfluous.

original: khyad bar mi 'phen @18b na sgrub par byed pa'i 'bras bu cung zad kyang med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: khyad bar mi 'phen @18b na sgrub par byed pa'i 'bras bu cung zad kyang med par 'gyur te /
translated: If the qualifier is not added, then the proof would have no effect whatsoever,

original: gang gi phyir 'ga' zhig gis gnyis pa dang bcas par ni grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'ga' zhig gis gnyis pa dang bcas par ni grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because someone has already established the second term.

original: yang na ni mi 'dod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dpe la bum pa 'ba' zhig gis gnyis pa dang bcas par grub pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar bum pa 'ba' zhig gis gnyis pa dang bcas par ni 'gal ba'i phyir mi 'dod par 'gyur ba
analyzed: yang na ni mi 'dod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dpe la bum pa 'ba' zhig gis gnyis pa dang bcas par grub pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar bum pa 'ba' zhig gis gnyis pa dang bcas par ni 'gal ba'i phyir mi 'dod par 'gyur ba
translated: Just as a pot alone is established as having a second, in the same way, a pot alone is not accepted as having a second, because it is contradictory.

original: yin no // khyad par mi 'phen na skyon gzhan yang bstan pa'i phyir gal te zhes smos te /
analyzed: yin no // khyad par mi 'phen na skyon gzhan yang bstan pa'i phyir gal te zhes smos te /
translated: If a particular is not projected, another error is shown, so ‚Äúif‚Äù is stated.

original: skyes bu'i khyad par can gyi gnyis pa dang bcas pa de gtan tshigs kyi yul du byas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skyes bu'i khyad par can gyi gnyis pa dang bcas pa de gtan tshigs kyi yul du byas pa ma yin te /
translated: A particular person who has a second is not taken as the domain of the reason.

original: byed pa'i gzhir ma byas pa ma yin na ji ltar gtan tshigs des de 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: byed pa'i gzhir ma byas pa ma yin na ji ltar gtan tshigs des de 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: If it is not taken as the basis of the action, how could that be established by that reason?

original: gtan tshigs 'di ni de'i don du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'di ni de'i don du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because this reason is not for that purpose.

original: ci ste gtan tshigs 'di las bsgrub bya de 'grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs 'di yin na /
analyzed: ci ste gtan tshigs 'di las bsgrub bya de 'grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs 'di yin na /
translated: But if this position is taken, that the probandum is established from this reason,

original: 'o na ji ltar 'grub pa de yul ma yin /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar 'grub pa de yul ma yin /
translated: then how could that which is established not be the domain?

original: gang las grub pa de nyid ni gtan tshigs de'i yul yin no //
analyzed: gang las grub pa de nyid ni gtan tshigs de'i yul yin no //
translated: The very thing from which it is established is the domain of that reason.

original: yul yin du chug mod ce na /
analyzed: yul yin du chug mod ce na /
translated: Even if it is the domain, what is the problem?

original: yul yin no zhe na ni rang la brten pa zhes bya ba dag nyid dang 'brel ba las gyur pa'i nyes pa'i rnam pa nyes pa'i bye brag ji ltar bdag gir mi byed /
analyzed: yul yin no zhe na ni rang la brten pa zhes bya ba dag nyid dang 'brel ba las gyur pa'i nyes pa'i rnam pa nyes pa'i bye brag ji ltar bdag gir mi byed /
translated: If it is the domain, then why not accept the fault that is a type of fault that arises from the connection called ‚Äúbased on itself‚Äù?

original: sgrub par byed pa'i skyon la la ni rang la brten pa yin te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i skyon la la ni rang la brten pa yin te /
translated: Some faults of the proof are based on itself.

original: dper na phyogs kyi chos la brten pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na phyogs kyi chos la brten pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the property of the subject being based on itself.

original: la la ni bsgrub par bya ba la ni ltos pa yin te /
analyzed: la la ni bsgrub par bya ba la ni ltos pa yin te /
translated: Some are based on the probandum.

original: dper na rjes su 'gro ba med pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dper na rjes su 'gro ba med pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: For example, it is like the absence of pervasion, etc.

original: bdag nyid la brten pa de ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi nye bar sdud pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid la brten pa de ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi nye bar sdud pa yin no //
translated: That which is based on itself is the inclusion of the probandum.

original: de ni 'dir shugs kyis bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi sgras nye bar zin pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'dir shugs kyis bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi sgras nye bar zin pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, that is established implicitly, but not explicitly by the words,

original: sgras zin pa ni spyi yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgras zin pa ni spyi yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because what is explicitly stated by the words is a universal.

original: sun 'byin pa nye bar 'god pa ni gang zhig sgras zin pa'i don de'i yul can yin la khyad par ni don gyis grub pa yin pa des na sun dbyung bar bya ba ma yin no zhe na /üîΩbshad pa / rgol ba des de la brten pa zhes bya ba skyes bur gyur ba'i gnyis pa la brten pa'i grub pa nges pa ni grub par byed pa las rnyed pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur zhing phyir rgol ba gzhan sun @19a * //
analyzed: sun 'byin pa nye bar 'god pa ni gang zhig sgras zin pa'i don de'i yul can yin la khyad par ni don gyis grub pa yin pa des na sun dbyung bar bya ba ma yin no zhe na / bshad pa / rgol ba des de la brten pa zhes bya ba skyes bur gyur ba'i gnyis pa la brten pa'i grub pa nges pa ni grub par byed pa las rnyed pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur zhing phyir rgol ba gzhan sun @19a * //
translated: The response is: The one who is the object of the literal meaning is the person who is the basis of that, and the distinction is established by the meaning. Therefore, it is not to be refuted.

original: 'byin ba ni mi 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: 'byin ba ni mi 'thob pa ste /
translated: The opponent says: The one who is the basis of that is the person who is the basis of the second, and the establishment of the ascertainment is obtained from the proof, called ‚Äúacquisition.‚Äù The refutation of other opponents is not obtained.

original: sgras zin pa'i don des sun dbyung bar bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: sgras zin pa'i don des sun dbyung bar bya ba yin gyi /
translated: The literal meaning is to be refuted.

original: de ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rigs can ni gsal bar rgyal po'i grangs rigs pa'i brtag pa dang bral bar nan gyis rnam par 'jog pa yin na /
analyzed: de ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rigs can ni gsal bar rgyal po'i grangs rigs pa'i brtag pa dang bral bar nan gyis rnam par 'jog pa yin na /
translated: That is not so. Such a type is clearly and forcefully posited without the analysis of the reasoning of the king‚Äôs enumeration.

original: 'di ni rigs pa'i grangs yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni rigs pa'i grangs yin no //
translated: This is the enumeration of reasoning.

original: 'dir sgrub par byed pas grub par byed par 'dod pa'i don de nyid sun 'byin par byed pas grub pa bzlog par bya ba yin te /üîΩdes na sgrub par byed pa dang 'brel ba'i yul gang ji snyed pa de thams cad ni sun 'byin pa dang 'brel pa de grub pa'i gegs kyi yul yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'dir sgrub par byed pas grub par byed par 'dod pa'i don de nyid sun 'byin par byed pas grub pa bzlog par bya ba yin te / des na sgrub par byed pa dang 'brel ba'i yul gang ji snyed pa de thams cad ni sun 'byin pa dang 'brel pa de grub pa'i gegs kyi yul yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: Here, the object that is to be established by the proof is the object that is to be refuted by the refutation.üîΩTherefore, all the objects that are related to the proof are objects that are related to the refutation and are to be refuted.

original: des na go bar byed pa nyid kyi nus pas yul du byas pa'o //
analyzed: des na go bar byed pa nyid kyi nus pas yul du byas pa'o //
translated: Thus, the objects that are related to the refutation are objects that are related to the proof.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: grub pa 'phen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grub pa 'phen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the refutation implies the proof.

original: don gang zhig gi grub pa sgrub par byed pa gang gis 'phen pa'i don gyi rnam pa ste /üîΩdon gyi bye brag dang don gyi dbye ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad ni sgrub par byed pa de'i sun 'byin pa'i nus pas khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: don gang zhig gi grub pa sgrub par byed pa gang gis 'phen pa'i don gyi rnam pa ste / don gyi bye brag dang don gyi dbye ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad ni sgrub par byed pa de'i sun 'byin pa'i nus pas khyab pa yin no //
translated: The form of the object that is implied by the proof of the object that is to be established isüîΩthe particular object and the division of the object. All of those are pervaded by the refutation of the proof.

original: don gyi rnam pa de'i grub pa'i gegs yin pa'i phyir don de thams cad khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa de'i grub pa'i gegs yin pa'i phyir don de thams cad khyab pa yin te /
translated: Because the form of the object is an obstruction to the establishment of the object, all of those objects are pervaded.

original: de'i phyir sgras zin pa'i don 'ba' zhig ni des sun dbyung bar bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgras zin pa'i don 'ba' zhig ni des sun dbyung bar bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the mere literal meaning is not to be refuted by that.

original: 'on kyang don ji snyed shugs kyis grub pas sgrub par byed pas bsgrub par bya ba de thams cad sun dbyung bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang don ji snyed shugs kyis grub pas sgrub par byed pas bsgrub par bya ba de thams cad sun dbyung bar bya ba yin no //
translated: However, since the extent of the meaning is established by implication, all of that which is to be established is to be refuted.

original: des na khyad par 'phen na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon yin no //
analyzed: des na khyad par 'phen na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon yin no //
translated: Therefore, if a distinction is implied, the fault of not being concomitant is incurred.

original: smras pa tsam zhig sgrub na sgrub pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: smras pa tsam zhig sgrub na sgrub pa nyid yin la /
translated: If one establishes mere utterance, it is indeed an establishment.

original: dpe la mthong ba'i bum pas gnyis pa dang bcas par sgrub na ni 'dod par thal ba yin no //
analyzed: dpe la mthong ba'i bum pas gnyis pa dang bcas par sgrub na ni 'dod par thal ba yin no //
translated: If one establishes the second as being with a seen pot as an example, then it follows that it is accepted.

original: gzhan yang spyir sgrub na grub pa la sgrub po zhes ni bshad pa yin mod kyi yul 'dir ni spyir yang bsgrub par bya bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang spyir sgrub na grub pa la sgrub po zhes ni bshad pa yin mod kyi yul 'dir ni spyir yang bsgrub par bya bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: Moreover, although it is indeed explained that in general, an establishment is an establishment of what is established, in this context, it is taught that even in general, it is not to be established.

original: rnam pa de lta bu mngon par gsal ba'i sems pa can bum pa las don gzhan gyi ngo bo gzhan nyid du khas mi len na spyir yang gnyis pa nyid mi 'grub po //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu mngon par gsal ba'i sems pa can bum pa las don gzhan gyi ngo bo gzhan nyid du khas mi len na spyir yang gnyis pa nyid mi 'grub po //
translated: If one does not accept that the nature of a pot is different from the pot, which is the entity that is clearly manifest in that way, then in general, a second thing is not established.

original: gal te lus don gzhan ma yin mod /
analyzed: gal te lus don gzhan ma yin mod /
translated: If the body is not different from the pot,

original: de lta na yang ji ltar spyi bsgrub byar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na yang ji ltar spyi bsgrub byar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: then how can the universal be the object to be established?

original: gang yang rung ba'i don gzhan gyi ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba'i don gzhan gyi ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not have the nature of any other object.

original: mdor bzhag pa'i @19b tshig 'di nyid rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: mdor bzhag pa'i @19b tshig 'di nyid rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to explain this very statement of the summary, he says:

original: gnyi ga de lta bu'i dngos po ste don gzhan gyi dngos por srid pa yin na /
analyzed: gnyi ga de lta bu'i dngos po ste don gzhan gyi dngos por srid pa yin na /
translated: If both were possible as entities, that is, as different objects,

original: gang yang rung ba'i sgra don 'brel bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba'i sgra don 'brel bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: then the word ‚Äúeither‚Äù would be related to the object.

original: gang yang rung ba ni sgra ni gcig tu ma des bar gnyi ga brjod pa yin pas lus gnyis pa ma yin na ni nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba ni sgra ni gcig tu ma des bar gnyi ga brjod pa yin pas lus gnyis pa ma yin na ni nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Since the word ‚Äúeither‚Äù expresses both, if the body were not a second thing, it would not be possible.

original: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: For example, he says:

original: lha sbyin dang mchod sbyin gnyi ga la yang za ba'i bsgrub pa srid na ni gcig tu ma nges par brjod pa de'i phyir gang yang rung ba brjod pa don dang 'brel bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: lha sbyin dang mchod sbyin gnyi ga la yang za ba'i bsgrub pa srid na ni gcig tu ma nges par brjod pa de'i phyir gang yang rung ba brjod pa don dang 'brel bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: If it were possible for both Devadatta and Yaj√±adatta to be the probandum, then the expression ‚Äúeither one‚Äù would not be definite. Therefore, either one would be related to the meaning.

original: rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig las gcig za bar mi srid pa'am /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig las gcig za bar mi srid pa'am /
translated: But it is not possible for either one to be the probandum due to some reason.

original: gang yang rung ba gcig za ba la smra ba po'i 'dod pa med na ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba gcig za ba la smra ba po'i 'dod pa med na ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that the speaker does not intend either one to be the probandum.

original: de'i phyir 'dis ni rjes su 'gro ba'i dus na phyir rgol ba las gang yang rung bas gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid ma grub pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dis ni rjes su 'gro ba'i dus na phyir rgol ba las gang yang rung bas gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid ma grub pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, this shows that when there is pervasion, it is not established that either one has a second in relation to the opponent.

original: des na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir spyi bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir spyi bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: Thus, because there is no pervasion, the universal is not the probandum.

original: da ni rgol ba bsgrub bar bya ba'i chos can la gang yang rung bas gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid du mi 'dod pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: da ni rgol ba bsgrub bar bya ba'i chos can la gang yang rung bas gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid du mi 'dod pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: Now, in order to show that the proponent does not assert that the subject of the probandum has a second in relation to either one, he says:

original: gtan tshigs 'di las kyang gang yang rung ba'i don gzhan gyi ngo bo mi 'thad do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'di las kyang gang yang rung ba'i don gzhan gyi ngo bo mi 'thad do //
translated: For this reason, too, it is not tenable that anything is an entity that is different from something else.

original: gang las she na bum pa rang nyid kyis te bdag nyid kyi don gzhan nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang las she na bum pa rang nyid kyis te bdag nyid kyi don gzhan nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: From what? From the pot itself, because the pot itself is accepted as being different from itself.

original: khas len na ni 'gal lo zhes bshad pa ni 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: khas len na ni 'gal lo zhes bshad pa ni 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: If it is accepted, then there is a contradiction. The contradiction is stated in the line ‚Äúbecause of contradiction.‚Äù

original: ji ltar khas ma blangs she na bum pa las bum pa don gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar khas ma blangs she na bum pa las bum pa don gzhan ma yin no //
translated: How is it accepted? The pot is not different from the pot.

original: de'i phyir lus nyid don gzhan du gyur pa yin no zhes gnyis pa nyid kyi dag gi don du nges par rnam par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir lus nyid don gzhan du gyur pa yin no zhes gnyis pa nyid kyi dag gi don du nges par rnam par gnas pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the body itself is different from itself. Thus, the meaning of the second line is definitely established.

original: des na gang gi phyir spyi bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur gyi gang yang rung bas gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: des na gang gi phyir spyi bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur gyi gang yang rung bas gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the general statement is established, but the specific statement is not established.

original: des na spyi brjod pa can gang yang rung ba smos pa ni don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na spyi brjod pa can gang yang rung ba smos pa ni don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the general statement is meaningless.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gang yang rung bas gnyis pa nyid du khas len cing de'i don gang yang rung ba smos pa yin na 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ni tshu rol mdzes @20a * //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gang yang rung bas gnyis pa nyid du khas len cing de'i don gang yang rung ba smos pa yin na 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ni tshu rol mdzes @20a * //
translated: Otherwise, if one accepts that it is either of the two, and if one states that the meaning of either is the meaning of the other, then there would be a contradiction.üîΩ

original: pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i tshig 'di 'gal bar te gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i tshig 'di 'gal bar te gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, then if one were to accept that the second is any one of those, and if one were to state that the meaning of any one of those is contradictory, then this statement of the thesis of the one who is beautiful in his own way would be contradictory, that is, it would be undermined.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?üîΩNƒÅgƒÅrjuna explains:

original: bshad pa / bum pa bdag nyid kyi rang gi ngo bos ni zlar 'gal ba'i de'i ngo bo bum pa nyid dang don gzhan du gyur pa de dag ni 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / bum pa bdag nyid kyi rang gi ngo bos ni zlar 'gal ba'i de'i ngo bo bum pa nyid dang don gzhan du gyur pa de dag ni 'gal ba yin no //
translated: A vase is not contradictory with itself, but those that are a different object than the vase‚Äôs own entity, which is contradictory with that entity, are contradictory.

original: gal te bum pa de nyid la bum pa de nyid gnyis pa yin na de'i tshe bum pa yang yin la gzhan yang yin par 'gyur na de ni bdag nyid gcig la 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te bum pa de nyid la bum pa de nyid gnyis pa yin na de'i tshe bum pa yang yin la gzhan yang yin par 'gyur na de ni bdag nyid gcig la 'gal ba yin no //
translated: If that very vase were a second vase, then at that time it would be a vase and also different. But that is contradictory in a single entity.

original: ji ltar dag 'di las 'gal ba'i don 'di rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar dag 'di las 'gal ba'i don 'di rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: How could the meaning of this contradiction be understood?

original: gang gi phyir shugs kyi lus nyid kyis bum pa gnyis pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir shugs kyi lus nyid kyis bum pa gnyis pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the body itself is by nature concomitant with a second pot.

original: bshad pa / gal te 'di lus nyid kyi don gzhan nyid du brjod par 'dod na'o //
analyzed: bshad pa / gal te 'di lus nyid kyi don gzhan nyid du brjod par 'dod na'o //
translated: NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds: If you assert that the body itself is a different object.

original: de skad du zhes bya ba ni don gzhan du'o //
analyzed: de skad du zhes bya ba ni don gzhan du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThus‚Äù means as a different object.

original: gang yang rung ba'i sgras ni lus nyid yin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang yang rung ba'i sgras ni lus nyid yin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: The word ‚Äúor‚Äù means that the body itself is not.

original: 'on kyang bum pa yang der zhes bya ba don gzhan gyi ngo bor des 'dod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on kyang bum pa yang der zhes bya ba don gzhan gyi ngo bor des 'dod par 'gyur te /
translated: However, the pot is also that, which is to say that you assert that it is a different object.

original: de'i phyir 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore it is contradictory.

original: 'di'i phyir yang zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs gzhan gyis kyang gnyis pa nyid spyi la brten pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i phyir yang zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs gzhan gyis kyang gnyis pa nyid spyi la brten pa ma yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúFor this reason‚Äù is another reason that a second pot does not depend on a universal.

original: sngar ni bum pa dang skyes bu tshogs pa dpe dang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can las don gzhan ma yin pa de'i phyir spyi bsgrub byar med par bshad pa yin la /
analyzed: sngar ni bum pa dang skyes bu tshogs pa dpe dang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can las don gzhan ma yin pa de'i phyir spyi bsgrub byar med par bshad pa yin la /
translated: Previously, the collection of a pot and a person was not a different object from the example and the subject of the probandum. Therefore it was explained that a universal is not the probandum.

original: da lta ni bum pa'am skyes bu so sor yang gnyis pa ma yin pa de na spyi la brten pa ma yin te /
analyzed: da lta ni bum pa'am skyes bu so sor yang gnyis pa ma yin pa de na spyi la brten pa ma yin te /
translated: Now, the universal of duality does not depend on individual vases or individual persons,

original: gsal ba thams cad yod par mi srid na de'i spyi mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba thams cad yod par mi srid na de'i spyi mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not possible for all the manifestations to exist, and therefore their universal is untenable.

original: 'di la bum par gyur pa dang skyes bur gyur pa gnyis nyid kyi khyad par med pa'i phyir gnyis pa nyid kyi spyi mi 'thad pa yin no //üîΩ'di la dpe ni dper na bram ze la sogs pa nyid ma yin pa bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs gzhi med pa'i gsal ba 'ba' zhig ba'i rigs nyid med pa dang rtog pa'i shes bzhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa la dbang
analyzed: 'di la bum par gyur pa dang skyes bur gyur pa gnyis nyid kyi khyad par med pa'i phyir gnyis pa nyid kyi spyi mi 'thad pa yin no // 'di la dpe ni dper na bram ze la sogs pa nyid ma yin pa bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs gzhi med pa'i gsal ba 'ba' zhig ba'i rigs nyid med pa dang rtog pa'i shes bzhes bya ba rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa la dbang
translated: Here, the universal of duality is untenable because there is no difference between the two, the vase and the person.

original: po la brten pa nyid med pa bzhin no //
analyzed: po la brten pa nyid med pa bzhin no //
translated: The example for this is like the universal of non-brahmin and so on, the universal of non-brahmin and so on, which is the basis of the non-existence of the class of brahmin and so on, and the mere manifestation without a universal, and the conceptual consciousness, the consciousness with conceptualization, which does not have the faculty as its basis.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: 'di ltar rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa de mig la brten ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa de mig la brten ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Thus, that conceptual consciousness is not based on the eye,

original: de'i zhes bya ba mig gi shes pa bzhin du de'i don rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba mig gi shes pa bzhin du de'i don rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because, like the eye consciousness, it does not cognize its object.

original: mig la brten pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs so sor @20b rig pa yin na /
analyzed: mig la brten pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs so sor @20b rig pa yin na /
translated: If it is said that the so-called consciousness that has the eye as its basis is the cognizer of form,

original: rnam par rtog pa gzung ba ni gzugs ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa gzung ba ni gzugs ma yin te /
translated: then the conceptual thought that apprehends form is not form,

original: de ni rnam ba gzhan du mig gi rnam par shes pas 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rnam ba gzhan du mig gi rnam par shes pas 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is apprehended by the eye consciousness in a different way.

original: 'di'i phyir yang de mig gis gzung bar bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i phyir yang de mig gis gzung bar bya ba ma yin te /
translated: For this reason also, it is not apprehended by the eye,

original: mig de 'gyur ba'i rjes su mi byed ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mig de 'gyur ba'i rjes su mi byed ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not follow the changes of the eye.

original: gang zhig gang la brten pa zhes bya ba de ni 'gyur ba'i rjes su byed pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la brten pa zhes bya ba de ni 'gyur ba'i rjes su byed pa yin te /
translated: That which is said to have a basis follows the changes of that basis,

original: dper na mthong ba'i mig gi rnam par shes ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mthong ba'i mig gi rnam par shes ba bzhin no //
translated: just as the eye consciousness that sees follows the changes of the eye.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa 'di ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa 'di ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: But the conceptual thought consciousness is not like that.

original: gzhan yang gang zhig gang gi 'bras bu yin pa de de la brten par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang gang zhig gang gi 'bras bu yin pa de de la brten par brjod pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, that which is the effect of something is said to have that as its basis.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa ni mig gi 'bras bu ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa ni mig gi 'bras bu ma yin te /
translated: The conceptual consciousness is not the eye itself.üîΩ

original: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa ni mig de med kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa ni mig de med kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The conceptual cognition is not the eye, because the conceptual cognition exists even when the eye does not exist.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba gtan tshigs gsum po 'di nyid kyis na rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa de rna ba la sogs pa la brten pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba gtan tshigs gsum po 'di nyid kyis na rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa de rna ba la sogs pa la brten pa yang ma yin te /
