original: 'di ni grub pa kho na ste /
analyzed: 'di ni grub pa kho na ste /
translated: This is established.

original: 'di lta ste bstan bcos las mthong ba bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste bstan bcos las mthong ba bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: For example, the treatise states, ‚ÄúThe visible is to be established.‚Äù

original: bstan bcos las mthong ba de la gnod na yang ste /
analyzed: bstan bcos las mthong ba de la gnod na yang ste /
translated: If the visible is harmed by the treatise,

original: bstan bcos kyi don thams cad bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos kyi don thams cad bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then all the meanings of the treatise are to be established.

original: byas pa nyid kyis nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la gnod na gtan tshigs 'gal ba dang dam bca' ba rjes su dpag pas bsal ba'i skyon yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyis nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la gnod na gtan tshigs 'gal ba dang dam bca' ba rjes su dpag pas bsal ba'i skyon yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: If the quality of space is harmed by the quality of being produced, then the reason is contradictory and the thesis is refuted by inference.

original: bstan bcos las mthong ba thams cad bsgrub par bya ba yin par smra ba de dag gi phyir na byas pa nyid kyi rtags kyi dri zhes bya ba'i chos can las sa'i yon tan bzlog pa'i phyir byas pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos las mthong ba thams cad bsgrub par bya ba yin par smra ba de dag gi phyir na byas pa nyid kyi rtags kyi dri zhes bya ba'i chos can las sa'i yon tan bzlog pa'i phyir byas pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: For those who say that all the visible is to be established by the treatise, the reason of being produced becomes contradictory because it overturns the quality of earth in the subject called ‚Äúsound.‚Äù

original: byas pas ni sa'i yon tan nyid bzlog par nus pa yin te /
analyzed: byas pas ni sa'i yon tan nyid bzlog par nus pa yin te /
translated: Being produced is able to overturn the quality of earth.

original: gang gi phyir yon tan dang yon tan can gyi dngos po ni brten pa'i ngo bo yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir yon tan dang yon tan can gyi dngos po ni brten pa'i ngo bo yin no //
translated: Because the entity of a quality and the entity of a substance that possesses the quality are the nature of a support.

original: skad cig ma'i don la ni rten 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skad cig ma'i don la ni rten 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But in the case of the meaning of momentariness, there is no support at all,

original: ma grub pa ni med pa'i phyir dang / grub pa ni thams cad la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa ni med pa'i phyir dang / grub pa ni thams cad la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because what is not established does not exist and what is established does not depend on anything.

original: des na byas pas mi rtag pa bsgrub pa na yon tan nyid dang / rten thams cad sel ba yin te /
analyzed: des na byas pas mi rtag pa bsgrub pa na yon tan nyid dang / rten thams cad sel ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, when impermanence is established by production, the quality itself and all supports are eliminated.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na sgra la nam yang nam mkha'i yon tan bzlog pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na sgra la nam yang nam mkha'i yon tan bzlog pa yin no //
translated: For this very reason, the quality of space is always eliminated in sound.

original: yod pa'am byas pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i yon tan dang sa'i yon tan ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa'am byas pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i yon tan dang sa'i yon tan ma yin te /
translated: Whatever exists or is produced is not a quality of space or a quality of earth,

original: bum pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bum pa bzhin no //
translated: like a pot.

original: bum pa ni rdzas yin @27a * //
analyzed: bum pa ni rdzas yin @27a * //
translated: A pot is a substance,

original: te ; yon tan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: te ; yon tan ni ma yin no //
translated: but a quality is not.

original: sgra'am dri'am yod pa'am byas pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra'am dri'am yod pa'am byas pa yin no //
translated: Sound is either a quality of space or a quality of earth, or it is existence or production.

original: sgra la brten pa nam mkha'i yon tan nyid dang / dri la brten pa'i sa'i yon tan nyid bstan bcos las mthong bar ni khyad par cung zad kyang med do //üîΩdes na gal te sgra la /
analyzed: sgra la brten pa nam mkha'i yon tan nyid dang / dri la brten pa'i sa'i yon tan nyid bstan bcos las mthong bar ni khyad par cung zad kyang med do // des na gal te sgra la /
translated: and the quality of space that is based on sound, and the quality of earth that is based on smell, there is not the slightest difference between them.

original: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid bzlog pa'i phyir 'gal pa yin na /
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid bzlog pa'i phyir 'gal pa yin na /
translated: Therefore, if sound is contradictory because it is the opposite of the quality of space,

original: dri la sa'i yon tan bzlog pas 'gal bar ci ste mi 'dod /
analyzed: dri la sa'i yon tan bzlog pas 'gal bar ci ste mi 'dod /
translated: why is it not accepted that smell is contradictory because it is the opposite of the quality of earth?

original: sa'i yon tan nyid ni skabs ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sa'i yon tan nyid ni skabs ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the quality of earth is not the present topic.

original: skabs su bab pa ma yin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: skabs su bab pa ma yin pa'i phyir la /
translated: Because it is not the present topic,

original: skabs su bab pa la gnod pas ni gtan tshigs 'gal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: skabs su bab pa la gnod pas ni gtan tshigs 'gal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: and because it is contradictory to the present topic, it is a contradictory reason.

original: skabs ma yin pa'i phyir bsgrub byar ma gyur pa sa'i yon tan nyid la gnod kyang gtan tshigs 'gal ba ma yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni rigs mod kyi /
analyzed: skabs ma yin pa'i phyir bsgrub byar ma gyur pa sa'i yon tan nyid la gnod kyang gtan tshigs 'gal ba ma yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni rigs mod kyi /
translated: It is reasonable to say that because it is not the present topic, the quality of earth, which is not the probandum, is not contradictory to the reason.

original: 'on kyang skabs ma yin pa de ni gzhan nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: 'on kyang skabs ma yin pa de ni gzhan nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la yang mtshungs so //
translated: However, that it is not the present topic is the same for the quality of space.

original: des na skabs su bab pa ma yin pa nam mkha'i yon tan de la gnod pa'i phyir gtan tshigs 'gal bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na skabs su bab pa ma yin pa nam mkha'i yon tan de la gnod pa'i phyir gtan tshigs 'gal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, since the quality of space is not relevant to the present context, the reason is not contradictory.

original: mi mtshungs te nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyi yul 'dir chos can sgra zhes bya bar gang yin de'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi mtshungs te nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyi yul 'dir chos can sgra zhes bya bar gang yin de'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is not similar, because the subject, sound, is the locus of the quality of space.

original: chos gang gi chos can dkyus ma skabs su bab pa ma yin pa de ni skabs su bab pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: chos gang gi chos can dkyus ma skabs su bab pa ma yin pa de ni skabs su bab pa nyid yin te /
translated: A property of a subject that is not relevant to the present context is relevant to the present context,

original: rten skabs su bab pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rten skabs su bab pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the basis is relevant to the present context.

original: des na bsgrub par bya ba yin zhing de log par sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs 'gal ba yang yin no //
analyzed: des na bsgrub par bya ba yin zhing de log par sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs 'gal ba yang yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the probandum, and the reason that refutes it is contradictory.

original: sa'i yon tan nyid ni skabs su bab pa'i chos can gyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir bsgrub byar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sa'i yon tan nyid ni skabs su bab pa'i chos can gyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir bsgrub byar mi 'gyur te /
translated: The quality of earth is not a property of the subject that is relevant to the present context, so it is not the probandum.

original: des na des zlog par byed pas 'gal pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na des zlog par byed pas 'gal pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, since it is not refuted, it is not contradictory.üîΩThis is not so.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa nyid do //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa nyid do //
translated: This is similar.

original: chos can skabs su bab pa dang ma bab pa dag gis ni khyad par du gyur pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can skabs su bab pa dang ma bab pa dag gis ni khyad par du gyur pa ma yin no //
translated: The subject is not distinguished by whether or not it is suitable.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir chos can skabs su bab pa yin yang mi rtag pa nyid sgrub pa na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos can skabs su bab pa yin yang mi rtag pa nyid sgrub pa na /
translated: Because, even if the subject is suitable, when proving impermanence,

original: gang la dngos po la 'brel pa yod pa de ni ma smos kyang bsgrub bya nyid du 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: gang la dngos po la 'brel pa yod pa de ni ma smos kyang bsgrub bya nyid du 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: that which is related to the thing, even if not mentioned, becomes the predicate.

original: dper na bdag med pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na bdag med pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like selflessness and so on.

original: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la ni de ltar dngos po la 'brel pa yod pa ma @27b yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la ni de ltar dngos po la 'brel pa yod pa ma @27b yin te /
translated: The quality of space does not have such a relation to the thing,

original: de med pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not exist as a cause.

original: 'on kyang 'di dag ni bstan bcos khas blangs pa'i rgyu lo nas bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'brel pa na bstan bcos khas blangs pa de ni sa'i yon tan la sogs pa thams cad la yang mtshungs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'di dag ni bstan bcos khas blangs pa'i rgyu lo nas bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'brel pa na bstan bcos khas blangs pa de ni sa'i yon tan la sogs pa thams cad la yang mtshungs pa yin te /
translated: However, when the quality of earth and so on are related to the probandum by the reason accepted in the treatise, that which is accepted in the treatise is the same for all, such as the quality of earth and so on.

original: de'i phyir nam mkha'i yon tan nyid dang sa'i yon tan 'di gnyis la lung gi sgo nas 'ongs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bye brag med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir nam mkha'i yon tan nyid dang sa'i yon tan 'di gnyis la lung gi sgo nas 'ongs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bye brag med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no difference between the quality of space and the quality of earth in terms of being the predicate of the probandum according to the scriptures.

original: de'i phyir ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, it is a case of overextension.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas na nam mkha'i yon tan bzlog pa las kyang 'gal bar khas mi blang ngo //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas na nam mkha'i yon tan bzlog pa las kyang 'gal bar khas mi blang ngo //
translated: Because of overextension, even if the quality of space is refuted, it is not accepted that there is a contradiction.

original: 'di snyam du bstan bcos khas blangs pa'i phyir bsgrub byar 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di snyam du bstan bcos khas blangs pa'i phyir bsgrub byar 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not the case that because the treatise is accepted, it becomes the predicate of the probandum.

original: 'o na kyang rgol bas 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'o na kyang rgol bas 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Rather, it is because it is asserted by the opponent.

original: rgol ba skabs su bab pa'i chos can la ji snyed yod pa'i chos thams cad bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa yod pa yin te /
analyzed: rgol ba skabs su bab pa'i chos can la ji snyed yod pa'i chos thams cad bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa yod pa yin te /
translated: The opponent accepts that all phenomena that exist in the subject under discussion are the predicate of the probandum.

original: des na kho na la bsgrub par bya ba nyid yod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na kho na la bsgrub par bya ba nyid yod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, only that is the predicate of the probandum.

original: chos can gzhan la brten pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du mi 'dod pa'i phyir 'di la yang bsgrub bar 'dod pa ma grub par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhe na /üîΩ'o na te pha rol po skabs su bab pa'i chos can la brten pa'i chos rnams rgol bas kyang 'dod par sgrub par byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: chos can gzhan la brten pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du mi 'dod pa'i phyir 'di la yang bsgrub bar 'dod pa ma grub par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhe na / 'o na te pha rol po skabs su bab pa'i chos can la brten pa'i chos rnams rgol bas kyang 'dod par sgrub par byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: Because it is not asserted that the subject is established in dependence on another subject, it is not the case that the probandum is not established in this case.üîΩBut if the proponent establishes that the properties that pertain to the subject that is accepted by the opponent are accepted by the opponent,

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: then at that time, they would become the probandum.

original: sgrub par byed pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But the proof does not exist.

original: ji ltar med de gang gi phyir chos can de'i khyad par nam mkha'i yon tan zhes bya ba gang yin pa de yang bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar med de gang gi phyir chos can de'i khyad par nam mkha'i yon tan zhes bya ba gang yin pa de yang bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa yin te /
translated: How is it nonexistent? Because the property of the subject, ‚Äúthe quality of space,‚Äù which is asserted as the probandum,

original: bsgrub bya'i chos dang chos can gyi spyi'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa yang de yin la /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos dang chos can gyi spyi'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa yang de yin la /
translated: is a part of the general subject and the property of the probandum.

original: de las gzhan la khyad par du gyur bas khyad par yang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan la khyad par du gyur bas khyad par yang yin pa'o //
translated: It is a distinction because it is a distinction from that which is other than it.

original: gtan tshigs de'i phyir te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i phyir te /
translated: The reason is that.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos bzhin no zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di yod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos bzhin no zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di yod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúBut isn‚Äôt there a reason, ‚Äòbecause it is a phenomenon to be established‚Äô?‚Äù

original: dgag pa'i phyir spyi'i phyogs gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: dgag pa'i phyir spyi'i phyogs gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: In order to refute that, he says, ‚ÄúThe reason, ‚Äòbecause it is a part of the universal,‚Äô and so on.

original: spyi'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa'i khyad par yin pa zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs tsam gyis ni skabs ma yin pa skabs dang bral ba rgol bas bsgrub bya nyid du 'dod par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩci'i phyir de ltar mi @28a * //
analyzed: spyi'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa'i khyad par yin pa zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs tsam gyis ni skabs ma yin pa skabs dang bral ba rgol bas bsgrub bya nyid du 'dod par mi 'gyur ro // ci'i phyir de ltar mi @28a * //
translated: ‚ÄúThe reason, ‚Äòbecause it is a part of the universal,‚Äô and so on, is not a reason that is not the case, that is, that is not established, because it is a part of the universal.

original: 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'gyur zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúBut why is it not the case that the reason, ‚Äòbecause it is a part of the universal,‚Äô and so on, is not a reason that is not the case, that is, that is not established?‚ÄùüîΩIn response to that, he says, ‚ÄúThe reason, ‚Äòbecause it is a part of the universal,‚Äô and so on, is not a reason that is not the case, that is, that is not established, because it is a part of the universal.üîΩ‚ÄúThe reason, ‚Äòbecause it is a part of the universal,‚Äô and so on, is not a reason that is not the case, that is, that is not established, because it is a part of the universal.üîΩ‚ÄúThe reason, ‚Äòbecause it is a part of the universal,‚Äô and so on, is not a reason that is not the case, that is, that is not established, because it is a part of the universal.

original: bshad pa / don de nam mkha'i yon tan nyid ni spyi'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa nyid de'i ngo bo mi 'dor ba'i rgyu'i phyir 'dod pa ldog pa med par thal bar 'gyur zhing sgrub par byed pa 'god pa yang rgyu ma tshang ba med pa can smra shes pa'i 'dodüîΩpa tsam la rag las nas 'jug pa yin pas de yang ldog pa med par 'gyur na /
analyzed: bshad pa / don de nam mkha'i yon tan nyid ni spyi'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa nyid de'i ngo bo mi 'dor ba'i rgyu'i phyir 'dod pa ldog pa med par thal bar 'gyur zhing sgrub par byed pa 'god pa yang rgyu ma tshang ba med pa can smra shes pa'i 'dodüîΩpa tsam la rag las nas 'jug pa yin pas de yang ldog pa med par 'gyur na /
translated: ‚ÄúThe reason, ‚Äòbecause it is a part of the universal,‚Äô and so on, is not a reason that is not the case, that is, that is not established, because it is a part of the universal.üîΩ‚ÄúThe reason, ‚Äòbecause it is a part of the universal,‚Äô and so on, is not a reason that is not the case, that is, that is not established, because it is a part of the universal.üîΩ‚ÄúThe reason, ‚Äòbecause it is a part of the universal,‚Äô and so on, is not a reason that is not the case, that is, that is not established, because it is a part of the universal.üîΩ‚ÄúThe reason, ‚Äòbecause it is a part of the universal,‚Äô and so on, is not a reason that is not the case, that is, that is not established, because it is a part of the universal.üîΩ‚ÄúThe reason, ‚Äòbecause it is a part of the universal,‚Äô and so on, is not a reason that is not the case, that is, that is not established, because it is a part

original: 'dod pa dang 'jug pa dag ni 'dod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang 'jug pa dag ni 'dod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And the desire and engagement are not desire.

original: 'dod pa med par ji ltar nges she na /
analyzed: 'dod pa med par ji ltar nges she na /
translated: How is it ascertained that there is no desire?

original: rang gi rgyud la ni snang ba mi dmigs pa'i las yin la rgyud gzhan la ni rjes su dpag pa las so //
analyzed: rang gi rgyud la ni snang ba mi dmigs pa'i las yin la rgyud gzhan la ni rjes su dpag pa las so //
translated: In one's own continuum, it is the non-observation of the appearance, and in another's continuum, it is from inference.

original: 'dod pa tsam dang 'brel pa 'jug pa ni 'dod pa yod na gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: 'dod pa tsam dang 'brel pa 'jug pa ni 'dod pa yod na gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: Engagement that is related to mere desire is necessarily desire when there is desire.

original: de med pa'i phyir 'dod pa med par rtogs so //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir 'dod pa med par rtogs so //
translated: Because that is absent, it is understood that there is no desire.

original: de'i phyir skabs la ma ltos par ni 'dod pa yod par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir skabs la ma ltos par ni 'dod pa yod par ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, desire does not exist without depending on the context.

original: gang gi phyir spyi'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa'i phyir ni bsgrub byar 'dod pa 'jug pa ma yin pa de'i phyir skabs 'ga' zhig las te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir spyi'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa'i phyir ni bsgrub byar 'dod pa 'jug pa ma yin pa de'i phyir skabs 'ga' zhig las te /
translated: Because it is not the engagement that is desired as the probandum in one part of the general context, therefore it is from some context.

original: gang gi tshe sgra mi rtag pa las pha rol the tshom du 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sgra mi rtag pa las pha rol the tshom du 'gyur ba'am /
translated: When sound is impermanent, the opponent has doubt.

original: yongs su shes pa rtogs par 'dod pas sgra mi rtag pa nyid la de brgal zhing brtag pa med pa de'i tshe bsgrub byar 'dod par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: yongs su shes pa rtogs par 'dod pas sgra mi rtag pa nyid la de brgal zhing brtag pa med pa de'i tshe bsgrub byar 'dod par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: When one who wishes to understand the understanding of sound as impermanent does not investigate and analyze that, at that time, he would come to assert the probandum.

original: de'i phyir shes par 'dod pa rjes su dpag pa'i 'dri ba la sogs pa'i ngag ni skabs yin pas de ni skabs de las 'gyur ba dang / skabs de nyid kyis rgol ba la gzhan dag gis shes par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes par 'dod pa rjes su dpag pa'i 'dri ba la sogs pa'i ngag ni skabs yin pas de ni skabs de las 'gyur ba dang / skabs de nyid kyis rgol ba la gzhan dag gis shes par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the statement of the one who wishes to understand, the questioner, etc., is the context. That is the context, and by that context alone, others should understand the opponent.

original: gal te skabs zhes byas 'dod pa'i rgyu ma yin nam de'i rgyu nus pa thogs pa med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te skabs zhes byas 'dod pa'i rgyu ma yin nam de'i rgyu nus pa thogs pa med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúIs the context not the cause of assertion?,‚Äù the cause of that is not unobstructed capability.

original: gang gi phyir skabs yod kyang yul dang dus kha cig tu rgol ba la skabs de'i rgyu mtshan can gyi 'dod pa gang yin pa de nyid med pa yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir skabs yod kyang yul dang dus kha cig tu rgol ba la skabs de'i rgyu mtshan can gyi 'dod pa gang yin pa de nyid med pa yin la /
translated: Because even when the context exists, in some places and times, the opponent does not have the assertion that has the context as its reason.

original: yul dang dus gzhan dag tu ni mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: yul dang dus gzhan dag tu ni mthong ba yin no //
translated: But in other places and times, it is seen.

original: de'i phyir skabs 'ba' zhig la ni nus pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir skabs 'ba' zhig la ni nus pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the context alone does not have the capability.

original: des na rgyu gzhan la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i rgyus ji ltar 'bras bu rjes su dpog ce na /
analyzed: des na rgyu gzhan la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i rgyus ji ltar 'bras bu rjes su dpog ce na /
translated: Therefore, how can one infer an effect from a cause that is dependent on another cause?

original: bden te / de ltar rjes su dpog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bden te / de ltar rjes su dpog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: That is true, but one does not infer in that way.

original: 'on kyang tshig gi bdag nyid sgrub par byed pa nye bar bkod pa las 'dod pa bsgrub par bya ba yin te /üîΩsgrub @28b par byed pa nye bar bkod pa'i phyir na 'di 'ga' zhig sgrub par 'dod pa yin no zhes bsgrub par bya ba 'dod pa ni 'bras bu las rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang tshig gi bdag nyid sgrub par byed pa nye bar bkod pa las 'dod pa bsgrub par bya ba yin te / sgrub @28b par byed pa nye bar bkod pa'i phyir na 'di 'ga' zhig sgrub par 'dod pa yin no zhes bsgrub par bya ba 'dod pa ni 'bras bu las rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no //
translated: However, the desired object is established from the statement of the proof.üîΩSince the proof is stated, it is understood that someone desires to establish something. The desired object is to be inferred from the effect.

original: skabs kyis ni 'bras bu de las shes pa'i 'dod pa'i yul yongs su gcad par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: skabs kyis ni 'bras bu de las shes pa'i 'dod pa'i yul yongs su gcad par bya ba yin te /
translated: But the desired object is to be determined from the effect in this context.

original: yul de la ni 'dir rtsod pa yod pas skabs de nyid kyis rtogs par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yul de la ni 'dir rtsod pa yod pas skabs de nyid kyis rtogs par bya ba yin no //
translated: Since there is a dispute about that object, it is to be understood from the context.

original: dper na grang can gyis bdag bsgrub pa'i skabs su sgrub par byed pa 'god pa na bdag gi don nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin na zhes de'i yul can gyi 'dod pa rtogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na grang can gyis bdag bsgrub pa'i skabs su sgrub par byed pa 'god pa na bdag gi don nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin na zhes de'i yul can gyi 'dod pa rtogs pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, when the proponent of a self is setting forth the proof of the self, if the object of his desire is the establishment of the self, then he is to be understood as desiring the establishment of the self.

original: bzlog pa'i shes pa rig pas gsal bar 'gyur ba gang la yod pa skabs dang bral ba'i 'dod pa de'o //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i shes pa rig pas gsal bar 'gyur ba gang la yod pa skabs dang bral ba'i 'dod pa de'o //
translated: The desire that is the object of the desire to know is the desire to know that is the object of the desire to know.

original: 'dod pa ni rang rig pa'i mngon sum ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa ni rang rig pa'i mngon sum ma yin no //
translated: The desire to know is not the direct perception of reflexive awareness.

original: de nas gzhan nyams su myong ba nyid du nges par rang rig pas rtogs par bya ba de med par nges pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: de nas gzhan nyams su myong ba nyid du nges par rang rig pas rtogs par bya ba de med par nges pa'i phyir na /
translated: Then, because it is ascertained that the other, which is to be ascertained by reflexive awareness as an experience, does not exist,

original: nyams su myong bas med par nges pa ni bzlog pa nyams su myong bas dgag pa 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: nyams su myong bas med par nges pa ni bzlog pa nyams su myong bas dgag pa 'jug pa yin no //
translated: the ascertainment of the nonexistence of the experience by the experience engages the negation of the opposite experience.

original: 'thad pa med pa'i phyir nan gyis yod do zhes bsgrub pa ni mngon sum dang 'gal bar shes pa yin no //
analyzed: 'thad pa med pa'i phyir nan gyis yod do zhes bsgrub pa ni mngon sum dang 'gal bar shes pa yin no //
translated: Because it is untenable, the assertion that it exists is known to contradict direct perception.

original: 'di nyid tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'di nyid tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to demonstrate this point with verses, it is said:

original: sgra rtag par khas len pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs 'gas 'dod pa skye ba yin la /
analyzed: sgra rtag par khas len pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs 'gas 'dod pa skye ba yin la /
translated: The occasion of the desire to accept the permanence of sound and so on is born.

original: de yul khyad par can 'dod pa yin par rnam par gzhag pa yang 'bras bur gyur pa sgrub par byed pa nye bar 'god pa dang lhan cig pa'i gnas skabs de dag nyid kyis yin no //üîΩgal te gang la 'dod pa'i skabs nyid med bzhin du de la nan gyis khyod 'di 'dod pa bzhin no zhes tha snyad byed pa de'i tshe rigs pa dang mi rigs pa'i dpyod pa dang bral zhing 'thad pas gnod pa 'di ni dbang phyug gi spyod pa bzhin
analyzed: de yul khyad par can 'dod pa yin par rnam par gzhag pa yang 'bras bur gyur pa sgrub par byed pa nye bar 'god pa dang lhan cig pa'i gnas skabs de dag nyid kyis yin no // gal te gang la 'dod pa'i skabs nyid med bzhin du de la nan gyis khyod 'di 'dod pa bzhin no zhes tha snyad byed pa de'i tshe rigs pa dang mi rigs pa'i dpyod pa dang bral zhing 'thad pas gnod pa 'di ni dbang phyug gi spyod pa bzhin
translated: And the establishment of the object as a special one is by those very occasions of the proof that is the effect, which is the statement of the proof.

original: du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: du 'gyur ro //
translated: If, without any occasion of desire, one were to insist, ‚ÄúYou must desire this,‚Äù then, free from analysis of what is correct and incorrect, this would be a case of the tyranny of the powerful.

original: yul yongs su gcod pa'i rgyu gnas skabs dang lhan cig pa'i sgrub par byed pa nye bar 'god pa ni 'bras bu'i rtags so //
analyzed: yul yongs su gcod pa'i rgyu gnas skabs dang lhan cig pa'i sgrub par byed pa nye bar 'god pa ni 'bras bu'i rtags so //
translated: The statement of the proof that is the effect is the evidence of effect.

original: de dang bral ba skabs dang mi ldan pa 'dod par brjod pa de ni mngon sum gyis byas pa'i 'khrul pas ni gnod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dang bral ba skabs dang mi ldan pa 'dod par brjod pa de ni mngon sum gyis byas pa'i 'khrul pas ni gnod par 'gyur te /
translated: The assertion that the absence of that is not the right occasion is undermined by the error committed by direct perception.

original: mngon sum gyis grub pa med pas de la gnod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde na spyi'i phyogs gcig nyid kyis skabs su ma bab pa'i chos rgol bas bsgrub bya nyid du 'dod pa yin @29a * //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis grub pa med pas de la gnod pa'i phyir ro // de na spyi'i phyogs gcig nyid kyis skabs su ma bab pa'i chos rgol bas bsgrub bya nyid du 'dod pa yin @29a * //
translated: Because it is not established by direct perception, it is undermined.

original: no zhes bsgrub par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: no zhes bsgrub par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not possible to prove that the opponent‚Äôs thesis is not the right occasion by means of a part of the general thesis.

original: des na dri las sa'i yon tan bzlog pas kyang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na dri las sa'i yon tan bzlog pas kyang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the opposite of the qualities of earth from the qualities of smell is also contradictory.

original: 'di snyam du gal te nam mkha'i yon tan nyid skabs su bab pa ma yin pa de lta na yang de la gnod na bsgrub bya la gnod par 'gyur bas bsgrub par bya ba grub pa ni de grub pa dang lhan cig pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du gal te nam mkha'i yon tan nyid skabs su bab pa ma yin pa de lta na yang de la gnod na bsgrub bya la gnod par 'gyur bas bsgrub par bya ba grub pa ni de grub pa dang lhan cig pa yin te /
translated: If you think that even though the qualities of space are not the right occasion, if they undermine the qualities of earth, then the establishment of the probandum is simultaneous with the establishment of that.

original: des na bsgrub bya yin no snyam na /üîΩmed na mi 'byung min don la //
analyzed: des na bsgrub bya yin no snyam na / med na mi 'byung min don la //
translated: Therefore, the probandum is established.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: The response to that is, ‚ÄúThe meaning is not that it does not occur without it.‚Äù

original: nyan pa'i shes pas yongs su bcad pa'i chos can sgra dang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos 'jig pa ni nam mkha'i yon tan nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te ;
analyzed: nyan pa'i shes pas yongs su bcad pa'i chos can sgra dang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos 'jig pa ni nam mkha'i yon tan nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te ;
translated: The sound that is the subject that is ascertained by the cognition of hearing and the attribute of the thesis, impermanence, are not related to the attribute of space.

original: des na med na mi 'byung ba ma yin ba nam mkha'i yon tan nyid de la gnod kyang /
analyzed: des na med na mi 'byung ba ma yin ba nam mkha'i yon tan nyid de la gnod kyang /
translated: Therefore, even though the attribute of space is undermined by the fact that it is not a necessary consequence,

original: gzhan mi rtag pa nyid la ci zhig gnod na gang mi 'grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan mi rtag pa nyid la ci zhig gnod na gang mi 'grub par 'gyur /
translated: what is undermined by that? What is not established?

original: gang yang med na mi 'byung ba'i chos dper na skad cig ma nyid la bdag med pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: gang yang med na mi 'byung ba'i chos dper na skad cig ma nyid la bdag med pa lta bu ste /
translated: Also, a necessary consequence is like the fact that if something is momentary, it is necessarily without a self.

original: bdag rtag pa ma yin par gyur na skad cig ma nyid dngos po thams cad la gnas par mi 'grub pa'i phyir bdag med pa ma grub na skad cig ma nyid mi 'grub po //
analyzed: bdag rtag pa ma yin par gyur na skad cig ma nyid dngos po thams cad la gnas par mi 'grub pa'i phyir bdag med pa ma grub na skad cig ma nyid mi 'grub po //
translated: If it were not the case that a self is permanent, it would not be established that momentariness exists in all things, and if the absence of a self were not established, momentariness would not be established.

original: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid ni de ltar med na mi 'byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid ni de ltar med na mi 'byung ba ma yin no //
translated: But the attribute of space is not like that, it is not a necessary consequence.

original: 'di snyam du lung gis mi gnod pa'i gtan tshigs ni bsgrub bya go bar phyed pa yin na 'dir ni lung gis gnod pas skyon can du gyur pa'i gtan tshigs kyis mi rtag pa nyid kyang go bar mi byed pas ma rtogs pa nyid de'i gnod pa yinüîΩno zhe na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du lung gis mi gnod pa'i gtan tshigs ni bsgrub bya go bar phyed pa yin na 'dir ni lung gis gnod pas skyon can du gyur pa'i gtan tshigs kyis mi rtag pa nyid kyang go bar mi byed pas ma rtogs pa nyid de'i gnod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you think, ‚ÄúA reason that is not undermined by scripture is one that makes the probandum understood. But here, since it is undermined by scripture, a reason that has a fault does not make impermanence understood. Therefore, the undermining of the reason is the non-understanding of the probandum,‚Äù

original: bshad ces smos so //
analyzed: bshad ces smos so //
translated: then we would reply, ‚ÄúWe have explained this.‚Äù

original: ci zhig bshad ce na /üîΩrjes dpag rang gi spyod yul la //
analyzed: ci zhig bshad ce na / rjes dpag rang gi spyod yul la //
translated: What have we explained?üîΩWe have explained that ‚ÄúThe object of inferenceüîΩdoes not depend on scripture.‚Äù

original: lung la ltos pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul la ni tshig tshad ma ma yin no zhes bya ba der bshad do //
analyzed: lung la ltos pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul la ni tshig tshad ma ma yin no zhes bya ba der bshad do //
translated: We have explained that ‚ÄúIn the object of inference, words are not valid cognition.‚Äù

original: tshul gsum pa tshad mas grub pa'i phyir dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rtags rang gi yul la 'jug pa yin gyi /
analyzed: tshul gsum pa tshad mas grub pa'i phyir dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rtags rang gi yul la 'jug pa yin gyi /
translated: Because the trimodal conditions are established by valid knowledge, a reason that engages its object by the power of the thing is a reason that engages its object.

original: lung la ni gzhan 'ga' yang don du gnyer ba med do //
analyzed: lung la ni gzhan 'ga' yang don du gnyer ba med do //
translated: But in the case of scripture, no one else is interested in the object.

original: de'i phyir lung la mi ltos pa'i phyir na lung dang 'gal ba yang des grub pa gang yin pa de ni legs par grub pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir lung la mi ltos pa'i phyir na lung dang 'gal ba yang des grub pa gang yin pa de ni legs par grub pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, since it does not rely on scripture, whatever is established by that is well established, even if it contradicts scripture.üîΩ

original: de la gnod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de la gnod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it does not rely on scripture, whatever is established by it is well established, and it is not contradicted by scripture.

original: zhe na'i sgra tshig le'u byas pa 'og ma la brjod pa yin yang 'dir blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: zhe na'i sgra tshig le'u byas pa 'og ma la brjod pa yin yang 'dir blta bar bya ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúbut‚Äù is expressed in the verse below, but it should be seen here.

original: gal te de'i bstan bcos la ltos pa med pa yin na @29b de'i rtsod pa dor bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de'i bstan bcos la ltos pa med pa yin na @29b de'i rtsod pa dor bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it does not rely on his treatise, then his argument is abandoned.

original: 'gyur ba min te /
analyzed: 'gyur ba min te /
translated: It is not abandoned,

original: dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag pa'i dus de'i tshe khas blangs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag pa'i dus de'i tshe khas blangs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because at the time of inferring through the power of fact, there is no acceptance.

original: khas blangs pa yod na dor bar 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: khas blangs pa yod na dor bar 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: If there were acceptance, it would be abandoned.

original: de'i tshe ni bstan bcos khas blangs pa nyid med do //
analyzed: de'i tshe ni bstan bcos khas blangs pa nyid med do //
translated: But at that time, there is no acceptance of the treatise.

original: gang gi don du rang nyid smos pa bstan bcos khas blangs pa yin yang rtsod pa 'dod pa yod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi don du rang nyid smos pa bstan bcos khas blangs pa yin yang rtsod pa 'dod pa yod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn‚Äôt there a desire to argue even when the treatise is accepted for the sake of which one‚Äôs own name is mentioned?

original: bden te / de'i tshe zhes bya ba rjes su dpag pa'i dus su yod kyang bstan bcos khas len pa de 'dor ba'i rgyu ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bden te / de'i tshe zhes bya ba rjes su dpag pa'i dus su yod kyang bstan bcos khas len pa de 'dor ba'i rgyu ni ma yin no //
translated: True, but at that time, although it exists at the time of inference, it is not a cause for abandoning the treatise-acceptance.

original: ji ltar gnod par byas la gtong bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar gnod par byas la gtong bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is it that one does not give up what is harmful?

original: 'di ni khas len pa'i thabs yin pas zhes smos so //
analyzed: 'di ni khas len pa'i thabs yin pas zhes smos so //
translated: This is the method of acceptance, he says.

original: thabs zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir bstan bcos khas len pa'i thabs ni 'di kho na ste /
analyzed: thabs zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir bstan bcos khas len pa'i thabs ni 'di kho na ste /
translated: The method is that the method of accepting the treatise is just this.

original: 'di lta ste de las bshad pa yongs su rtogs pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste de las bshad pa yongs su rtogs pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: That is to say, it is the complete understanding of what is explained in the treatise.

original: de'i phyir de'i tshe yod kyang med pa dang 'dra ba'i khas len pa ni gtong ba'i yan lag ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i tshe yod kyang med pa dang 'dra ba'i khas len pa ni gtong ba'i yan lag ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, although it exists at that time, the acceptance which is like non-existence is not a limb of abandoning.

original: med pa'i phyir gtong ba med do //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir gtong ba med do //
translated: Because it does not exist, there is no abandoning.

original: gang gi tshe bye brag pa rang gi lung las bshad pa'i rjes su dpag par bya ba'i don gzhan dang lhan cig rjes su dpag pa la rnam par dpyod par rtsom pa de nyid kyi tshe khas blangs pa byas su zin kyang /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bye brag pa rang gi lung las bshad pa'i rjes su dpag par bya ba'i don gzhan dang lhan cig rjes su dpag pa la rnam par dpyod par rtsom pa de nyid kyi tshe khas blangs pa byas su zin kyang /
translated: When the Vai≈õe·π£ika begins to analyze the object of inference that is explained in his own scriptures in terms of other objects that are inferred, at that time, even though he has already accepted the inference,

original: gal te gzhan gyis grub pa'i mtha' las bshad pa'i don rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar gsal ba de'i tshe 'di ni lung ma yin no zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: gal te gzhan gyis grub pa'i mtha' las bshad pa'i don rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar gsal ba de'i tshe 'di ni lung ma yin no zhes brjod pas /
translated: if the object explained in the tenets of others becomes clearer, he will say, ‚ÄúThis is not a scripture.‚Äù

original: yid gnyis su gyur pa ni rjes su dpag pa'i dus su khas len pa yod kyang khas len pa'i rgyu'i gnas skabs thob par gyur pas na /
analyzed: yid gnyis su gyur pa ni rjes su dpag pa'i dus su khas len pa yod kyang khas len pa'i rgyu'i gnas skabs thob par gyur pas na /
translated: Thus he becomes uncertain. Even though he accepts the inference at the time of inference, he obtains a reason for not accepting it.

original: khas blangs pa dor ba dang 'dra bar 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: khas blangs pa dor ba dang 'dra bar 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Thus he engages in rejecting his acceptance.

original: de'i phyir de'i tshe yod pa'i khas len pa ni snga ma med pa bya dgos pa can du mthong ba'i phyir dor ba'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i tshe yod pa'i khas len pa ni snga ma med pa bya dgos pa can du mthong ba'i phyir dor ba'i yul ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, at that time, the acceptance that exists is not an object to be rejected, because it is seen that the previous nonexistence must be made.

original: gal te dpyod pa'i dus na grub pa'i mtha' med na /
analyzed: gal te dpyod pa'i dus na grub pa'i mtha' med na /
translated: If there is no tenet at the time of analysis,

original: 'o na nam gyi tshe bstan bcos kyis gnod par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na nam gyi tshe bstan bcos kyis gnod par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But when is the treatise refuted?

original: de ltar zhes smos te ;
analyzed: de ltar zhes smos te ;
translated: The root text states, ‚ÄúIn that way.‚Äù

original: bstan bcos la ma ltos par mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gis yul gnyis rnam par dag cing gtan la phebs na'o //
analyzed: bstan bcos la ma ltos par mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gis yul gnyis rnam par dag cing gtan la phebs na'o //
translated: When the two objects are ascertained and purified by direct perception and inference without relying on the treatise, then the treatise is refuted.

original: bstan bcos kyi brjod par bya ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin yang rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: bstan bcos kyi brjod par bya ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin yang rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: The subject matter of the treatise is also of three types:

original: mngon sum du gyur pa gzugs la sogs pa dang / rjes su dpag @30a * //
analyzed: mngon sum du gyur pa gzugs la sogs pa dang / rjes su dpag @30a * //
translated: that which is directly perceived, such as form,üîΩthat which is to be inferred, such as momentariness,

original: par bya ba skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa dang / dbang po las 'das pa mtho ris la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: par bya ba skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa dang / dbang po las 'das pa mtho ris la sogs pa'o //
translated: and that which is beyond the senses, such as the higher realms.

original: de la mngon sum du gyur pa dang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i yul gtan la phebs na de ni bstan bcos yongs su 'dzin par 'dod pa'i ste /
analyzed: de la mngon sum du gyur pa dang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i yul gtan la phebs na de ni bstan bcos yongs su 'dzin par 'dod pa'i ste /
translated: When the objects that are directly perceived and that are to be inferred are ascertained, then the treatise is refuted by one who wishes to uphold the treatise.

original: yongs su 'dzin pa dus yin no //
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin pa dus yin no //
translated: The time for upholding it is then over.

original: 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni 'di skad du ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni 'di skad du ston pa yin te /
translated: The word ‚Äúwishes‚Äù in the root text is taught in order to indicate the following.

original: lus gnyis yongs su dag kyang dbang po las 'das pa la sems dgos pa med par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir gdon mi za bar gzung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: lus gnyis yongs su dag kyang dbang po las 'das pa la sems dgos pa med par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir gdon mi za bar gzung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Although the two bodies are completely pure, it is not definitely necessary to apprehend the body of attributes because it is beyond the sense faculties.üîΩIf it did not engage, it would abide in suffering.

original: gal te mi 'jug na sdug bsngal bar gnas par 'gyur na des yul gnyis nges na bstan bcos gzung bar bya ba yin pas yul gnyis rnam par dag pa mthar phyin pa'i dus de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te mi 'jug na sdug bsngal bar gnas par 'gyur na des yul gnyis nges na bstan bcos gzung bar bya ba yin pas yul gnyis rnam par dag pa mthar phyin pa'i dus de'i tshe /
translated: When it definitely ascertains the two objects, it is necessary to accept the treatise. Therefore, when the time of the perfection of the purity of the two objects arrives,

original: bstan bcos ni gnod par 'gyur ba yin gyi sngar ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos ni gnod par 'gyur ba yin gyi sngar ni ma yin no //
translated: the treatise is harmed, but not previously.

original: gal te yul gnyis rnam par dag tu chug pa de lta na yang ji ltar bstan bcos khas len pa'am /
analyzed: gal te yul gnyis rnam par dag tu chug pa de lta na yang ji ltar bstan bcos khas len pa'am /
translated: Even if one allows that the two objects are pure, how could one accept the treatise?

original: ji ltar de gnod par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar de gnod par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Or how could it be harmed?

original: des grub pa don la zhes smos te /
analyzed: des grub pa don la zhes smos te /
translated: The treatise says, ‚ÄúThe meaning established by that.‚Äù

original: des zhes bya ba bstan bcos kyi grub pa'i don la bstan bcos las grub pa'i don dang 'gal bar sems pa gang yin pa de ni mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba bstan bcos kyi grub pa'i don la bstan bcos las grub pa'i don dang 'gal bar sems pa gang yin pa de ni mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning established by that treatise is the meaning established by the treatise. It is not suitable to think that it contradicts the meaning established by the treatise.

original: gang gi phyir rten med pas dbang po las 'das pa'i don la sems pa mi 'thad pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rten med pas dbang po las 'das pa'i don la sems pa mi 'thad pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because it is untenable that the mind is directed to a transcendent object without a basis,

original: gnas gsum pa dbang po las 'das par 'pho ba na /
analyzed: gnas gsum pa dbang po las 'das par 'pho ba na /
translated: in the third chapter, it is said that

original: bstan bcos len pa rigs ldan yin te /üîΩgdon mi za bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: bstan bcos len pa rigs ldan yin te / gdon mi za bar bya ba yin te /
translated: one should accept the treatise,üîΩbecause it is certain that

original: bstan bcos khas ma blangs na ni dpyod pa'i gzhi med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos khas ma blangs na ni dpyod pa'i gzhi med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: if one does not accept the treatise, there is no basis for analysis.

original: bstan bcos khas blangs na yang de dang 'gal ba'i don khas mi blang ste /
analyzed: bstan bcos khas blangs na yang de dang 'gal ba'i don khas mi blang ste /
translated: Even if one accepts the treatise, one should not accept a meaning that contradicts it,

original: de khas len na bstan bcos kyis gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de khas len na bstan bcos kyis gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: because if one does, one is undermined by the treatise.

original: dper na bstan bcos las rab tu grags pa'i chos khas blangs nas de dang 'gal ba bde ba ma yin pa rab tu ster ba nyid smra na bstan bcos kyis gnod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bstan bcos las rab tu grags pa'i chos khas blangs nas de dang 'gal ba bde ba ma yin pa rab tu ster ba nyid smra na bstan bcos kyis gnod pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, if one accepts a phenomenon that is well known in the treatise and then says that it is not pleasure, which contradicts the treatise, one is undermined by the treatise.

original: bstan bcos yongs su len pa der yang dper na skad cig ma nyid dang bdag med pa 'brel pa ltar bsgrub bya'i chos dang / med na mi 'byung ba'i chos gang yin pa ste /üîΩ'brel pa'i chos de la gnod pa gang yin pa de nyid spong bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: bstan bcos yongs su len pa der yang dper na skad cig ma nyid dang bdag med pa 'brel pa ltar bsgrub bya'i chos dang / med na mi 'byung ba'i chos gang yin pa ste / 'brel pa'i chos de la gnod pa gang yin pa de nyid spong bar bya ba yin te /
translated: In that case, just as momentariness and selflessness are related, the property to be established and the property that is the reason are related.üîΩThe reason is the property that does not occur if the property to be established is absent.

original: de la @30b gnod par byed pa ni dngos po ni bsgrub bya'i chos la yang gnod par byed pa yin pas 'gal bar 'gyur ro //üîΩchos gzhan dag las ni min te /
analyzed: de la @30b gnod par byed pa ni dngos po ni bsgrub bya'i chos la yang gnod par byed pa yin pas 'gal bar 'gyur ro // chos gzhan dag las ni min te /
translated: The reason is the property that is to be refuted if it contradicts the property to be established.

original: thug pa med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thug pa med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The reason is not a property that is different from the property to be established because that would lead to an infinite regress.

original: lung la bstan pa yin yang bstan bcos las mthong ba thams cad kyis khyab par ni rtags 'ga' yang dpe la bstan par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: lung la bstan pa yin yang bstan bcos las mthong ba thams cad kyis khyab par ni rtags 'ga' yang dpe la bstan par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: Although the treatise is accepted, it is not possible to demonstrate in an example that all the reasons that are seen in the treatise pervade the property to be established because the treatise is not limited to a single place and time.

original: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa'i dus na bstan bcos khas len pa yod kyang med pa dang 'dra bas yongs su 'dor ba'i yan lag ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa'i dus na bstan bcos khas len pa yod kyang med pa dang 'dra bas yongs su 'dor ba'i yan lag ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, although the treatise is accepted when inference is engaged, it is as if it does not exist and is not a branch of the proof.

original: gnod par byed pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas pa yin no //üîΩji ltar gnod par byed pa ma yin te mig pas kyang chos yid ches pa'i gnas su gyur pa lung gis gnod na gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes nges par bsams nas bstan bcos dang 'gal ba med pa'i gtan tshigs su nye bar blang bar bya ba yin
analyzed: gnod par byed pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas pa yin no // ji ltar gnod par byed pa ma yin te mig pas kyang chos yid ches pa'i gnas su gyur pa lung gis gnod na gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes nges par bsams nas bstan bcos dang 'gal ba med pa'i gtan tshigs su nye bar blang bar bya ba yin
translated: It is not a fault.üîΩHow is it not a fault? If the eye sense faculty is not a valid cognition, then it is not a reason, because it is contradicted by scripture, which is a valid cognition.

original: pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it should be accepted as a reason that does not contradict the treatises.üîΩWe say: By whom is this system,

original: bshad pa / lugs te rnam par gzhag pa 'di gang gis bya /
analyzed: bshad pa / lugs te rnam par gzhag pa 'di gang gis bya /
translated: this arrangement, to be made?

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang / dbang po las 'das pa'i dpyod pa kun bstan bcos la ltos par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang / dbang po las 'das pa'i dpyod pa kun bstan bcos la ltos par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said to be direct perception, inference, and the analysis of what is beyond the senses, all of which depend on the treatises.

original: de 'dra ba ni gang gis kyang bya bar nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de 'dra ba ni gang gis kyang bya bar nus pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not possible for anyone to make such a system.

original: de ltar yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is like that,

original: da ni phyugs rdzi la sogs pa grub mtha' med rnams kyis /
analyzed: da ni phyugs rdzi la sogs pa grub mtha' med rnams kyis /
translated: then now even cowherds and so on, who have no philosophical position,

original: du bas me 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: du bas me 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: would not apprehend fire from smoke.

original: 'dzin pa yang yin te /
analyzed: 'dzin pa yang yin te /
translated: It is also a grasping,

original: de'i phyir grub pa'i mtha' ni rje su dpag pa la grogs byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir grub pa'i mtha' ni rje su dpag pa la grogs byed pa ma yin no //
translated: and therefore the philosophical theory does not help in the inference.

original: rjes su dpag pa lung la mi ltos par gdon mi za bar khas blangs par bya dgos te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa lung la mi ltos par gdon mi za bar khas blangs par bya dgos te /
translated: It must be admitted that inference does not depend on scripture,

original: de lta ma yin na gal te dpe la bstan bcos las mthong ba'i don kun sgrub par byed pa gcig la khyad par byed pa yin par nye bar bstan pa de lta na sgrub par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gal te dpe la bstan bcos las mthong ba'i don kun sgrub par byed pa gcig la khyad par byed pa yin par nye bar bstan pa de lta na sgrub par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: otherwise, if the treatise were to prove the meaning of the example by means of a single example, it would be a proof.

original: 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lugs shig go //
analyzed: 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lugs shig go //
translated: This is a transcendental method.

original: 'jig rten la sgrub par byed pa cung zad yod pa kho na ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten la sgrub par byed pa cung zad yod pa kho na ste /
translated: There is a slight proof in the world,

original: de lta na ni sgrub par byed pa 'ga' yang med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na ni sgrub par byed pa 'ga' yang med par 'gyur te /
translated: but if it were so, there would be no proof at all.

original: gang zhig bstan bcos las mthong ba gcig tsam yang phyin ci log tu sgrub par mi byed pa'i chos de ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: gang zhig bstan bcos las mthong ba gcig tsam yang phyin ci log tu sgrub par mi byed pa'i chos de ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: There is no such thing as a dharma that does not prove what is seen in the treatise even a little bit.

original: bstan bcos las mthong ba dang 'gal bas khyab pa gang yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs 'ga' yang @31a * //üîΩmed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos las mthong ba dang 'gal bas khyab pa gang yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs 'ga' yang @31a * // med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it is pervaded by the fact that it contradicts what is seen, there is no reason at all.

original: gzhan yang lung dang ldan pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang 'brel med chos ni ma grub bas bsgrub bar bya ba'i chos ma grub bar ni ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan yang lung dang ldan pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang 'brel med chos ni ma grub bas bsgrub bar bya ba'i chos ma grub bar ni ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: Moreover, if the property to be established is not related to the scripture, then how could it be established without the property to be established?

original: 'brel ba ma grub na ni ma grub ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'brel ba ma grub na ni ma grub ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the relation is not established, then it is called ‚Äúunestablished.‚Äù

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i chos de grub pa yin na lung la gnod par byed pa yin yang gtan tshigs skyon ldan ji ltar ste /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i chos de grub pa yin na lung la gnod par byed pa yin yang gtan tshigs skyon ldan ji ltar ste /
translated: If the property that is desired to be established is established, then even if it contradicts the scripture, how could the reason be faulty?

original: ci'i phyir yin /
analyzed: ci'i phyir yin /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni chos gcig bo de nyid sgrub bar byed pa'i phyir nye bar bkod pa yin pas /
analyzed: de ni chos gcig bo de nyid sgrub bar byed pa'i phyir nye bar bkod pa yin pas /
translated: Because it is presented in order to establish just that single property.

original: gal te de grub na gzhan ma grub kyang skyon dang ldan pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gal te de grub na gzhan ma grub kyang skyon dang ldan pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: If that is established, then even if the others are not established, it is certainly not faulty.

original: de'i phyir thams cad du rjes su dpag ba lung la brten ba yin na phyugs rdzi la sogs pas 'khrul ba dang / gal te dpe la zhes bya ba'i yul 'dis kyang mi nus pa yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad du rjes su dpag ba lung la brten ba yin na phyugs rdzi la sogs pas 'khrul ba dang / gal te dpe la zhes bya ba'i yul 'dis kyang mi nus pa yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, if one relies on scripture in all cases, then even a cowherd would not be mistaken, and if one relies on an example, then even a non-Buddhist would not be mistaken.

original: 'di snyam du bstan bcos pa thams cad dpe la bstan par bya ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du bstan bcos pa thams cad dpe la bstan par bya ba ni ma yin te /
translated: If one thinks that not all the topics of a treatise are to be taught by way of example,

original: 'on kyang bsgrub bar bya ba'i chos can la chos ji snyed bstan bcos las mthong ba de dag gis gtan tshigs la khyab par ni dpe'i chos can la bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang bsgrub bar bya ba'i chos can la chos ji snyed bstan bcos las mthong ba de dag gis gtan tshigs la khyab par ni dpe'i chos can la bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: but rather that the pervasion of the reason by the property of the thesis is to be taught by way of an example that has the property of the thesis,

original: bstan bcos las mthong ba thams cad kyis ma yin pa des na 'ga' zhig sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lugs kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos las mthong ba thams cad kyis ma yin pa des na 'ga' zhig sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lugs kyang ma yin no //
translated: then it is not the case that all that is seen in the treatise is to be taught by way of an example. Therefore, it is not the case that the reason is established by the treatise, and it is not the case that the reason is established by the world.

original: lung shes pa na lung la gnod pa'i gtan tshigs las 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: lung shes pa na lung la gnod pa'i gtan tshigs las 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: When one knows scripture, one does not understand anything from a reason that contradicts scripture.

original: gang gis mig tu gyur pa'i lung la gnod par byed pa de ni dpe'i spang byar gyur pa na ji ltar rtogs par byed pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis mig tu gyur pa'i lung la gnod par byed pa de ni dpe'i spang byar gyur pa na ji ltar rtogs par byed pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur /
translated: But how could that which invalidates the scripture that is the eye be a branch that causes understanding when it is an object to be refuted by an example?

original: lung mi shes pa dag go ci ste du ba la sogs pa las me la sogs pa rtogs par mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: lung mi shes pa dag go ci ste du ba la sogs pa las me la sogs pa rtogs par mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If one does not know scripture, why would one not understand fire and so on from smoke and so on?

original: gal te 'jig rten yang bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi chos kyis khyab pa'i gtan tshigs go bar byed par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te 'jig rten yang bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi chos kyis khyab pa'i gtan tshigs go bar byed par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If the world were to understand a reason that pervades the subject that is to be proven,

original: gzhan du ma yin pa de lta na lung shes pa'i lung las grub pa yang de kho na ltar mdzes pa yin na /
analyzed: gzhan du ma yin pa de lta na lung shes pa'i lung las grub pa yang de kho na ltar mdzes pa yin na /
translated: and not otherwise, then it would be just as beautiful to prove it from scripture known by the world.

original: de ltar yang ma yin te ;üîΩ'di ltar chos can chos ni ma lus pas //
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin te ; 'di ltar chos can chos ni ma lus pas //
translated: But that is not the case.üîΩBecause the subject and the property of the subject are not completely

original: dpe la yod pa'i gtan tshigs la bstan ba med pa kho nar ni ste //
analyzed: dpe la yod pa'i gtan tshigs la bstan ba med pa kho nar ni ste //
translated: The reason that exists in the example is not taught at all.

original: de dag gis gtan tshigs la khyab par ma bstan pa kho nar lung mi shes pa'i 'gro ba tshig las sems dang ldan pa nyid dang du ba la sogs pa las me la sogs pa @31b rjes su dpog pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag gis gtan tshigs la khyab par ma bstan pa kho nar lung mi shes pa'i 'gro ba tshig las sems dang ldan pa nyid dang du ba la sogs pa las me la sogs pa @31b rjes su dpog pa yin no //
translated: They are inferred from the mind and from smoke, etc., respectively, because they are not taught by scripture alone.üîΩ

original: de'i phyir dpe la bsgrub bya 'ba' zhig gis khyab par bstan pa'i gtan tshigs ni lung shes pa la yang go bar byed pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir dpe la bsgrub bya 'ba' zhig gis khyab par bstan pa'i gtan tshigs ni lung shes pa la yang go bar byed pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the reason that is shown to pervade the example by the probandum alone is the means of comprehending the scriptural knowledge.

original: skye bo gzhan la yang de khyad par yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: skye bo gzhan la yang de khyad par yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: And it is not the case that there is a difference in the other person.

original: go bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs lung shes pa la ni rnam pa gzhan du gyur la lung mi shes pa la yang rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: go bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs lung shes pa la ni rnam pa gzhan du gyur la lung mi shes pa la yang rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
translated: The reason that is the means of comprehension is different for the one who knows the scripture, but it is not different for the one who does not know the scripture.

original: 'on kyang de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung bdag gis go bar byed pa ni gnyi ga la yang khyad par med do //
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung bdag gis go bar byed pa ni gnyi ga la yang khyad par med do //
translated: However, the means of comprehension by the identity and origination from that are not different for either of them.

original: 'di'i phyir yang khyad par med pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i phyir yang khyad par med pa yin te /
translated: For this reason also, there is no difference.

original: 'di ltar rang bzhin 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan can med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid mi 'khrul bas na /üîΩkhyab par byed pa ngo bo dang / rgyu dag sgrub par byed pa'i don khyab par bya ba rang bzhin dang 'bras bu zhes bya ba go bar byed pa yin par ni 'ga'i smra ba la gnod kyang /
analyzed: 'di ltar rang bzhin 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan can med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid mi 'khrul bas na / khyab par byed pa ngo bo dang / rgyu dag sgrub par byed pa'i don khyab par bya ba rang bzhin dang 'bras bu zhes bya ba go bar byed pa yin par ni 'ga'i smra ba la gnod kyang /
translated: Thus, if there is no reason of natural relation, there is no invariable concomitance.üîΩTherefore, the pervasion of the essence and the cause, which are the pervader, and the object to be established, which is the pervaded, are understood to be called natural relation and effect.

original: de'i bdag nyid dang de'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid las ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid dang de'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid las ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: However, even if one's words are impaired, the essence of that nature and the result cannot be reversed.

original: gal te lung la gnod pas rang gi ngo bo las ldog par 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te lung la gnod pas rang gi ngo bo las ldog par 'gyur na ni /
translated: If the nature were reversed due to impairment of scripture,

original: lung shes ba'am gzhan la gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lung shes ba'am gzhan la gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: scripture would not be a reason for others.

original: 'di snyam du gal te ngo bo nyid las ldog par mi 'gyur ba de lta na yang lung la gnod na gtan tshigs kyis lung shes pa rtogs par byed mi nus so snyam du dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'di snyam du gal te ngo bo nyid las ldog par mi 'gyur ba de lta na yang lung la gnod na gtan tshigs kyis lung shes pa rtogs par byed mi nus so snyam du dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: If one thinks, Even if the nature cannot be reversed, if scripture is impaired, the reason cannot prove the understanding of scripture, to dispel that doubt, it is explained:

original: gtan tshigs de ni med na mi 'byung ba mi 'khrul ba nyid yin par rtogs pa dag go //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de ni med na mi 'byung ba mi 'khrul ba nyid yin par rtogs pa dag go //
translated: The reason is the invariable concomitance of the absence of the reason with the absence of the probandum.

original: gang dang zhe na /
analyzed: gang dang zhe na /
translated: With what?

original: 'dod pa ste 'dod cing shes par 'dod pa dang ngo //
analyzed: 'dod pa ste 'dod cing shes par 'dod pa dang ngo //
translated: With the probandum, which is desired, i.e., wished for, and known.

original: gtan tshigs des rtogs pa yin na bsgrub par bya ba ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin /
analyzed: gtan tshigs des rtogs pa yin na bsgrub par bya ba ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin /
translated: If the probandum is known by means of the reason, how is it not known by the reason?

original: rung ba tsam gyis ni sgron ma bzhin du gtan tshigs rjes su dpag par bya ba go bar byed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rung ba tsam gyis ni sgron ma bzhin du gtan tshigs rjes su dpag par bya ba go bar byed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The reason does not make the probandum understood by mere suitability, like a lamp,

original: 'on kyang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i don dang med na mi 'byung ba nyid du nges pas so //
analyzed: 'on kyang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i don dang med na mi 'byung ba nyid du nges pas so //
translated: but rather by the certainty of the invariable concomitance of the reason with the probandum.

original: med na mi 'byung ba nges pa las gzhan pa me rtogs par byed pa'i bya ba ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nges pa las gzhan pa me rtogs par byed pa'i bya ba ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Apart from the certainty of the invariable concomitance, there is no other activity of the reason in making the probandum known.

original: du ba de ni rang bzhin 'brel bas me med na mi 'gyur ba nyid du grub bar 'gyur bde tsam gyis me rtogs pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du lung shes pa yang rang bzhin 'brel ba'i rtags rtogs ba nyid ni bsgrub bya rtogs pa yin te /üîΩdes na lung la gnod pa'i gtan tshigs kyis lung shes pa bsgrub bya @32a * //
analyzed: du ba de ni rang bzhin 'brel bas me med na mi 'gyur ba nyid du grub bar 'gyur bde tsam gyis me rtogs pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du lung shes pa yang rang bzhin 'brel ba'i rtags rtogs ba nyid ni bsgrub bya rtogs pa yin te / des na lung la gnod pa'i gtan tshigs kyis lung shes pa bsgrub bya @32a * //
translated: In the same way, the realization of the reason that is related by nature to the object to be established is the realization of the object to be established.

original: rtogs par mi 'gyur ro zhes ci ste brjod /
analyzed: rtogs par mi 'gyur ro zhes ci ste brjod /
translated: Therefore, how can you say that the realization of the object to be established by the reason that refutes scripture is the realization of the knowledge of scripture?

original: 'di snyam du lung shes pa des mngon par 'dod pa'i phyogs gtan tshigs des bsal ba yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di snyam du lung shes pa des mngon par 'dod pa'i phyogs gtan tshigs des bsal ba yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: You might think as follows: The knowledge of scripture is eliminated by that reason that is asserted by the opponent.

original: don gang dang yang med na mi 'byung ba mthong ba med la /
analyzed: don gang dang yang med na mi 'byung ba mthong ba med la /
translated: Therefore, since there is no seeing of anything that is invariably related to the object,üîΩand since there is the seeing of error, one should not accept the knowledge of scripture as a reason.

original: 'khrul pa mthong ba'i phyir lung shes ba gtan tshigs khas len par yang mi byed do snyam du dogs pa dgag pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'khrul pa mthong ba'i phyir lung shes ba gtan tshigs khas len par yang mi byed do snyam du dogs pa dgag pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: To prevent such qualms, the text says:

original: gal te bstan bcos la lar dngos po 'ga' zhig rigs pa ma yin pa des na gtan tshigs des dgag bar bya ba yin pa de tsam gyis rigs pa smra ba'i gtan tshigs gzhan pa dag kyang ci ste khyod kyis dgag par bya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te bstan bcos la lar dngos po 'ga' zhig rigs pa ma yin pa des na gtan tshigs des dgag bar bya ba yin pa de tsam gyis rigs pa smra ba'i gtan tshigs gzhan pa dag kyang ci ste khyod kyis dgag par bya bar 'gyur /
translated: If, in some treatise, some thing is refuted by an illogical reason, why do you refute the other reasons of the proponent of logic?

original: dbang phyug la mi rigs pa smras pa gcig gang gis bzlog pa de la dbang phyug khros na rigs pa smra ba brgya yang zlog par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni rgyal rigs kyi lugs yin no //
analyzed: dbang phyug la mi rigs pa smras pa gcig gang gis bzlog pa de la dbang phyug khros na rigs pa smra ba brgya yang zlog par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni rgyal rigs kyi lugs yin no //
translated: If one refutes ƒ™≈õvara, and ƒ™≈õvara is angry with the one who refutes him, then even if a hundred proponents of logic refute him, he will still refute them. This is the way of the k·π£atriyas.

original: lung la gnod par byed pa spong ba'i lung shes pa la ni 'ga' sgrub par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lung la gnod par byed pa spong ba'i lung shes pa la ni 'ga' sgrub par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If one is knowledgeable about scripture, one will not be harmed by scripture.

original: gang gi phyir lung las mthong ba gcig phyin ci log pas khyab pas kyang gal te sgrub byed de lung la gnod pa byed par 'gyur bas de'i lung la gnod par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyis khyab par bstan dgos na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir lung las mthong ba gcig phyin ci log pas khyab pas kyang gal te sgrub byed de lung la gnod pa byed par 'gyur bas de'i lung la gnod par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyis khyab par bstan dgos na /
translated: Because it is pervaded by the fact that whatever is seen in a scripture is mistaken, if the proof is to invalidate the scripture, then in order to avoid invalidating the scripture, it would be necessary to teach that the scripture pervades everything.

original: de ltar ni bya bar mi nus so zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar ni bya bar mi nus so zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: But it is explained that it is not possible to do that:

original: lung las mthong ba'i don rnams thams cad mtshungs byas nas te /
analyzed: lung las mthong ba'i don rnams thams cad mtshungs byas nas te /
translated: Because it is not possible to take all the objects seen in the scripture as similar

original: dpe la yod pa la nye bar bstan nas rtags su bya bar ni mi nus te /
analyzed: dpe la yod pa la nye bar bstan nas rtags su bya bar ni mi nus te /
translated: and teach them as an example and then make them the reason.

original: bstan bcos la mthong ba'i chos thams cad kyis khyab pa ni 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos la mthong ba'i chos thams cad kyis khyab pa ni 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is not a single phenomenon seen in the treatise that is pervaded by all.

original: des na gtan tshigs kun la lung shes pa'i bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed bzhag pa nyams par 'gyur ro /
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs kun la lung shes pa'i bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed bzhag pa nyams par 'gyur ro /
translated: Therefore the statement of the probandum and the proof that is known from the scripture is undermined in all arguments.

original: des na lung la gnod kyang lung la gnas pa dang mi gnas pa'i gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: des na lung la gnod kyang lung la gnas pa dang mi gnas pa'i gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: Therefore, even though the scripture is undermined, the argument is based on the scripture and is not based on it.

original: de'i phyir lung la ltos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir lung la ltos pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore it does not rely on the scripture.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir gtan tshigs lung la ltos pa med par nus pa yin par de'i phyir skabs su bab pa nyid bsgrub bya yin pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba de la gnod par byed pa yang 'gal ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir gtan tshigs lung la ltos pa med par nus pa yin par de'i phyir skabs su bab pa nyid bsgrub bya yin pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba de la gnod par byed pa yang 'gal ba yin gyi /
translated: Therefore means that because the reason is capable of being stated without relying on scripture, therefore the present case is the probandum and the refutation of that probandum is contradictory.

original: bsgrub bar bya ba ma yin pa la gnod pa ni ma yin no //üîΩde nyid kyi phyir gnod bya gnod byed ma yin ba mi rtag pa dang nam mkha'i yon tan ma yin pa nyid dag sgrub par byed pa gcig /
analyzed: bsgrub bar bya ba ma yin pa la gnod pa ni ma yin no // de nyid kyi phyir gnod bya gnod byed ma yin ba mi rtag pa dang nam mkha'i yon tan ma yin pa nyid dag sgrub par byed pa gcig /
translated: But it is not that the refutation of what is not the probandum is contradictory.

original: @32b las grub pa ni skabs kyi bsgrub bya la gnod pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: @32b las grub pa ni skabs kyi bsgrub bya la gnod pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba med pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the establishment of impermanence and the non-quality of space are not contradictory because they do not refute what is to be established in the present context.

original: 'gal ba med kyang gal te bstan bcos la gnod pas 'gal bar khas len na'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba med kyang gal te bstan bcos la gnod pas 'gal bar khas len na'o //
translated: Even if they are not contradictory, if one asserts that they are contradictory because they contradict treatises,

original: yul la gzhan zhes bya ba'i don gnyis te /
analyzed: yul la gzhan zhes bya ba'i don gnyis te /
translated: there are two meanings of the term other object.

original: gtan tshigs gzhan gyi yul la gtan tshigs gzhan gyis lung la gnod par byas pa dang / dri la sogs pa chos can yul gzhan la bstan bcos la gnod par byas ba gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs gzhan gyi yul la gtan tshigs gzhan gyis lung la gnod par byas pa dang / dri la sogs pa chos can yul gzhan la bstan bcos la gnod par byas ba gang yin pa ste /
translated: and the reason that the other object is harmed by the other reason, and the reason that the object, smell, etc., is harmed by the treatise.

original: de ltar gyur pa na yang bstan bcos la gnod par khyad par med pa'i phyir gtan tshigs 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa na yang bstan bcos la gnod par khyad par med pa'i phyir gtan tshigs 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And even if that were the case, because there would be no difference in the harm to the treatise, the reason would be contradictory.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan gyi sgra zhes bya ba'i chos can de nyid la /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan gyi sgra zhes bya ba'i chos can de nyid la /
translated: The reason, ‚Äúbecause it arises immediately after effort, etc.,‚Äù has the subject, ‚Äúthe sound of another‚Äôs voice.‚Äù

original: nam mkha'i yon tan la sogs pa gnod par byas na yang gzhan gyis byas pa'i gnod pa bzod pa'i phyir ji ltar rang gis gnod par byas ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan la sogs pa gnod par byas na yang gzhan gyis byas pa'i gnod pa bzod pa'i phyir ji ltar rang gis gnod par byas ba de bzhin du /
translated: Even if the qualities of space, etc., were to harm it, because it would tolerate the harm done by another, just as it is harmed by itself,

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyi don du bkod pa'i byas pa 'gal bar 'gyur la ;
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyi don du bkod pa'i byas pa 'gal bar 'gyur la ;
translated: the produced, which is set forth for the sake of impermanence, would be contradictory.

original: de bzhin du skabs su bab pa'i chos can la bstan bcos gnod par byas pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du skabs su bab pa'i chos can la bstan bcos gnod par byas pa de bzhin du /
translated: And likewise, just as the treatise harms the subject in question,

original: skabs ma yin pa'i dri la sogs pa'i chos can la sa'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa'i chos gnod par byas pas 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skabs ma yin pa'i dri la sogs pa'i chos can la sa'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa'i chos gnod par byas pas 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The reason is contradictory because it contradicts the property of the subject, such as the property of earth, in an improper subject, such as sound.

original: mjug bsdu ba'i sgo nas gtan tshigs gzhan gyis bstan bcos bkag pa byas nas yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di khyad par du 'phags par bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: mjug bsdu ba'i sgo nas gtan tshigs gzhan gyis bstan bcos bkag pa byas nas yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di khyad par du 'phags par bstan pa yin te /
translated: Having refuted the treatise by means of another reason, he concludes by teaching that this is contradictory.

original: des na zlos par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: des na zlos par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no redundancy.

original: de nyid kyi phyir des de nyid la gnod na zhes smos so //
