analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir des de nyid la gnod na zhes smos so //
translated: That is why he says, ‚ÄúIf it contradicts itself.‚Äù

original: nyid kyi sgra ni gnyi ga dang 'brel to //
analyzed: nyid kyi sgra ni gnyi ga dang 'brel to //
translated: The word ‚Äúitself‚Äù is related to both.

original: gtan tshigs de nyid kyis gnod par byas na gtan tshigs 'gal bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gtan tshigs de nyid kyis gnod par byas na gtan tshigs 'gal bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: If the reason contradicts itself, then the reason is contradictory.

original: gtan tshigs gzhan gyis gnod pa byas pas ni de 'gal ba ma yin la /
analyzed: gtan tshigs gzhan gyis gnod pa byas pas ni de 'gal ba ma yin la /
translated: If it is contradicted by another reason, then it is not contradictory.

original: de bzhin du skabs su bab pa'i chos can de nyid la bkag na gtan tshigs 'gal bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de bzhin du skabs su bab pa'i chos can de nyid la bkag na gtan tshigs 'gal bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: Similarly, if it contradicts itself in the proper subject, then the reason is contradictory.

original: chos can gzhan la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: chos can gzhan la ni ma yin te /
translated: If it is not in the proper subject, then it is not contradictory.

original: dri la sogs pa'i chos can gzhan de bsgrub par bya ba ma yin na /
analyzed: dri la sogs pa'i chos can gzhan de bsgrub par bya ba ma yin na /
translated: If the subject, such as smell, is not to be established,

original: de'i chos kyang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa la gnod kyang 'gal ba ma yin pa'i zhe na /üîΩgtan tshigs thams zhe na /
analyzed: de'i chos kyang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa la gnod kyang 'gal ba ma yin pa'i zhe na / gtan tshigs thams zhe na /
translated: then its property also is not to be established, and if it is not to be established, then even if it is refuted, it is not contradictory.

original: gtan tshigs thams @33a * //
analyzed: gtan tshigs thams @33a * //
translated: All reasons are either contradictory or nonestablished.

original: cad kyi skyon dang yon tan gang yin pa de dag ni rang gi bsgrub bya la ltos nas bsam par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cad kyi skyon dang yon tan gang yin pa de dag ni rang gi bsgrub bya la ltos nas bsam par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The faults and good qualities of all reasons are to be considered in terms of their own probandum.

original: rang gi bsgrub bya sgrub bar byed pa nyid kyis ni gtan tshigs yon tan can yin la /
analyzed: rang gi bsgrub bya sgrub bar byed pa nyid kyis ni gtan tshigs yon tan can yin la /
translated: A reason is good if it establishes its own probandum.

original: de sel na ni skyon can yin no //
analyzed: de sel na ni skyon can yin no //
translated: If it does not, it is faulty.

original: sgrub par byed ba de rang gi bsgrub par bya ba 'gog pa ma yin yang bstan bcos la gnod pa'i phyir 'gal bar khas len pa yin na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed ba de rang gi bsgrub par bya ba 'gog pa ma yin yang bstan bcos la gnod pa'i phyir 'gal bar khas len pa yin na /
translated: If you accept that a proof is contradictory because it contradicts a treatise, even though it does not contradict its own probandum,

original: bstan bcos la gnod pa de ni gtan tshigs gzhan gyis byas par gyur na yang byas pa nyid de la yod pa'i phyir 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos la gnod pa de ni gtan tshigs gzhan gyis byas par gyur na yang byas pa nyid de la yod pa'i phyir 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If that fault of the treatise is made by another reason, then it would be contradictory because it exists in that which is to be done.

original: cig shes byis smras pa /
analyzed: cig shes byis smras pa /
translated: A foolish person says:

original: gtan tshigs gzhan gyis bstan bcos la gnod pa byas na yang dam bca' ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba kho na'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gzhan gyis bstan bcos la gnod pa byas na yang dam bca' ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba kho na'o //
translated: Even if the fault of the treatise is made by another reason, it is only a fault of the thesis.

original: gtan tshigs kyi skyon ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi skyon ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is not a fault of the reason. This is the meaning.

original: de la mdor bsdus ba ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la mdor bsdus ba ni 'di yin te /
translated: In brief, this is it:

original: dam bca' ba ni gal te gtan tshigs de nyid dam de las gzhan gyis bsal ba yin yang rung ste /
analyzed: dam bca' ba ni gal te gtan tshigs de nyid dam de las gzhan gyis bsal ba yin yang rung ste /
translated: If the thesis is refuted by that very reason or by another,

original: de rjes su dpag pas gnod pa yin no //üîΩgnod par byed pa'i 'gal ba ci yang byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mi rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: de rjes su dpag pas gnod pa yin no // gnod par byed pa'i 'gal ba ci yang byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mi rigs so zhe na /
translated: it is refuted by inference.üîΩIt is not tenable to say that it is not at all contradicted by a contradictor.

original: bshad pa / dam bca' ba'i skyon yin gyi gtan tshigs kyi skyon ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: bshad pa / dam bca' ba'i skyon yin gyi gtan tshigs kyi skyon ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur mod /
translated: NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds: It is indeed the case that it is a fault of the thesis, but it is not a fault of the reason.

original: 'on kyang ji ltar skabs su bab pa'i chos can de nyid la gtan tshigs gzhan gyis nam mkha'i yon tan nyid bzlog na dam bca' ba'i skyon yin pa de bzhin du dril la sa'i yon tan nyid gtan tshigs gzhan gyis bzlog na yang sgra mi rtag pa rab
analyzed: 'on kyang ji ltar skabs su bab pa'i chos can de nyid la gtan tshigs gzhan gyis nam mkha'i yon tan nyid bzlog na dam bca' ba'i skyon yin pa de bzhin du dril la sa'i yon tan nyid gtan tshigs gzhan gyis bzlog na yang sgra mi rtag pa rab
translated: However, just as it is a fault of the thesis if the property of sound being a quality of space is refuted by another argument, in the same way, if the property of sound being a quality of earth is refuted by another argument, then sound is not established as impermanent.

original: tu sgrub pa'i phyir nye bar bkod pa'i dam bca' ba'i skyon du 'gyur te /
analyzed: tu sgrub pa'i phyir nye bar bkod pa'i dam bca' ba'i skyon du 'gyur te /
translated: However, just as the fault of the thesis is that the reason is refuted by another reason in regard to the very subject that is at issue, that sound is a quality of space, in the same way, the fault of the thesis is that the reason is refuted by another reason in regard to the very subject that is at issue, that sound is a quality of earth, in order to prove that sound is impermanent.

original: gnyi ga ltar yang bstan bcos bkag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang bstan bcos bkag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because both are refuted by treatises.

original: gnod par byas pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i chos can gyi brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gnod par byas pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i chos can gyi brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the subject that possesses a refuted property is stated.

original: skabs su bab pa'i chos can 'di nyid la bstan bcos gnod na dam bcas pa'i skyon du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: skabs su bab pa'i chos can 'di nyid la bstan bcos gnod na dam bcas pa'i skyon du 'gyur gyi /
translated: If the treatise refutes the very subject that is at issue, then that is the fault of the thesis.

original: dri la sogs pa skabs ma yin pa gzhan la gtan tshigs gzhan gyis sa'i yon tan nyid gnod pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dri la sogs pa skabs ma yin pa gzhan la gtan tshigs gzhan gyis sa'i yon tan nyid gnod pas ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that the reason that sound is a quality of earth is refuted by another reason in regard to other subjects such as smell that are not at issue.

original: gang gi phyir skabs kyis chos can bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de'i phyir de'i chos ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang bsgrub bya ma yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir skabs kyis chos can bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de'i phyir de'i chos ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang bsgrub bya ma yin la /
translated: Because the subject is being proven in the context, therefore all of its properties are also not being proven.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos gang yin pa de nyid kyang dam bca' ba la gnod par byed par @33b mngon sum dang rjes su dpag bas gnod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos gang yin pa de nyid kyang dam bca' ba la gnod par byed par @33b mngon sum dang rjes su dpag bas gnod par bya ba yin no //
translated: And whatever property is being proven, that very property contradicts the thesis, and is contradicted by direct perception and inference.

original: skabs ma yin pa'i chos can ni bsgrub bar bya ba ma yin pas de'i chos kyang bsgrub bya ma yin te /
analyzed: skabs ma yin pa'i chos can ni bsgrub bar bya ba ma yin pas de'i chos kyang bsgrub bya ma yin te /
translated: The subject that is not in the context is not being proven, and therefore its property is also not being proven.

original: des na dam bca' ba gnod par byed pas de gnod bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na dam bca' ba gnod par byed pas de gnod bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since the thesis is contradicted, it is not to be contradicted.

original: de'i phyir chos can gzhan la brten pa'i chos ni gtan tshigs gzhan gyis bkag pa yin yang dam bca' ba'i skyon ma yin no zhes dogs na /
analyzed: de'i phyir chos can gzhan la brten pa'i chos ni gtan tshigs gzhan gyis bkag pa yin yang dam bca' ba'i skyon ma yin no zhes dogs na /
translated: If you think that since the property that is based on another subject is refuted by another reason, it is not a fault of the thesis,

original: bshad ba / gnod par bya ba'i don gang la yod pa'i bstan bcos de khas blangs pas na /
analyzed: bshad ba / gnod par bya ba'i don gang la yod pa'i bstan bcos de khas blangs pas na /
translated: then we would reply: Since the treatise that has the object to be contradicted is accepted,

original: skabs ma yin pa gzhan du yang dam bca' ba'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skabs ma yin pa gzhan du yang dam bca' ba'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: And the fault of the thesis would also occur in other contexts that are not the present one.

original: 'di ltar chos can skabs yin pa tsam gyis ni de'i chos thams cad bsgrub bya ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos can skabs yin pa tsam gyis ni de'i chos thams cad bsgrub bya ma yin te /
translated: For, just because the subject is the present context, it is not the case that all of its properties are the object of the present proof.

original: 'on kyang skabs su bab pa gang yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang skabs su bab pa gang yin pa nyid do //
translated: Rather, only those that are relevant to the present context are.

original: bstan bcos khas blangs pa skabs ma yin pa yang bsgrub byar 'gro ba yin na ni /
analyzed: bstan bcos khas blangs pa skabs ma yin pa yang bsgrub byar 'gro ba yin na ni /
translated: If the meaning of the treatise that one accepts were the object of the present proof,

original: bstan bcos khas blangs pa de ni gzhan du yang khyad par med pa'i phyir bsgrub byar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos khas blangs pa de ni gzhan du yang khyad par med pa'i phyir bsgrub byar 'gyur ro //
translated: then since the meaning of the treatise that one accepts would not be different from the other contexts, it would be the object of the present proof.

original: des na ji ltar sgra la nam mkha'i yon tan gtan tshigs gzhan gyis bsal na bstan bcos la gnod pa'i phyir dam bca' ba la gnod ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: des na ji ltar sgra la nam mkha'i yon tan gtan tshigs gzhan gyis bsal na bstan bcos la gnod pa'i phyir dam bca' ba la gnod ba de bzhin du /
translated: Therefore, just as when the property of sound, being an attribute of space, is refuted by another argument, the thesis is undermined because it contradicts the treatise,

original: dri la sa'i yon tan bsal na yang bstan bcos la gnod pa'i phyir ci ste /
analyzed: dri la sa'i yon tan bsal na yang bstan bcos la gnod pa'i phyir ci ste /
translated: then why is the thesis not undermined when the property of smell, being an attribute of earth, is refuted?

original: dam bca' ba la gnod pa yin te /
analyzed: dam bca' ba la gnod pa yin te /
translated: It is because the thesis is undermined.

original: khas blangs pa'i bstan bcos kyi don bkag par khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khas blangs pa'i bstan bcos kyi don bkag par khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no difference between refuting the meaning of the treatise that one accepts and refuting the thesis.

original: gang gi phyir skabs ma yin ba'i chos can la bstan bcos bkag pas kyang dam bca' ba'i skyon du thal ba des na 'di ni de dam bca' ba'i skyon gyi mtshan nyid du mi rigs te /üîΩha cang thal bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir skabs ma yin ba'i chos can la bstan bcos bkag pas kyang dam bca' ba'i skyon du thal ba des na 'di ni de dam bca' ba'i skyon gyi mtshan nyid du mi rigs te / ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: Since the treatise refutes the subject that is not the context, the fault of the thesis follows. Therefore, this is not reasonable as the definition of the fault of the thesis.üîΩBecause of the absurd consequence.

original: ha cad khyab ches pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: ha cad khyab ches pa'i phyir ro//
translated: Because of the over-pervasion.

original: bstan bcos la mthong ba bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin na nyes pa gzhan yang bsags pa'i phyir gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: bstan bcos la mthong ba bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin na nyes pa gzhan yang bsags pa'i phyir gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: If the treatise were to establish what is seen, there would be another fault. Therefore, it says furthermore and so on.

original: lung las mthong ba ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs brjod pa yang dam bca' bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: lung las mthong ba ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs brjod pa yang dam bca' bar 'gyur te /
translated: The statement of a reason that does not establish what is seen from scripture would also be a thesis,

original: dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has the characteristics of a thesis.

original: dper na sgra mi rtag ste //
analyzed: dper na sgra mi rtag ste //
translated: For example, Sound is impermanent,

original: ldan pa dang rnam par dbye ba las skyes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sgrub par byed pa ldan pa dang / rnam par dbye ba las skyes pa ma grub pas /
analyzed: ldan pa dang rnam par dbye ba las skyes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sgrub par byed pa ldan pa dang / rnam par dbye ba las skyes pa ma grub pas /
translated: because it arises from conjunction and disjunction, the proof of arising from conjunction and disjunction is not established.

original: de brjod pa yang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro //üîΩkho na zhes tshig phrad brjod bas na sgrub byed du 'dod pa spangs pa'i phyir skyon @34a * //
analyzed: de brjod pa yang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro // kho na zhes tshig phrad brjod bas na sgrub byed du 'dod pa spangs pa'i phyir skyon @34a * //
translated: And if it is stated, it becomes a thesis.

original: 'di med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'di med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that this fault does not exist because the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is stated, and because the proof is accepted,

original: the tshom za ba rgol bas bsgrub byar 'dod pa ni bsgrub byar rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: the tshom za ba rgol bas bsgrub byar 'dod pa ni bsgrub byar rigs pa yin no //
translated: then it is correct to accept that which is doubted by the opponent as the thesis.

original: bstan bcos las mthong ba'i don yang gzhan la ma grub ba dang / bstan bcos khas blangs bas rgol bas bsgrub byar yang 'dod pa yin pa des na gang gis zlog par byed pa 'ga'i tshig kyang gzhan du 'gyur bar mi nus te /
analyzed: bstan bcos las mthong ba'i don yang gzhan la ma grub ba dang / bstan bcos khas blangs bas rgol bas bsgrub byar yang 'dod pa yin pa des na gang gis zlog par byed pa 'ga'i tshig kyang gzhan du 'gyur bar mi nus te /
translated: And since the meaning of the treatise is not established for the other, and since the opponent also accepts the thesis by accepting the treatise, then by what means could the words of some be reversed?

original: de'i phyir tshig phrad pa smos pa ni don med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir tshig phrad pa smos pa ni don med par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the statement of the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù would be meaningless,

original: rigs pas tshig la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs pas tshig la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the meaning contradicts the words.

original: bstan bcos las mthong ba bsgrub bya yin na rang gi sgra yang don med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bstan bcos las mthong ba bsgrub bya yin na rang gi sgra yang don med par 'gyur te /
translated: If the meaning of the treatise were the thesis, then its own words would be meaningless.

original: phyogs kyi mtshan nyid las phyi rol du gyur pa'i brjod par bya ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs kyi mtshan nyid las phyi rol du gyur pa'i brjod par bya ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the subject matter is external to the definition of a position.

original: 'di ni brjod par bya ba ni phyogs kyi ngo bo ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni brjod par bya ba ni phyogs kyi ngo bo ma yin te /
translated: The subject matter is not the nature of a position,

original: 'on kyang bla lhag pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang bla lhag pa yin no //
translated: but rather it is superior to it.

original: des na dgos pa med bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na dgos pa med bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it would be purposeless.

original: don med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: don med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not purposeless,

original: 'on kyang bstan bcos mang po dag la rgol ba 'dod pas 'jug ba'i don du yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang bstan bcos mang po dag la rgol ba 'dod pas 'jug ba'i don du yin te /
translated: but rather it is for the purpose of engaging in many treatises through desire for debate,

original: rtsod pa'i dus su khas blangs pa'i bstan bcos kyang dor nas 'dod pas gzhan blang bar bya'o zhes bstan ba'i don du rang gi sgra smos pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtsod pa'i dus su khas blangs pa'i bstan bcos kyang dor nas 'dod pas gzhan blang bar bya'o zhes bstan ba'i don du rang gi sgra smos pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: because it is taught that even a treatise accepted in the time of debate should be abandoned and another accepted through desire. The word ‚Äúown‚Äù is used for the purpose of teaching that.

original: dgag pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: dgag pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: To refute that, it is said:

original: gang gis de'i zhes bya ba 'dod pas 'jug pa'i don du 'bad par byed pa mi 'dod bzhin du 'jug pa'i dogs pa gang las yin /
analyzed: gang gis de'i zhes bya ba 'dod pas 'jug pa'i don du 'bad par byed pa mi 'dod bzhin du 'jug pa'i dogs pa gang las yin /
translated: By whom is there desire to engage for the purpose of engaging in that? From what is there fear of engaging unwillingly?

original: dogs pa med par ni rnam par bcad pa lhur byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi ngag yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dogs pa med par ni rnam par bcad pa lhur byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi ngag yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And without doubt, there is no statement that is intent on exclusion.

original: 'di 'dra ba'i dogs pa'i sa bon ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di 'dra ba'i dogs pa'i sa bon ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: And there is no seed of such doubt.

original: 'di ltar lung gi yul yongs su byang bar byed pa'i tshad ma nyid rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar lung gi yul yongs su byang bar byed pa'i tshad ma nyid rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug par byed pa yin la /
translated: For, the valid cognition that purifies the domain of scripture is the engaging cause,

original: gnod par byed pa yang ldog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa yang ldog par byed pa yin no //
translated: and the refutation is the disengaging cause.

original: des na gal te yul yongs su sbyong ba'i tshad mas ma bzlog na de sus kyang tshig gis bzlog par mi nus la /
analyzed: des na gal te yul yongs su sbyong ba'i tshad mas ma bzlog na de sus kyang tshig gis bzlog par mi nus la /
translated: Therefore, if the domain is not refuted by the valid cognition that purifies it, then no one can refute it with words.

original: tshad mas bzlog cing bgag na yang tshig gis 'jug par byed mi nus te /
analyzed: tshad mas bzlog cing bgag na yang tshig gis 'jug par byed mi nus te /
translated: And if it is refuted and blocked by valid cognition, then words cannot engage it.

original: tshig ni 'jug par byed ba dang ldog par byed pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir rang gi sgra ni don med do //
analyzed: tshig ni 'jug par byed ba dang ldog par byed pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir rang gi sgra ni don med do //
translated: For it is not reasonable that words both engage and disengage. Therefore, one‚Äôs own words are meaningless.

original: 'di snyam du rang gi rang nyid bdag nyid kyis sgrub pa gang yin pa de chos can yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di snyam du rang gi rang nyid bdag nyid kyis sgrub pa gang yin pa de chos can yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: One might think that that which is established by itself is the subject, and not anything else.

original: nyams su myong ba ni don gyi ngo bo la rag las pa yin te /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba ni don gyi ngo bo la rag las pa yin te /
translated: Experience depends on the nature of the object.

original: des na nyams su myong bas grub pa ni rang gis grub pa yin no//
analyzed: des na nyams su myong bas grub pa ni rang gis grub pa yin no//
translated: Therefore, what is established by experience is established by itself.

original: @34b rtog pa ni don gyi ngo bo la rag las pa ma yin te /
analyzed: @34b rtog pa ni don gyi ngo bo la rag las pa ma yin te /
translated: Imagination does not depend on the nature of the object.

original: des na des grub pa ni rang gis grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na des grub pa ni rang gis grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, what is established by it is not established by itself.

original: rang gis grub pa'i chos can la 'dod pa'i chos gang yin pa de bsgrub bya yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan pa'i phyir rang nyid kyi sgra yin no zhes gang smras pa ni /
analyzed: rang gis grub pa'i chos can la 'dod pa'i chos gang yin pa de bsgrub bya yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan pa'i phyir rang nyid kyi sgra yin no zhes gang smras pa ni /
translated: In order to demonstrate the meaning of the thesis, namely, that the property to be established is whatever property is accepted with regard to a subject that is established by itself, he says, ‚ÄúThe word ‚Äòitself‚Äô . . .‚Äù

original: rang nyid kyi sgras zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no //
analyzed: rang nyid kyi sgras zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no //
translated: In response to this, BhƒÅviveka says, ‚ÄúThe word ‚Äòitself‚Äô . . . ‚Äù

original: grub mtha'i mtshan nyid kyis shes par byas pa'i khyad par gyi chos can nam mkha'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang rnam par dbye ba las skyes pa'i sgra zhes bya ba lta bu'i chos can de yongs su spangs nas rang nyid kyis rab tu grub ba gzung bar
analyzed: grub mtha'i mtshan nyid kyis shes par byas pa'i khyad par gyi chos can nam mkha'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang rnam par dbye ba las skyes pa'i sgra zhes bya ba lta bu'i chos can de yongs su spangs nas rang nyid kyis rab tu grub ba gzung bar
translated: Having rejected a subject that is qualified by the definition of a philosophical tenet, such as ‚Äúsound that possesses the quality of space‚Äù or ‚Äúsound that arises from a particular arrangement of parts,‚Äù one should apprehend a subject that is established by itself.

original: bya'o zhes rab tu grags pa'i chos can yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ro zhes gzhan dag smra'o //
analyzed: bya'o zhes rab tu grags pa'i chos can yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ro zhes gzhan dag smra'o //
translated: Others say that the subject is well known in the sense that it is well known in the world, and that the word ‚Äúshould‚Äù is used in the sense of ‚Äúis.‚ÄùüîΩNƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds:

original: bshad pa / de la yang rang nyid kyi sgra don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / de la yang rang nyid kyi sgra don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the word itself would be meaningless.

original: gang gi phyir rnam par dpyod pa'i skabs nyid kyis gzhi chos can rab tu grags pa nyams su myong bas grub pa yin par grub pa shes pa yin pa de'i phyir dgos pa 'di ni 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam par dpyod pa'i skabs nyid kyis gzhi chos can rab tu grags pa nyams su myong bas grub pa yin par grub pa shes pa yin pa de'i phyir dgos pa 'di ni 'thad pa yin no //
translated: The reason for this is that the subject, the basis of the analysis, is established by experience and is well known. Therefore, this purpose is tenable.

original: chos can ni rnam par dpyod pa'i rten yin na grub pa'i mtha' las grags pa ni dpyod pa'i rten ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can ni rnam par dpyod pa'i rten yin na grub pa'i mtha' las grags pa ni dpyod pa'i rten ma yin no //
translated: The subject is the basis of analysis, but what is well known in philosophical systems is not the basis of analysis.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rang gis 'dod pas zhes smos te /
analyzed: rang gis 'dod pas zhes smos te /
translated: The text says, ‚Äúbecause of one‚Äôs own assertions.‚Äù

original: rang gis 'dod pas brtags pa'i khyad bar gang dag la yod pa'o //
analyzed: rang gis 'dod pas brtags pa'i khyad bar gang dag la yod pa'o //
translated: The subject is that which has the features that are imputed by one‚Äôs own assertions.

original: gzhan yang ji lta bur gyur pa zhig ce na /
analyzed: gzhan yang ji lta bur gyur pa zhig ce na /
translated: Moreover, what is it like?

original: don dgos pa la gtsor te lhur nye bar sbyor ba gang dag yin pa de ltar ma yin pa ni don la gtsor nye bar sbyor ba med pa ste /
analyzed: don dgos pa la gtsor te lhur nye bar sbyor ba gang dag yin pa de ltar ma yin pa ni don la gtsor nye bar sbyor ba med pa ste /
translated: Those that are not primarily applied to the purpose are not applied to the purpose primarily.

original: de dag la'o //
analyzed: de dag la'o //
translated: They are not applied to the purpose primarily.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: skyes bu'i don la nye bar sbyor ba'i don gang yin pa de dag la rtog pa dang ldan pa rnam par dpyod par byed pa yin la don bya ba la nye bar sbyor ba yang nyams su myong bas grub pa'i sgra la sogs pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: skyes bu'i don la nye bar sbyor ba'i don gang yin pa de dag la rtog pa dang ldan pa rnam par dpyod par byed pa yin la don bya ba la nye bar sbyor ba yang nyams su myong bas grub pa'i sgra la sogs pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: Those who are rational and analytical are applied to the purpose of the person, and they are also applied to the purpose of the object, which is established by experience.

original: rang gis 'dod pas brtags pa'i khyad par dag ni ma yin no //üîΩdes na de dag la mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos can rnam par gzhag pa byed pa ni /
analyzed: rang gis 'dod pas brtags pa'i khyad par dag ni ma yin no // des na de dag la mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos can rnam par gzhag pa byed pa ni /
translated: They are not applied to the purpose of the object, which is imagined by their own desire.

original: 'ga' yang gang gis kyang bzlog par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' yang gang gis kyang bzlog par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, no one can refute the presentation of impermanence and so on as the attributes of those objects.

original: gal te don byed pa gang yin pa de nyid khyad par can du grub ba'i mtha' brtags ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te don byed pa gang yin pa de nyid khyad par can du grub ba'i mtha' brtags ba ma yin nam /
translated: If the purpose of an object is established as a specific attribute, is that not imagined by the tenets of a philosophical school?

original: de ci ltar rnam par dpyad par bya ba ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ci ltar rnam par dpyad par bya ba ma yin zhe na /
translated: How can it not be analyzed?

original: de ltar zhes smos so //üîΩgang gi phyir chos can gang zhig rang gi 'dod bas nye bar bkod pa'i rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba @35a * //
analyzed: de ltar zhes smos so // gang gi phyir chos can gang zhig rang gi 'dod bas nye bar bkod pa'i rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba @35a * //
translated: Thus is stated.

original: gnyi ga la ngo bo mtshungs par nyams su myong bar ma grub pa gang yod pa ni khyad par gyi rten gang la yod pa'i tha snyad 'gal ba'i chos khas len pa'i mtshan nyid can de'i rten ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga la ngo bo mtshungs par nyams su myong bar ma grub pa gang yod pa ni khyad par gyi rten gang la yod pa'i tha snyad 'gal ba'i chos khas len pa'i mtshan nyid can de'i rten ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because whatever property-possessor is set forth by the proponent and opponent through their own wishes, whatever is not established as experienced with a similar nature by both the proponent and opponent is not the basis of the convention that has the characteristic of accepting contradictory phenomena that are the basis of distinctions.

original: 'di skad brjod ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod ba yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: gal te rtag ba ma yin pa'i ngo bo mtshungs ba cung zad cig nyams su myong bas grub par 'dod na ni /
analyzed: gal te rtag ba ma yin pa'i ngo bo mtshungs ba cung zad cig nyams su myong bas grub par 'dod na ni /
translated: If a slight similarity of noneternal nature is established through experience,

original: de la don 'di ni rtag ba'am mi rtag pa yin no zhes khyad par gyi rten can gyi tha snyad du 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: de la don 'di ni rtag ba'am mi rtag pa yin no zhes khyad par gyi rten can gyi tha snyad du 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: then the convention that has the basis of distinctions, ‚ÄúThis object is permanent or impermanent,‚Äù would be tenable.

original: gang gi tshe rna bas rtogs par bya ba'i ngo bo la yang gzhan gyis nyams su myong ba las 'das nas rnam pa gzhan du brtags pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rna bas rtogs par bya ba'i ngo bo la yang gzhan gyis nyams su myong ba las 'das nas rnam pa gzhan du brtags pa de'i tshe /
translated: When the nature of the object of auditory perception is also beyond the experience of others, and is imagined in another way,

original: gzhan gyis brtags pa de nyid ma grub pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par bsam bar ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan gyis brtags pa de nyid ma grub pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par bsam bar ga la 'gyur /
translated: then how could the distinction of permanence, etc. be imagined, since that imagined by others is not established?

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: gnyi ga la don byed pa bzod par grub par rnam par dpyad par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: gnyi ga la don byed pa bzod par grub par rnam par dpyad par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: The object that is established by both parties is to be analyzed.

original: gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: But not the other.

original: lung las grub pa ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: lung las grub pa ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: But it is not like that in the case of establishment by scripture.

original: 'on te rang nyid kyi sgras ni rab tu grags pa'i chos can nye bar ston pa yin la /
analyzed: 'on te rang nyid kyi sgras ni rab tu grags pa'i chos can nye bar ston pa yin la /
translated: Or, the word ‚Äúitself‚Äù indicates a commonly known subject.

original: rab tu grags pa de nye bar bstan pa'i sgo nas kyang gzhug lugs kyis grub pa'i chos can rnam par dpyod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rab tu grags pa de nye bar bstan pa'i sgo nas kyang gzhug lugs kyis grub pa'i chos can rnam par dpyod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: And even though that commonly known subject is indicated, the subject established by the method of engagement is not analyzed,

original: de ni dpyod pa'i skabs nyid kyis rnam par dpyad pa grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni dpyod pa'i skabs nyid kyis rnam par dpyad pa grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is established by the very occasion of the analysis.

original: 'on kyang grub ba'i chos can de nyid bsgrub par bya ba ma yin par brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang grub ba'i chos can de nyid bsgrub par bya ba ma yin par brjod pa yin te /
translated: But it is said that the established subject is not to be established.

original: rang nyid kyis grub pa'i chos can ni bsgrub par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to zhe na /
analyzed: rang nyid kyis grub pa'i chos can ni bsgrub par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to zhe na /
translated: The meaning is that a subject that is established by itself is not to be established.

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: That is also not so.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it not so?

original: rang gi ngo bo kho nar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo kho nar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says ‚Äúonly in its own nature,‚Äù etc.

original: mtshan nyid kyi phyogs gcig po 'di nyid kyis grub pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin par rtogs par shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi phyogs gcig po 'di nyid kyis grub pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin par rtogs par shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is understood that this one characteristic aspect is established and not to be established.

original: ci'i phyir rtogs she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rtogs she na /
translated: Why is it understood?

original: grub pa dang zhes smos te /
analyzed: grub pa dang zhes smos te /
translated: He says ‚Äúestablished and the proof,‚Äù etc.

original: gang gi phyir grub pa dang sgrub par byed pa de dag gi ngo bor bstan pa phyogs yin par dogs pa yod na bsgrub par bya ba kho nar bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ngag 'di grub pa dang sgrub byed dag bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin pa sel
analyzed: gang gi phyir grub pa dang sgrub par byed pa de dag gi ngo bor bstan pa phyogs yin par dogs pa yod na bsgrub par bya ba kho nar bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ngag 'di grub pa dang sgrub byed dag bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin pa sel
translated: If there were doubt that the nature of those two, the established and the proof, is the thesis, then this statement ‚Äúonly the probandum is taught‚Äù would eliminate the established and the proof being the probandum.

original: bas 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bas 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore it would have a result.

original: des na grub ba'i chos can bsgrub bya nyid yin pa ni 'di kho na nyid kyis bsal ba na grub pa bsgrub byar thal ba med pas de bzlog pa'i phyir rang nyid smos pa 'di don med do //
analyzed: des na grub ba'i chos can bsgrub bya nyid yin pa ni 'di kho na nyid kyis bsal ba na grub pa bsgrub byar thal ba med pas de bzlog pa'i phyir rang nyid smos pa 'di don med do //
translated: Therefore, when this very fact refutes the fact that the established subject is the thesis, then since there is no entailment that the established is the thesis, it is pointless to mention it in order to refute that.

original: dgos pa gzhan @35b smras pa ni rang nyid kyi sgras rang nyid grub pa'i chos can yongs su gzung bar ma brjod na rgol ba 'ga' zhig chos can nyid bsgrub byar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dgos pa gzhan @35b smras pa ni rang nyid kyi sgras rang nyid grub pa'i chos can yongs su gzung bar ma brjod na rgol ba 'ga' zhig chos can nyid bsgrub byar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: As for the other purpose that is stated, if one does not say that the term ‚Äúitself‚Äù indicates that the established subject is taken to be the thesis, then some opponents would make the subject itself the thesis.

original: des na rab tu grags pa nye bar bstan pas rab tu grub pa'i chos can gang yin pa de bsgrub bya ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di brjod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: des na rab tu grags pa nye bar bstan pas rab tu grub pa'i chos can gang yin pa de bsgrub bya ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di brjod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, this does not express the meaning that whatever is an established subject is not the thesis because it is indicated to be well known.

original: 'on kyang chos can gang yin pa ni rab tu grub pa kho na yin gyi bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no zhes dogs pa la ma yin te zhes 'gog par byed do //
analyzed: 'on kyang chos can gang yin pa ni rab tu grub pa kho na yin gyi bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no zhes dogs pa la ma yin te zhes 'gog par byed do //
translated: However, it is in response to the qualm, ‚ÄúWhatever is the subject is only established and is not the thesis,‚Äù that he says, ‚ÄúNo.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rjes su dpag pa spyi'i yul can yin pa nyid kyis brjod par bya ba'am /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa spyi'i yul can yin pa nyid kyis brjod par bya ba'am /
translated: because inference is a universal subject,

original: dgos pa'i don gang yin ba rtogs pa'i don rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgos pa'i don gang yin ba rtogs pa'i don rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: it is the cause for understanding the meaning of the expression or the purpose.

original: gal te rjes su dpag pa spyi'i yul can yin du chug mod /
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag pa spyi'i yul can yin du chug mod /
translated: Even if we grant that inference is a universal subject,

original: de tsam gyis chos can bsgrub bya ma yin par ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de tsam gyis chos can bsgrub bya ma yin par ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: why does that alone make the subject not a thesis?

original: chos can zhes smos so //
analyzed: chos can zhes smos so //
translated: He says ‚Äúsubject.‚Äù

original: rang gi mtshan nyid bsgrub byar 'gyur na zhes bya ba rang gi mtshan nyid kho na bsgrub byar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid bsgrub byar 'gyur na zhes bya ba rang gi mtshan nyid kho na bsgrub byar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: If the intrinsic identity is the thesis, is not only the intrinsic identity the thesis?

original: ci skad du tshad ma gnyi ga dngos po'i yul can zhes brjod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci skad du tshad ma gnyi ga dngos po'i yul can zhes brjod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: It is said that both valid cognitions have a real object.

original: bden mod kyi /
analyzed: bden mod kyi /
translated: That is true,

original: 'on kyang rjes su dpag pa'i yul ni /
analyzed: 'on kyang rjes su dpag pa'i yul ni /
translated: but the object of inferenceüîΩis not a real thing.

original: 'di ni gzhan du mthong ba ci 'dra ba bud shing rnam par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dro ba'i reg pa'i khyad par 'ga' zhig yin no zhes rjes su 'gro ba'i ngo bo nyid dpe dang thun mong du rtogs pas khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i yul du gyur pa'iüîΩchos can dag la mthong ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni gzhan du mthong ba ci 'dra ba bud shing rnam par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dro ba'i reg pa'i khyad par 'ga' zhig yin no zhes rjes su 'gro ba'i ngo bo nyid dpe dang thun mong du rtogs pas khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i yul du gyur pa'i chos can dag la mthong ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: The subject that is the object of the demonstration of the pervasion is the general nature that is understood in common with the example.

original: de'i so sor nges pa'i khyad par rgyud gzhan las log cing rang gi rgyud la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni rjes su dpag pa'i dus su mi rtogs pa des na spyir bshad par yin no //
analyzed: de'i so sor nges pa'i khyad par rgyud gzhan las log cing rang gi rgyud la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni rjes su dpag pa'i dus su mi rtogs pa des na spyir bshad par yin no //
translated: The specific nature that is ascertained is the opposite of other continua and is present in one‚Äôs own continuum. Since that is not understood at the time of inference, it is explained in general.

original: nam yang mthong ba med pa'i chos can bsgrub bya yin na ni /
analyzed: nam yang mthong ba med pa'i chos can bsgrub bya yin na ni /
translated: If the subject that is the object of affirmation is a phenomenon that is never seen,

original: dpe la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir so sor nges pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid bsgrub byar 'gyur la /
analyzed: dpe la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir so sor nges pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid bsgrub byar 'gyur la /
translated: then because there is no concomitance with the example, the specific nature would be the object of affirmation.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid de yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa la rtags med pa'i phyir spangs zin to //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid de yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa la rtags med pa'i phyir spangs zin to //
translated: And the definition of the subject has already been refuted, because there is no evidence for the existence of something that does not pervade.

original: de'i phyir phyogs kyi mtshan nyid 'dir de skad ces bya ba chos can bsgrub bya nyid bzlog pa'i don can rang nyid kyi sgra ma brjod kyang 'dod pa'i phyogs la 'gal ba cung zad kyang med de /
analyzed: de'i phyir phyogs kyi mtshan nyid 'dir de skad ces bya ba chos can bsgrub bya nyid bzlog pa'i don can rang nyid kyi sgra ma brjod kyang 'dod pa'i phyogs la 'gal ba cung zad kyang med de /
translated: Therefore, in this definition of the thesis, although the word ‚Äúitself‚Äù is not stated, there is no contradiction at all with the thesis that is to be proven, because the subject is reversed.

original: nges pa'i khyad bar phyogs su thal ba ni rjes su dpag pa spyi'i yul can nyid kyis spangs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'on te rnam pa gzhan gyis chos can @36a * //
analyzed: nges pa'i khyad bar phyogs su thal ba ni rjes su dpag pa spyi'i yul can nyid kyis spangs pa'i phyir ro // 'on te rnam pa gzhan gyis chos can @36a * //
translated: The consequence that the specific property of the subject would become the thesis has already been refuted, because the object of inference is a universal.

original: bsgrub bya nyid yin pa ma spangs pa de lta na yang de spangs pa'i phyir phyogs kyi mtshan nyid la rang nyid kyi sgra bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya nyid yin pa ma spangs pa de lta na yang de spangs pa'i phyir phyogs kyi mtshan nyid la rang nyid kyi sgra bya ba ma yin te /
translated: But if the subject is not reversed, and it is the thesis that is to be proven, then the word ‚Äúitself‚Äù is not used in the definition of the thesis, because it is already included.

original: gang gi phyir gang zhig phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyis spang bar bya ba /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang zhig phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyis spang bar bya ba /
translated: Because the subject is not to be refuted by the definition of the thesis.

original: chos can bsgrub bya nyid du byas pas phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du bshad pa /
analyzed: chos can bsgrub bya nyid du byas pas phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du bshad pa /
translated: The point of the explanation is to show that it is not a fault of the position to make the subject the probandum.

original: ci ste 'ga' zhig gis chos can nyid bsgrub byar byas na bsgrub byar byas pa de las cir 'gyur /
analyzed: ci ste 'ga' zhig gis chos can nyid bsgrub byar byas na bsgrub byar byas pa de las cir 'gyur /
translated: If someone makes the subject itself the probandum, what would be the problem with making that the probandum?

original: cig shos kyis smras pa /
analyzed: cig shos kyis smras pa /
translated: The other said:

original: chos can de ni bsgrub byar bya mi nus so //
analyzed: chos can de ni bsgrub byar bya mi nus so //
translated: That subject cannot be made the probandum.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: smras pa / gtan tshigs ni khyad par gzhan na med pa'i chos can dang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: smras pa / gtan tshigs ni khyad par gzhan na med pa'i chos can dang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: It was said: Because the reason does not have a subject that is a different attribute and does not have a pervasion.

original: gal te de lta na 'di ni gtan tshigs dang dpe dag gis zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gal te de lta na 'di ni gtan tshigs dang dpe dag gis zhes bya ba la /
translated: If that is so, then in the statement ‚Äúby reasons and examples,‚Äù

original: gtan tshigs rjes su 'gro ba med pa dang dpe bsgrub byas stong pa'i skyon yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs rjes su 'gro ba med pa dang dpe bsgrub byas stong pa'i skyon yin no //
translated: the reason does not have a pervasion and the example is faulty in that it is empty of the probandum.

original: gang gi phyir dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid kyis yan lag las gzhan du gyur ba'i yan lag phyi ma la ltos pa yin pa de'i phyir yan lag phyi ma'i skyon yin gyi phyogs kyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid kyis yan lag las gzhan du gyur ba'i yan lag phyi ma la ltos pa yin pa de'i phyir yan lag phyi ma'i skyon yin gyi phyogs kyi ni ma yin no //
translated: Because the thesis is different from the members, it relies on the subsequent members. Therefore, the fault belongs to the subsequent members, not to the position.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te skyon 'dis kyang dam bca' ba'i don grub pa'i gegs byed pas dam bca' ba'i skyon yin par brjod na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te skyon 'dis kyang dam bca' ba'i don grub pa'i gegs byed pas dam bca' ba'i skyon yin par brjod na /
translated: If that is not so, then if one says that the fault is a fault of the thesis because it obstructs the establishment of the meaning of the thesis,

original: de'i tshe gtan tshigs dang dpe'i skyon thams cad phyogs nyid kyi skyon yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe gtan tshigs dang dpe'i skyon thams cad phyogs nyid kyi skyon yin par 'gyur te /
translated: then at that time all the faults of the reason and example would be faults of the position,

original: gang gi phyir thams cad du phyogs nyid la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir thams cad du phyogs nyid la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because in all cases the position itself is harmed.

original: thams cad phyogs kyi skyon du 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad phyogs kyi skyon du 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: But it is not asserted that everything is a fault of the position.

original: de'i phyir yan lag phyi ma la mi ltos par de tsam ste phyogs tsam dang rjes su 'brel ba gang yin pa de kho na phyogs kyi skyon yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir yan lag phyi ma la mi ltos par de tsam ste phyogs tsam dang rjes su 'brel ba gang yin pa de kho na phyogs kyi skyon yin te /
translated: Therefore, that much alone, just the position, which is related without relying on the subsequent members, is a fault of the position.

original: dper na sgra mnyan par bya ba ma yin no zhe'am bum pa rtag pa'o zhes brjod pa tsam na mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal bar thal ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sgra mnyan par bya ba ma yin no zhe'am bum pa rtag pa'o zhes brjod pa tsam na mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal bar thal ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the consequence of contradicting direct perception and inference when one merely says, ‚ÄúSound is not to be heard‚Äù or ‚ÄúA pot is permanent.‚Äù

original: gzhan gyis rtogs pa'i phyir dang 'thad pa ma yin pa'i phyir na rang nyid kyi sgra'i don 'di ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis rtogs pa'i phyir dang 'thad pa ma yin pa'i phyir na rang nyid kyi sgra'i don 'di ni ma yin te /
translated: Because it is understood by others and because it is not tenable, this is not the meaning of one‚Äôs own words.

original: rang nyid kyi sgra ni log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i don kho nar yin no //
analyzed: rang nyid kyi sgra ni log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i don kho nar yin no //
translated: One‚Äôs own words are only for the purpose of removing wrong understanding.

original: don 'di nyid bshad pa ni /
analyzed: don 'di nyid bshad pa ni /
translated: This very meaning is explained.

original: rgyu la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bsal bya rnam par gcad par bya ba la ltos pa med par 'dod pa'i yul ma khyab pa dang / ldog pa mi 'dod pa'i yul la ha cang khyab ches pa dag spang ba'i phyir phyogs kyi mtshan nyid brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bsal bya rnam par gcad par bya ba la ltos pa med par 'dod pa'i yul ma khyab pa dang / ldog pa mi 'dod pa'i yul la ha cang khyab ches pa dag spang ba'i phyir phyogs kyi mtshan nyid brjod pa yin no //
translated: The definition of a position is stated in order to avoid the nonpervasion of the object that is asserted without relying on the exclusion of what is to be eliminated by the characteristics of cause and so on, and the overpervasion of the object that does not assert the reverse.

original: tshig @36b gang gis ma khyab pa dang ldog pa spong ba de bshad pa ni /
analyzed: tshig @36b gang gis ma khyab pa dang ldog pa spong ba de bshad pa ni /
translated: The statement that avoids nonpervasion and the reverse is explained.

original: bdag nyid dang / tshig phrad dang / ngo bo zhes bya ba de dag ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid dang / tshig phrad dang / ngo bo zhes bya ba de dag ste /
translated: and the self, and the particle, and the essence, and so on.

original: ma bsal ba dang bcas pa de rnams ni ldog pa ste /
analyzed: ma bsal ba dang bcas pa de rnams ni ldog pa ste /
translated: Those that are not excluded are the negatee.

original: ha cang khyab ches bsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: ha cang khyab ches bsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The exclusion is the preclusion of overpervasion.

original: grub pa dang ma grub kyang sgrub byed nyid du nye bar bkod pa dang / bstan bcos la mthong ba dang / bsal ba mngon par 'dod pa ma yin pa dag phyogs nyid du thal bar ma gyur cig ces tshig 'di rnams nye bar bkod pa byas so //
analyzed: grub pa dang ma grub kyang sgrub byed nyid du nye bar bkod pa dang / bstan bcos la mthong ba dang / bsal ba mngon par 'dod pa ma yin pa dag phyogs nyid du thal bar ma gyur cig ces tshig 'di rnams nye bar bkod pa byas so //
translated: The words ‚Äúestablished‚Äù and ‚Äúnot established‚Äù are used to show that the reason is not inconclusive, and the words ‚Äúin the treatise‚Äù and ‚Äúnot explicitly intended‚Äù are used to show that the reason is not contradictory.

original: 'dod pa'i sgra ni ma khyab pa sel bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i sgra ni ma khyab pa sel bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù excludes the possibility that the reason is not a property of the subject.

original: 'dod pa smos pas ni don de ma brjod du zin kyang skabs kyi rten du gyur pa'i chos ni bsgrub pa yin no zhes ci nas kyang shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa smos pas ni don de ma brjod du zin kyang skabs kyi rten du gyur pa'i chos ni bsgrub pa yin no zhes ci nas kyang shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is used to show that even though the meaning of the thesis is not explicitly stated, the property that is the basis of the context is the probandum.

original: gzhan dag ni smras pa tsam bsgrub byar 'dod pas ma khyab pa la gnod pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni smras pa tsam bsgrub byar 'dod pas ma khyab pa la gnod pa yin no //
translated: Others say that the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is used to show that the reason is not overpervasive.

original: gal te tshig 'di dag ma khyab pa dang khyab ches ba las gnod par byed pa yin na slob dpon gyis phyogs kyi mtshan nyid du /
analyzed: gal te tshig 'di dag ma khyab pa dang khyab ches ba las gnod par byed pa yin na slob dpon gyis phyogs kyi mtshan nyid du /
translated: If these words are faulty because they are not pervasives or are overpervasives, then the master has stated the definition of a premise as follows:

original: gang zhig mngon par bzhed ce na /
analyzed: gang zhig mngon par bzhed ce na /
translated: What is it that is asserted?

original: bshad pa / bsgrub byar khas blangs zhes bya ba 'di ni phyogs kyi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / bsgrub byar khas blangs zhes bya ba 'di ni phyogs kyi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: He says: The definition of a premise is that which is accepted as the probandum.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rigs pa'i sgo las bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa ni phyogs yin no zhes phyogs kyi mtshan nyid bshad do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rigs pa'i sgo las bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa ni phyogs yin no zhes phyogs kyi mtshan nyid bshad do //
translated: Therefore, the definition of a premise is that which is asserted to be the probandum in a proof.

original: 'dir yang 'dod pa dang rang gi ngo bo'i sgra dag gi don 'thob pa'i phyir 'di nyid 'dod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dir yang 'dod pa dang rang gi ngo bo'i sgra dag gi don 'thob pa'i phyir 'di nyid 'dod pa yin gyi /
translated: Here, the words ‚Äúasserted‚Äù and ‚Äúown nature‚Äù have the same meaning. Therefore, this is what is asserted.

original: mtshan nyid 'di ni slob dpon chos kyi grags pa'i yin no zhes de ltar ni bshad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid 'di ni slob dpon chos kyi grags pa'i yin no zhes de ltar ni bshad par mi bya'o //
translated: But it should not be explained that this is the definition of a premise of the master Dharmakƒ´rti.

original: gang gi phyir tshig dag ma khyab pa dang khyab ches pa gcad pa'i phyir yin na de'i mtshan nyid du 'dod pa gang yin zhes mtshan nyid kyi de kho na nyid kyis dri bar 'gyur ba kho na'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir tshig dag ma khyab pa dang khyab ches pa gcad pa'i phyir yin na de'i mtshan nyid du 'dod pa gang yin zhes mtshan nyid kyi de kho na nyid kyis dri bar 'gyur ba kho na'o //
translated: Since the terms are not pervasives and are over-pervasives, it is only proper to ask about the reality of the definition, ‚ÄúWhat is it that is asserted to be its definition?‚Äù

original: yang ci ltar na 'di don dam pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci ltar na 'di don dam pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Moreover, how could this be the definition of the ultimate?

original: gang gi phyir bzlog par bya ba de rnams la ni phyogs nyid med do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bzlog par bya ba de rnams la ni phyogs nyid med do //
translated: Because those to be refuted do not have the property of being a subject.

original: ci ltar phyogs nyid med ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar phyogs nyid med ce na /
translated: How is it that they do not have the property of being a subject?

original: bsal ba'i yul la ni bsgrub byar khas len pa gnod pa'i phyir dang / lhag ma grub pa dang / ma grub kyang sgrub byed nyid du brjod pa dang / smras pa tsam dang / rang nyid 'dod pa ma yin pa la ni mtshan nyid 'jug pa med pa'i phyir phyogs nyid med do //
analyzed: bsal ba'i yul la ni bsgrub byar khas len pa gnod pa'i phyir dang / lhag ma grub pa dang / ma grub kyang sgrub byed nyid du brjod pa dang / smras pa tsam dang / rang nyid 'dod pa ma yin pa la ni mtshan nyid 'jug pa med pa'i phyir phyogs nyid med do //
translated: Because it is contradictory to accept that the object of refutation is the probandum, because the remainder is established, because even if it is not established, it is stated to be the proof, because the definition does not apply to what is merely stated, and because it is not what is asserted by oneself, they do not have the property of being a subject.

original: des na bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khas blangs pa ni de kho na'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: des na bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khas blangs pa ni de kho na'i mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore the acceptance of being the probandum is the definition of that.

original: ma khyab ba dang khyab ches pa zlog par @37a * //
analyzed: ma khyab ba dang khyab ches pa zlog par @37a * //
translated: The meaning of the words ‚Äúthat which is to be established‚Äù is established by implication, since the words ‚Äúnon-pervasion‚Äù and ‚Äúover-pervasion‚Äù are used to refute the thesis.

original: byed pa 'di dag gis kyang bsgrub par bya bar khas blangs pa phyogs yin no zhes don gyis rnam par gzhag par 'gyur ba des na don de ltar 'gyur ba yin gyi ngag bzhin ni dgos par mi bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa 'di dag gis kyang bsgrub par bya bar khas blangs pa phyogs yin no zhes don gyis rnam par gzhag par 'gyur ba des na don de ltar 'gyur ba yin gyi ngag bzhin ni dgos par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the meaning is established in this way, but the words themselves are not necessarily accepted.

original: gal te ma khyab pa dang khyab ches pa spang ba'i phyir phyogs kyi mtshan nyid yin na ni 'dod pa smos pa nyid kyis mi 'dod pa thams cad bzlog par grub pas rang nyid kyi sgra don med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ma khyab pa dang khyab ches pa spang ba'i phyir phyogs kyi mtshan nyid yin na ni 'dod pa smos pa nyid kyis mi 'dod pa thams cad bzlog par grub pas rang nyid kyi sgra don med do zhe na /
translated: If the definition of a thesis is that which is to be established in order to avoid non-pervasion and over-pervasion, then the word ‚Äúown‚Äù is meaningless, since all that is not accepted is refuted by the mere mention of what is accepted.

original: bshad pa / log par rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir phyogs kyi mtshan nyid 'dir ni slob dpon gyi bdag nyid kyi sgra mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / log par rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir phyogs kyi mtshan nyid 'dir ni slob dpon gyi bdag nyid kyi sgra mdzad pa yin no //
translated: In response to this, we say that the word ‚Äúown‚Äù is used by the master in the definition of a thesis in order to refute the misconception that what is not accepted in a treatise is to be established.

original: bstan bcos las mthong ba'i chos mi 'dod pa yang bstan bcos khas blangs pa'i phyir 'dod pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: bstan bcos las mthong ba'i chos mi 'dod pa yang bstan bcos khas blangs pa'i phyir 'dod pa nyid yin la /
translated: The fact that what is not accepted in a treatise is seen is taught in the treatise, and therefore it is accepted.

original: 'dod pa'i phyir na bsgrub bya yin no zhes kha cig gis rtogs pas log par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i phyir na bsgrub bya yin no zhes kha cig gis rtogs pas log par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Some have understood that the thesis is to be established for the sake of desire, and so they have misunderstood.

original: 'o na te gang zhig nye bar bstan pas log par rtogs pa bsal bar 'gyur ba rang nyid smos pa mdzad pa na ci zhig ston par byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na te gang zhig nye bar bstan pas log par rtogs pa bsal bar 'gyur ba rang nyid smos pa mdzad pa na ci zhig ston par byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: But if one were to state the thesis himself, in order to eliminate misunderstanding by teaching, what would he be teaching?

original: 'dod ba la gnod pa med par ston par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dod ba la gnod pa med par ston par byed pa yin te /
translated: He would be teaching that desire is not to be refuted.

original: bstan bcos las mthong ba de ni /
analyzed: bstan bcos las mthong ba de ni /
translated: The treatise states:

original: ci ltar mi rtag pa las bdag med pa ltar gnyug ma'i bsgrub bya dang med na mi 'byung ba ma yin la /
analyzed: ci ltar mi rtag pa las bdag med pa ltar gnyug ma'i bsgrub bya dang med na mi 'byung ba ma yin la /
translated: Just as impermanence is not the thesis in the syllogism, ‚ÄúSound is impermanent, because it is produced,‚Äù so too non-self is not the thesis.

original: gang zhig bkag pas gnyug ma'i bsgrub bya la gnod par 'gyur ba de la ltos nas gtan tshigs nus pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig bkag pas gnyug ma'i bsgrub bya la gnod par 'gyur ba de la ltos nas gtan tshigs nus pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And the reason is not unestablished, in reliance on the thesis, because of the refutation of the opponent‚Äôs thesis.

original: 'o na te lung las mthong ba logs shig nyid du bsgrub bya yin par 'dod na /
analyzed: 'o na te lung las mthong ba logs shig nyid du bsgrub bya yin par 'dod na /
translated: But if one asserts that what is seen in the scriptures is a separate thesis,

original: de bsgrub bya ma yin pa nyid du ston pa yin te /
analyzed: de bsgrub bya ma yin pa nyid du ston pa yin te /
translated: then the treatise teaches that it is not a thesis.

original: bstan bcos khas blangs pa'am /
analyzed: bstan bcos khas blangs pa'am /
translated: The treatise states:

original: chos can skabs su bab pa yin pa tsam gyis ni rtsod pa'i gzhi ma yin pa bsgrub byar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can skabs su bab pa yin pa tsam gyis ni rtsod pa'i gzhi ma yin pa bsgrub byar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that the mere fact that a subject is at issue is a probandum.

original: bstan bcos khas blangs pa'i phyir de lta bu yang bsgrub byar 'dod pa nyid yin pa de ltan ni thug pa med par ston pa yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos khas blangs pa'i phyir de lta bu yang bsgrub byar 'dod pa nyid yin pa de ltan ni thug pa med par ston pa yin no //
translated: If you maintain that even that is a probandum because of the acceptance of the treatise, then you are showing that there is an infinite regress.

original: ci ltar bstan bcos khas blangs pa'i phyir bstan bcos las mthong ba bsgrub byar 'gyur na /
analyzed: ci ltar bstan bcos khas blangs pa'i phyir bstan bcos las mthong ba bsgrub byar 'gyur na /
translated: Just as you maintain that seeing is a probandum because of the acceptance of the treatise,

original: gang zhig nam mkha'i yon tan bzhin du phyin ci log tu 'ga' yang sgrub par mi byed pa'i chos de ni med pas thams cad 'gal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gtan tshigs 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang zhig nam mkha'i yon tan bzhin du phyin ci log tu 'ga' yang sgrub par mi byed pa'i chos de ni med pas thams cad 'gal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gtan tshigs 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro //
translated: then, since that which is not established in any way, like the quality of space, is a nonexistent phenomenon, all would be contradictory, and so there would be no reason at all.

original: de ltar na rang nyid kyi sgras 'dod pa la gnod pa med pa dang / nam mkha'i yon tan nyid bsgrub bya ma yin pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin na @37b yang thug pa med par 'gyur na yang ston pas log par rtogs pa bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rang nyid kyi sgras 'dod pa la gnod pa med pa dang / nam mkha'i yon tan nyid bsgrub bya ma yin pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin na @37b yang thug pa med par 'gyur na yang ston pas log par rtogs pa bsal ba yin no //
translated: Thus, the word ‚Äúitself‚Äù does not invalidate the thesis, and the quality of space is not the probandum, and even if it were the probandum, there would be no infinite regress.

original: gal te rang nyid dang 'dod pa'i sgra dag gis gtan tshigs ma grub pa brjod pa spangs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te rang nyid dang 'dod pa'i sgra dag gis gtan tshigs ma grub pa brjod pa spangs pa ma yin nam /
translated: But if the word ‚Äúitself‚Äù and the word ‚Äúthesis‚Äù avoid stating an unestablished reason,

original: gtan tshigs ma grub pa ni rgol ba bdag nyid bsgrub bya nyid du 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir nges par gzung ba'i don med do zhe na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma grub pa ni rgol ba bdag nyid bsgrub bya nyid du 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir nges par gzung ba'i don med do zhe na /
translated: then the unestablished reason is not asserted by the proponent himself, so there is no point in specifying it.

original: de rjes su brjod nas lan gdab pa'i phyir 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de rjes su brjod nas lan gdab pa'i phyir 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: In order to respond to that by stating the opponent‚Äôs position, he says ‚Äúhere‚Äù and so on.

original: gal te yang phyogs kyi mtshan nyid 'dir rang nyid 'dod pa'i sgra dag gis brjod par bya ba nges par gzung ba'i don kho na'i sgra nges pa de lta na yang byed pa dang ldan pa'i ming can te /
analyzed: gal te yang phyogs kyi mtshan nyid 'dir rang nyid 'dod pa'i sgra dag gis brjod par bya ba nges par gzung ba'i don kho na'i sgra nges pa de lta na yang byed pa dang ldan pa'i ming can te /
translated: If the term ‚Äúdirection‚Äù is to be taken as referring only to the term ‚Äúdirection‚Äù that is asserted by ourselves, then even the term ‚Äúthat which is to be indicated‚Äù would be a term that has an agent, because it is a term that is taught by the suffix that indicates action, etc.

original: bya ba la sogs pa'i rkyen gyi mtha' bstan par bya ba'i sgra gang la yod pa de dang 'dod pa'i sgra 'brel ba'i rgyu'i phyir ston par 'gyur ba'i don la yang phyogs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar gzigs nas slob dpon gyis nges par gzungüîΩba bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: bya ba la sogs pa'i rkyen gyi mtha' bstan par bya ba'i sgra gang la yod pa de dang 'dod pa'i sgra 'brel ba'i rgyu'i phyir ston par 'gyur ba'i don la yang phyogs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar gzigs nas slob dpon gyis nges par gzung ba bshad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it would follow that the term ‚Äúdirection‚Äù would also be a term that is a cause of the connection of the term ‚Äúdirection‚Äù with the term ‚Äúthat which is to be indicated,‚Äù the master DignƒÅga, seeing this, explained that the term ‚Äúdirection‚Äù is to be taken as referring to the term ‚Äúdirection‚Äù that is asserted by others.

original: 'di ltar bstan par 'os pa byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang da ltar ba'i don dag la bstan par bya ba zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar bstan par 'os pa byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang da ltar ba'i don dag la bstan par bya ba zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the term ‚Äúthat which is to be indicated‚Äù refers to the objects of the present, the past, and the future that are suitable to be indicated.

original: bstan par bya ba'i sgra'i don kyang gtso bo yin la rang nyid dang 'dod pa'i sgra'i don ni de'i khyad par yin pa des na rang nyid dang 'dod pa'i sgra'i don kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus kyi don gyis yul can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bstan par bya ba'i sgra'i don kyang gtso bo yin la rang nyid dang 'dod pa'i sgra'i don ni de'i khyad par yin pa des na rang nyid dang 'dod pa'i sgra'i don kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus kyi don gyis yul can du 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning of the term that is to be expressed is the chief point, and the meaning of the term that one wishes to express is its attribute. Therefore, the meaning of the term that one wishes to express is the object of the subject, because it is the meaning of the term that occurs at the time of the expression.

original: des na ngag gi don ni rang gi ngo bor bstan par bya ba rang nyid kyis 'dod pa gang yin pa de brjod pa ni phyogs yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'dir 'gyur la /
analyzed: des na ngag gi don ni rang gi ngo bor bstan par bya ba rang nyid kyis 'dod pa gang yin pa de brjod pa ni phyogs yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'dir 'gyur la /
translated: Thus, the meaning of the statement is that whatever one wishes to express as the nature of the object to be expressed is the proposition.

original: de las kyang ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs brjod pa dang ma grub pa'i dpe brjod pa yang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs brjod pa dang ma grub pa'i dpe brjod pa yang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, the statement of an unestablished reason and the statement of an unestablished example would also be propositions.

original: gtan tshigs dang dpe ma grub pa de dag ni rgol ba bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan par bya bar 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa nyid du nye bar bkod pa'i dus na yang phyogs nyid yin par thal lo //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang dpe ma grub pa de dag ni rgol ba bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan par bya bar 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa nyid du nye bar bkod pa'i dus na yang phyogs nyid yin par thal lo //
translated: Because those unestablished reasons and examples are intended to be taught as the object to be established by the opponent, it follows that they would also be the proposition when they are presented as the proof.

original: gal te blo'i don dag las ni ka'i rkyen da ltar ba la brjod pa'i phyir 'dod pa brjod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te blo'i don dag las ni ka'i rkyen da ltar ba la brjod pa'i phyir 'dod pa brjod pa ma yin nam /
translated: If you say that the term ‚Äúat present‚Äù is not used to express the meaning of the word ‚Äúnow,‚Äù

original: gtan tshigs sam dpe ma grub pa la ni rgol ba bsgrub bya nyid du da ltar 'dod pa med do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs sam dpe ma grub pa la ni rgol ba bsgrub bya nyid du da ltar 'dod pa med do //
translated: then the opponent does not accept that the reason or example is not established.

original: sgrub byed nyid du brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub byed nyid du brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is stated as the proof.

original: des na ston par 'gyur ba phyogs nyid du ci ltar thal bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des na ston par 'gyur ba phyogs nyid du ci ltar thal bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Therefore, how could it follow that the present is the thesis?

original: bshad pa / da ltar ma yin yang phyogs kyi mtshan nyid 'dir ni 'dod pa'i skad kyi byings @38a * //
analyzed: bshad pa / da ltar ma yin yang phyogs kyi mtshan nyid 'dir ni 'dod pa'i skad kyi byings @38a * //
translated: We reply: Even though it is not the present, the opponent accepts the term ‚Äúnow‚Äù in this definition of the thesis.

original: la ai shu la nishtha'i rkyen yan lag ma yin te /
analyzed: la ai shu la nishtha'i rkyen yan lag ma yin te /
translated: The suffix ‚Äúi‚Äù is not a non-primary suffix.

original: ston par 'gyur ba phyogs nyid yin pa 'gog par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin no //
analyzed: ston par 'gyur ba phyogs nyid yin pa 'gog par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin no //
translated: It is not a reason to refute the thesis that the present is the thesis.

original: 'di ltar bstan par bya ba'i sgras zin pa'i don gang yin pa de nyid bstan par bya ba gang zhig 'dod pa de ni phyogs yin no zhes 'dod pa'i sgra'i don gyi khyad par du byas pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar bstan par bya ba'i sgras zin pa'i don gang yin pa de nyid bstan par bya ba gang zhig 'dod pa de ni phyogs yin no zhes 'dod pa'i sgra'i don gyi khyad par du byas pa yin la /
translated: The meaning of the word ‚Äúposition‚Äù is defined as follows: that which is to be demonstrated by the explicit meaning of the words of the teaching is the thesis.

original: bstan par bya bar 'gyur ba yang bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bstan par bya bar 'gyur ba yang bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: And that which is to be demonstrated is the thesis.

original: des na de yang phyogs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir nishtha ni yan lag ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de yang phyogs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir nishtha ni yan lag ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it would follow, absurdly, that the reason also would be a position, the suffix -tva is not a part of the reason.

original: kho na'i sgra yod na ni gang zhig rang gi ngo bo kho nar bstan par bya ba'i rang nyid 'dod pa de yin no zhes bya ba 'dir 'gyur ro //üîΩma grub pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe dag ni bsgrub par bya ba kho nar bstan par bya bar 'dod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: kho na'i sgra yod na ni gang zhig rang gi ngo bo kho nar bstan par bya ba'i rang nyid 'dod pa de yin no zhes bya ba 'dir 'gyur ro // ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe dag ni bsgrub par bya ba kho nar bstan par bya bar 'dod pa ma yin te /
translated: If the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù were present, then the meaning would be that that which is to be demonstrated as having only its own nature is the thesis.

original: de'i tshe gtan tshigs nyid du bstan par bya bar 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe gtan tshigs nyid du bstan par bya bar 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nonestablished reasons and examples are not asserted to be the thesis, because at that time they are asserted to be the reason.

original: gal te gtan tshigs la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba kho nar bstan par bya bar 'dod par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /üîΩbden mod kyi /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba kho nar bstan par bya bar 'dod par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na / bden mod kyi /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it the case that the reason and so on are to be taught only as the probandum?

original: 'on kyang gang las bstan par bya bar 'gyur ba'i yul nges par gzung bar 'gyur ba dus gcig ni grub pa dang bsgrub bar bya ba nyid du ston pa srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gang las bstan par bya bar 'gyur ba'i yul nges par gzung bar 'gyur ba dus gcig ni grub pa dang bsgrub bar bya ba nyid du ston pa srid pa ma yin no //
translated: That is true, but it is not possible to teach the probandum and the proof at the same time, because the domain of the probandum is ascertained.

original: des na des par gzung ba ni rim gyis kyang grub pa dang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa sel bar byed pa yin no zhes 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: des na des par gzung ba ni rim gyis kyang grub pa dang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa sel bar byed pa yin no zhes 'thad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the ascertainment eliminates the assertion that the probandum and the proof are sequential.

original: gang dag gang gi tshe 'dod par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bstan par bya bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de dag gi ltar na ni nges par gzung bar byas kyang /
analyzed: gang dag gang gi tshe 'dod par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bstan par bya bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de dag gi ltar na ni nges par gzung bar byas kyang /
translated: But if you think that the domain of the probandum is ascertained when the reason and so on are taught, then it is not necessary to teach the probandum after teaching the reason and so on.üîΩBut if you think that the domain of the probandum is ascertained when the probandum is taught, then it is not necessary to teach the reason and so on after teaching the probandum.

original: gang gi tshe rang gi ngo bo kho nar 'dod par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bstan par bya bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de phyogs yin la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rang gi ngo bo kho nar 'dod par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bstan par bya bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de phyogs yin la /
translated: When it is asserted that it is just the nature of the thesis itself, then it is the thesis that is to be stated.

original: de'i tshig ni dam bca' ba yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshig ni dam bca' ba yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: And when it is asserted that it is the thesis itself that is to be established, then it is the thesis that is to be stated.üîΩWhen it is said that it is not established, then it is the thesis that is to be established.

original: gang gi tshe 'di ma grub pa nyid rjod par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bsgrub par bya'o zhes cig car nyid sgrub par byed pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur bar 'dod par mthong ba de zlog pa'i phyir nges par gzung bar 'gyur bas 'di ni spang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di ma grub pa nyid rjod par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bsgrub par bya'o zhes cig car nyid sgrub par byed pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur bar 'dod par mthong ba de zlog pa'i phyir nges par gzung bar 'gyur bas 'di ni spang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: When it is seen that it is asserted that it is the thesis itself that is to be established, then in order to refute that, it is definitely to be rejected.

original: 'o na rigs pa'i sgor yang kho na'i sgra bya dgos te /
analyzed: 'o na rigs pa'i sgor yang kho na'i sgra bya dgos te /
translated: But in the Entrance to Logic, the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is used,

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa ni phyogs yin no zhes bya ba 'dir yang byed pa dang lhan cig pa'i mtha' can bsgrub bya'i sgra yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa ni phyogs yin no zhes bya ba 'dir yang byed pa dang lhan cig pa'i mtha' can bsgrub bya'i sgra yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because in the statement ‚ÄúThe thesis itself is to be established,‚Äù the word ‚Äúthesis‚Äù has an affix indicating the instrumental case.

original: bshad pa / 'dod @38b pa'i tshig la nishtha yan lag nyid yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / 'dod @38b pa'i tshig la nishtha yan lag nyid yin no //
translated: The response: The suffix is used for the desire to speak.

original: 'di la ni nishtha'i mtha' can gyi tshig dang 'brel pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i sgra'i don 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i yul can du dogs par 'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don du srid pa khyad par can gyi sgra gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la ni nishtha'i mtha' can gyi tshig dang 'brel pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i sgra'i don 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i yul can du dogs par 'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don du srid pa khyad par can gyi sgra gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Here, because it is connected with a word that has the suffix, there is no other word that has the special meaning of existence, which is the object of the desire to speak, the object of the word, and the object of the suffix.

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du zhes bya ba 'di ni khyad par gyi tshig nyid yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du zhes bya ba 'di ni khyad par gyi tshig nyid yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is a word that specifies.

original: de'i phyir nishtha'i rkyen des gtan tshigs dang dpe ma grub pa 'gog par byed do //
analyzed: de'i phyir nishtha'i rkyen des gtan tshigs dang dpe ma grub pa 'gog par byed do //
translated: Therefore, that condition of the suffix refutes the reason and example that are not established.

original: dper na sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dper na sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: For example, ‚ÄúSound is impermanent because it is produced, like a pot.‚Äù

original: byas pa nyid dpyod pa la ma grub kyang /
analyzed: byas pa nyid dpyod pa la ma grub kyang /
translated: Even though ‚Äúproduced‚Äù is not established in the analysis,

original: de'i tshe rgol ba bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / grangs can la dpe ma grub kyang bsgrub bya nyid du 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir de dag brjod pa phyogs ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe rgol ba bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / grangs can la dpe ma grub kyang bsgrub bya nyid du 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir de dag brjod pa phyogs ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: At that time, the opponent does not accept the probandum itself, and for the SƒÅ·πÉkhya, the example is not established, but he does not accept the probandum itself, so they are like stating a non-position.

original: rgol ba bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'dod pa'i sgras bsal bar bya ba gzhan dag kyang ston pa'o //
analyzed: rgol ba bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'dod pa'i sgras bsal bar bya ba gzhan dag kyang ston pa'o //
translated: By the opponent himself, and so on, he shows that other objects of desire are excluded by the word desire.

original: mi 'dod pa dang 'dres pa ni bsgrub bya ma yin no //
